1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar mang du/ s+yA su m+b+hi ma tid ba du par bri rnamam thadang/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): sU dra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lnga'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba
1b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
2a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong drug khri nyis stong
2a3(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/ dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / 'jam dpal dang / seng ge'i tog/
2a4(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po
2b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rab tu mi skul dang / don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa
2b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / sems kyi blo gros dang / sems bzang po dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms rgyal po
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lag na rin po che dang / sems dpa' rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang /
2b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lag brtson dang / sems can sgrol dang / brtson 'grus mos dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang / smon lam
3a1(dkon brtsegs): / ga snron pa dang / pa dang // rgya
3a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang
3a3(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / blo gros dam pa dang khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub/
3a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam
3a5(dkon brtsegs): par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / spobs pa bzhad pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par
3a6(dkon brtsegs): gnon dang / nyi zla'i 'od zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po dang / nor bu dang /
3b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud med rnam sbyar go cha dang / rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par sdang byed dang / mes byin dang / tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang
3b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad zab mo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
3b3(dkon brtsegs): so// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs
3b4(dkon brtsegs): cig go lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang // lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa
3b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs cig go/ sgyu ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /
3b6(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhi zhi dang thubs cig go/
3b7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag
4a1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs cig go/ de dag dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang ka gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
4a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang yang thabs cig ste/
4a3(dkon brtsegs): de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug
4a4(dkon brtsegs): pagacig pu dben pa na 'dug pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// /
4a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag
4a6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas pa 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin
4a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten
4b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'byung ba de bzhin du/ gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir/ zhi ba/ gsal ba/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge dang bral ba/ zab pa shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de
4b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgyal brgyalam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na ni chos mnyan pa'ang med do// chos mnan pa me
4b3(dkon brtsegs): na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa'ang med pas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can
4b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tsom
4b5(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni/ 'dod chags che ba/ zhe sdang che ba/ ga ti/
4b6(dkon brtsegs): mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral bami dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang bral ba sha sdug
4b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon
5a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang
5a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
5a3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
5a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag mnyen pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa
5a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag pa'i 'od chen po dang / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 'od de dang snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun
5a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mun nag dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri dang / khor yug dang / btang zung dang / gtang zung chen po dang / gangs dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa
5a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gzhugs te
5b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di ltar yid du mchi ba 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i
5b2(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cag sems dang ba dang / lus
5b3(dkon brtsegs): sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'ong 'di lta bu bkye ba
5b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to// sang
5b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang
5b6(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to// rlung gi sgra dang /
5b7(dkon brtsegs): chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gru'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi
6a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byin cing / thams cad zhi ba dud / rab tu zhi bar gyur to// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis
6a2(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang skye ba mang po la bde ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du
6a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye zhing des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ngag thams cad sdang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs
6a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyeng dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas gsung gi 'phrin las
6a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung zhing de dag gis gsung gi 'phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba de dag
6a6(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang
6a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra mngon par 'byin cing / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to// rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing /
6b1(dkon brtsegs): thong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / rnam par tshol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rdza
6b2(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sku dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang bsam gtan gyi
6b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi sgra dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi snga dag dang / de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi
6b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag du ma ngag gi sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub da
6b5(dkon brtsegs): nyad thos 'ang dang / rang sangs rgyas nying dang / brgya byin nying dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal spring yongs su 'grub pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ de nas
6b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la ci zhog byas thong zhig/ 'od 'di ni ji tsam du
6b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
7a1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyar ba byas pa yin te 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngag
7a2(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od 'di ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms thams cad kyis yongs
7a3(dkon brtsegs): su bsgos pas/ yongs su tshims par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sla ba
7a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de lha mod kyi'on kyang legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang / khyed la bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba
7a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
7a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad
7a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
7b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su snun pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba sa bla na med pa/ s+thA dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
7b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chags dang / zhe sbyong dang / gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus pa/ dbang po
7b3(dkon brtsegs): nus ba/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
7b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ shes pa che ba/ brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa
7b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzengs bskod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
7b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'i go byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa chags pa/
8a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gzungs thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
8a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de'adi lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos
8a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar gyur te/ rigs kyi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir 'ong 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs
8a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di
8a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'gyed lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do//
8b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar
8b2(dkon brtsegs): bgying ba'i 'od 'di lta bu 'byung bar mi mdzad lags so// bka' stsas pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyis rnam
8b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs cag tu rgyun mi 'chang ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gad+hA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyeng dag na
8b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med zangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//
8b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang / sdang ba 'di lta bu dang / 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las mchis su'i 'od lags
8b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
9a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba yod de/ den bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
9a2(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'od
9a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
9a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang /
9a5(dkon brtsegs): zhu blags bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
9a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la nga bab par shes na der zhig de nas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig
9a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyi mi khyab pa ngag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'di lha ste/ dper na mi spobs po che'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba/
9b1(dkon brtsegs): las skums pa tsam la/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi sdang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
9b2(dkon brtsegs): la la dag ni me tog gi char drug mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der
9b3(dkon brtsegs): lcags so// la la dag ni phye ma dang thug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / tsam
9b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / sku sngar dang / d+hA ru sU ri dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / b+hur shi ka dang / b+hAr shi ka chen po dang / mAn+da ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pA ru sha ka dang
9b5(dkon brtsegs): pA ru sha ka chen po dang / zla mdog dang / zla mdog chen po dang / zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang / spos kyi char dag dang / 'phreng ba'i char
9b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / phye ma'i char ngag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhag
9b7(dkon brtsegs): sobyang chub sems dpa' la la ngag ni sil sman 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
10a1(dkon brtsegs): / shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' la la ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang / stong gsum gyis
10a2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra skad kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
10a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lkugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i
10a4(dkon brtsegs): mod la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
10a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi sems can gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to// sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin
10a6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gyis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ 'chab pas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i
10a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa/ mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
10b1(dkon brtsegs): dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
10b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang
10b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te/ lus thams cang rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma la dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum
10b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krungs bcas te 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du
10b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba de dang / me tog gi chur dang / spros kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil man 'bum zag mang po sgra byed pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / zing chen po ban
10b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa'ang mthong / 'khor phal po che lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
10b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma de dag thams cad kyi
11a1(dkon brtsegs): lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur sdang ba dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
11a2(dkon brtsegs): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
11a3(dkon brtsegs): do/ rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal/ mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa// bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po//
11a4(dkon brtsegs): sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad// bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma
11a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis// bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas/
11a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang / skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes// sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang // sbyin dgyes thams
11a7(dkon brtsegs): cang gtong ba bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung stsal// gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang // thub/
11b1(dkon brtsegs): pas zhal zas sbyang nan de bzhin pho brang dkor yang stsal// sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu// stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten cing thugs la legs dgongs
11b2(dkon brtsegs): pas rdul bral su lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing // gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi// yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'tshal// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la// bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa
11b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa// dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'// sbyar pa legs par
11b5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyen// bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing spyong pa'i chos la brtson// shin tu dri ma ma mchis bsam bsgoms dag gi the tsom khyam
11b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin ngang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten// khyod kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
11b7(dkon brtsegs): chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin// 'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gyi skyabs gyur cig/ rdul bral khyod kyis sku las dum bu dum bur bcad cing na// srang la gcal ba mdzad
12a1(dkon brtsegs): cing ngam rum lcug rol ma lus par/ sku kun ril gyis btung ste phyug rol phrug gu gcig ma btang // rdul bral 'ong mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tsom sa can
12a2(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la// lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas lam rgya mtsho bas gyur cig/ mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog
12a3(dkon brtsegs): sar lhung gyur kyang // rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung / de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag
12a4(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po
12a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od/
12a6(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig byas thong zhig/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par
12a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde/
12b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slang du bshang du gsol/ skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' bral to// 'od srungs de'i phyir legs par rab tu
12b2(dkon brtsegs): 'on la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
12b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs
12b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma seng dag 'od kyis sdang bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag su med grangs mang bsam
12b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa rig yang dag par bskul te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag gis nga gzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
12b6(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar sdang la ta la srid tsam na pad+ma dag la 'khod ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
12b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing / spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bapa la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang
13a1(dkon brtsegs): ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di
13a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing / spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin to// gsol pa/ bcom
13a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi
13a4(dkon brtsegs): nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lhar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang / byams pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod
13a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dang / spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang
13a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la'ang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus
13a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta bar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
13b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs pa kho nar zang // 'od srungs rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di skar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
13b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kyang re zhig mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba la ci smos te/ de ni gnas med // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
13b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu
13b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs byang chub
13b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang
13b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang /
13b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing / de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing / de las
14a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yongs smra tshol ba dang / lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang
14a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing / tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
14a3(dkon brtsegs): rab dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bkod nasaphyis
14a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang / byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
14a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang nga / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos
14a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma/
14a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa gsung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la'ang dgod par bgyi na/
14b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la wA smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'od srungs de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ lus
14b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na/ snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lha cig smos te/ de ni gnas
14b3(dkon brtsegs): med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag
14b4(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i skad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
14b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re zhig sdong cig dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing / de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyu
14b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de lha mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig/ de nas gnas
14b7(dkon brtsegs): brtan 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyong lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
15a1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la sgoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang yo 'ang
15a2(dkon brtsegs): ma shes/ de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa'ang ma shes ci byed pa dang / ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la
15a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas bcan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sngar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi zhi la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma
15a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag da rung thams cad
15a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par// de ltar bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lha lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang
15a6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi bgyid bcom ldan 'das
15a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa de ni go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting nge 'dzin
15b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni srad kyis cang yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa 'od spangs de bzhin no// de skang rdzus pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nan thos
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lha smos kyang ci dgosade nas gnas bcan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni nga bzhin
15b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo//
15b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khril snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma'ang shes par ma nus so//
15b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas bcan rab 'byor byang chub sems
15b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin pa ni khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'ong
15b7(dkon brtsegs): bdang 'gro ba'ang ma shes 'greng ba'ang ma mthong 'chags pa'ang ma mthong 'dug pa'ang ma mthong / zhal ba'ang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so//
16a1(dkon brtsegs): / de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
16a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bdag bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das bdag gal
16a3(dkon brtsegs): te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la
16a4(dkon brtsegs): der mi la la zhig skyes nas/ de ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thog te bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdun du mchis nas sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal ba'i
16a5(dkon brtsegs): bar du rgyun mi chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du/ de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob
16a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la re zhig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du'ang grag par mi 'gyur na/ des ting nge 'dzin de las slong ba lnga spos kya
16a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems
16b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag bsdu ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin pa zhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ de dag gi gnas kyur ma 'tshal lags so// bcom
16b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongs su tshol ba na/ sems can+da re re'i slad du bskal pa gan+d+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen
16b3(dkon brtsegs): bor sreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'ang/
16b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/ bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing / de lta bu'i theg pa
16b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'ang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyi skrag pa'i bsam pa de
16b6(dkon brtsegs): lha bus tshigs de skad smras pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur tu zin na/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor
16b7(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal sring gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor song
17a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar
17a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mang lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nan gyi dper byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i bu dang / 'od srungs chen
17a3(dkon brtsegs): po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskul pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
17a4(dkon brtsegs): mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi
17a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgra rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi
17a6(dkon brtsegs): stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas de nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/
17a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dgo 'dus kyis bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpalag sa
17b1(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas na/ 'di ltar 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas/ pad+ma
17b2(dkon brtsegs): rta'i phung lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni gser/ sdong bu ni dngus sring po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/ ze ba ni bai DUR+Ya las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa ba ni mngon par
17b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul cing / pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/
17b4(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba dag pa pad+ma'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to// de nas pad+ma de dag rgyal chen
17b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor
17b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang
17b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'od min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gsum
18a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas/ 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi rab 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i rtsa nAH
18a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs rjod par byed/ yang dag par skul bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi
18a3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams// 'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung // u dum wa ra'i me
18a4(dkon brtsegs): tog ltar// sangs rgyas de bzhin pa/ shin tu dkon// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ de ni 'jig rten 'di byung ste// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i// chos ni yang dag de ston
18a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// lha yi 'dod pa yid dga' la// ji srid yun ring sbyang byas la// gang du tshor ba myong 'gyur ba'i// ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsnyen pa/
18a6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel// khams gsum 'khor ba'i srog chags la// bde ba yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang / khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni// gang
18a7(dkon brtsegs): dag bag med mi rtog pa// de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir ngeng la// chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu//
18b1(dkon brtsegs): byis dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/ mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing // 'jigs chen bdud kyi 'gas pa ste/ ngag med spyod pa byed rnams la/ thar pa yod pa gal 'gyur/
18b2(dkon brtsegs): ngami dzi spang swa bar bya// bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang // sum can gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur zad zlos/ gang dag thams pa sa n+d+ha
18b3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa'o// 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med// dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin// stobs pa shAkya seng ge yis/
18b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bskal pa bye bar sbyar mdzad nas// ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni// gang la sems can mi dmigs shing / srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i/
18b5(dkon brtsegs): chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang // mthong bar dka' bo rab tu ston// dag pa dang ni de bzhin du// chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos/ sa
18b6(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams la ston par mdzad// gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i// snong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang // smon par byed pa ma yin pa'i// yang dag mtha' na rab tu ston// chags
18b7(dkon brtsegs): med mtshan ma yod min zhing / skye med 'byung ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i// chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad// zang med 'byung ba yod min zhing / rang bzhin
19a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni dngos med dang // bskur med mtshan ma yod min pa// thon kyang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'/ sems can gang yang skyed med cing // 'ga' yang 'chig
19a2(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa'ang gang yang med// sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin// skad kyis chos rnams bskrun byas kyang // skad la rten pa yod min zhing // yi ge rnams dang
19a3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i chos// mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad// gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing // chu dang mA yang mi dmigs la// sar yang rtogs pa med pa'i chos// spyan dang
19a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ston par mdzad// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni// stong zhing phung po lnga po dag/ dngos po med par skyon par mdzad//
19a5(dkon brtsegs): mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang // stong pa de yang dmigs su meng // gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang // ro dang
19a6(dkon brtsegs): reg bya yid 'ong ba// de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed// rtog pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin// de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni// srog chags rnams la chos ston gyi// grang //
19a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa// de dag rnam 'dren drung du shog de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis sgong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigs
19b1(dkon brtsegs): su bcang ba de dag gis chos bstan pas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sgra'i bu rnams las lha bye ba drug dgu bcucu drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drim dang rnam
19b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu khri nyis skyong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes su thob po// lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
19b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag
19b4(dkon brtsegs): las khwa'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b5(dkon brtsegs): shAt+tha thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig pu 'khod //
19b6(dkon brtsegs): zhwa'i me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da rang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mahAr ba dang / man+dAr ba chen po dang / b+he ma dang / spos dang / zug pa dag gis dri bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par
19b7(dkon brtsegs): gtor to// phreng gi bar snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyings mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to// de'i tshe na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi
20a1(dkon brtsegs): / brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med pa de snyed kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing / gling
20a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs
20a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i bu dri med dang / lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag
20a4(dkon brtsegs): gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan
20a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog man+dA ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab po// me tog man+da ra ba'i char de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su me tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag
20a6(dkon brtsegs): tshang bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs ji lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/
20a7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to// me tog gi 'od nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du khyab par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ smon lam las byung ba'i spyan la 'jug go// de nas lha'i bu bo zos rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal
20b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so//
20b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya
20b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang / shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi
20b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / bstan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang / bden pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams
20b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi byed pa'i gzhi rnams dang / stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi
20b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / ngor/
21a1(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi gzhi rnams dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs
21a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang / khams gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i
21a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang / dpa' bo'i gzhi rnams dang / gzhi med pa'i bzhi de dag bstan pa na snod du 'gyur ba ni su yod snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam dpal
21a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang
21a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
21a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
21a7(dkon brtsegs): kho bo dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
21b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// 'jam dpal gal te khyod gsung rab mi mdzad/ rjod par mi mdzad/ 'don par yang mi mdzad/ yi ge'ang mi mdzad ka swa'ang migs pa snun/ bdag gis
21b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyong nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ sems
21b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ rig par mi byed/ rnam par rig par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ gtong bar mi byed cing / thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lha na/ kho bos kyang de bzhin
21b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ gang gis ming brjod cing / ming de'ang g.yo ba med pa'i
21b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal lha'i bu 'di dag ni khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyi/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi bka' mching
21b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/ 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
21b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin mnyan 'dod par 'gyur la/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin mnyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la bar
22a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o// bdag ni nyan pa'o// 'di ni bshad par bya ba'o snyam du sems pas/
22a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmigs pa dang / chos su dmigs pa'o// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang /
22a3(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas chos snyan par byed de/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed do// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag
22a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang / chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed//
22a5(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang / chos su dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa ste/ lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan
22a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni mnyam par can pa yin te/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// skya'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal cinas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstun pa bshad pa legs
22a7(dkon brtsegs): so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu ci rung rnam par ma chog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ byang chub kyang /
22b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las sdo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sgra'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go// zhe sdang las ldog go// gti mug las ldogs
22b2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa las ldog go// ma rig pa las ldog go// 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog go// chu las ldog go// lta ba las ldog go/ ming las ldog go/ gzugs
22b3(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go// gzugs kyi khams las ldog go// gzugs med pa'i khams las sdig go// nyan thos kyi spyod pa las ldog go// rang sangs rgyas kyi
22b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa las ldog go// rtog pa las ldog go// 'dzin pa las ldog go// mtshan ma las ldog go// dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go// chad par lta ba las ldog go// rtag par lta ba las
22b5(dkon brtsegs): sngog go// blang ba las ldog go/ dor ba las ldog go// bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go// srog su 'du shes pa las ldog go// gang zag
22b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ yid la byed pa dag las ldog go// chags pa dag las ldog go// phyin ci log dag las ldog go// 'jigs tshogs las ldog go// 'jig tshogs la lha ba
22b7(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go// sgrib pa dag las ldog go// phung po lngar 'dzin pa dag las ldog go// phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams
23a1(dkon brtsegs): cang las ldog go// khams rnams las ldog go// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go// chos su 'du shes pa las ldog go// dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las
23a2(dkon brtsegs): ldog go// bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag chos ston par 'gyur ro// bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// bdag ye shes
23a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// snyam pa'i 'du shes de dag las ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed
23a4(dkon brtsegs): do// dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do//
23a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing // rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no//
23a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las mi ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go// stong pa nyid las mi ldog go// mtshan ma
23a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa las mi ldog go/ smon pa med pa las mi ldog go// de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go// chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go// yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go// mnyam /
23b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid las mi ldog go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog
23b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni des na sdig pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsung ba de ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa
23b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod
23b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa'ang ma yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal 'on
23b5(dkon brtsegs): gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / ldog par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin
23b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ yongasu gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/ med par yang bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
23b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na/ rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog
24a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ chang par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho
24a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs
24a3(dkon brtsegs): su shes par zad kyi/ de la ni chad pa'ang med/ rtag pa'ang med de/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i
24a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa/
24a5(dkon brtsegs): la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras
24a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpa'
24a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal de ni mi gda' 'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong/
24b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// skra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i srad du nga skang ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos grangs zin te/ de ni kho bo'i mdu na
24b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so zhes gsungs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ wa'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin sum/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas nam mkha'i khams las/
24b3(dkon brtsegs): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ nam ma
24b4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de lta bu yin pas/ nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs
24b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lta bar 'dod na/ mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing / cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ khang pa brtsegs pa rba
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu 'byed pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis spong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan
24b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing / khri spyan re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
25a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag sprul to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ris bu'i b+hin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'dis bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyin kyi
25a2(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par spyod pa'i pad+ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
25a3(dkon brtsegs): dong sde lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar
25a4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad+ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang / 'ang pa brtsegs pa dag na
25a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gang+gA'i bye snyed
25a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gi spyad pa stsal mdzad pa/ de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags/ thub pa mtshan gyis yod/
25a7(dkon brtsegs): su sbas gyur pa/ sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste// 'dren pa gang la ming dang srog dang ni/ gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston/ rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad//
25b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bstan// khyod kyi shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'// ye shes mthar byord khyong sa phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig chos rje lnga dang mis mchod pa'i
25b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing / stong pa nyid la mos par bgyi ba yi// mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur// gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang // gang dag phyogs
25b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/ de dag gis ni mtshan med stong ba'i chos// rang bzhin mtshan cing ma mchis cag tu bsgoms// 'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chi
25b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su ma mchis shing // 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no// ji ltar mi yis sbrum bstan gyur pa// sdang yang de bzhin ning du ma
25b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis ltar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang // rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan// gang zag la las gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byin/
25b6(dkon brtsegs): pas// 'dus byas spong bar bzod pa gang lags pa// bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags// byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye sted du/
25b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pabs// gang gis gang la mi dang srog dang ni// gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag/ thos nas de la/
26a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal bzod thob pa// de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags// gang la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis// bskul pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang //
26a2(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang // de ni 'gro ba grol ba mi thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang // de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin
26a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal stong pa yi// chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang // de bzhin bstan la dad par thob par dka'// mi yi srid pa'ang
26a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis// mi 'om brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing / khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob gyur la// bde gshegs brtsan la
26a5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod// sgra la 'chel zhing 'dug par ma byed par// chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis// khyed kyis rtag tu dgon
26a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas sten la// des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos// chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin spen gyis la// sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga' yang ma sten cig/ sems can
26a7(dkon brtsegs): kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la// sems can de la nam yang ma rlom zhig/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyikyis la// rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod// g.yel ba
26b1(dkon brtsegs): med par shing drung snyan gyis la// bkus te bor ba mchog la ma spod cig/ 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min// mtshan cing gcig cing smig tu 'dra ba yis// dam pa'i don
26b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mu gcig shes gyis la// myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis// phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug/ de dag grong spong 'dra bar gsungs
26b3(dkon brtsegs): pas na// de la nam yang rten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid// gti mug nga rgyal yongs su cog pas bskyed// rtog pa de yang ma zung 'byung med par//
26b4(dkon brtsegs): slar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na// 'khor de las srog chags nyi zhi nis spong tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
26b5(dkon brtsegs): tu sems skyes so// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag gi
26b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma sum spong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge bsnyen bdun spong dang / dge bsnyen ma stong dang / skra'i bu ni khri bdun stong yang chos
26b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/
27a1(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg
27a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu sdig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
27a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus gzugs pad+ma dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di/
27a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang / 'khor 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i
27a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brta na shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
27a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ka lha'i bu blo gros
27a7(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
27b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs zhu zhing / zhu blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
27b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de de'u
27b3(dkon brtsegs): re bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
27b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
27b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mong la spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi
27b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to// bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur nas/ lag pa 'khar ba la rten
27b7(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro bar gyur to// de dag gi lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gzugs la 'khogs par gyur pa dang / rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang brnyings shing rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun
28a1(dkon brtsegs): nag su gyur par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing rdzangs la yi chad cing gyid lug ste/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du rnam
28a2(dkon brtsegs): par rtog sde/ gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin// bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa 'am/ cig tum
28a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur grang skam mo// bdud de dag gi rnam par rtog pa de sa bu de skyes ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/ bdung de dag gi mdun du
28a4(dkon brtsegs): bkod do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
28a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de da sngar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'tshe ba 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/
28a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma skrag cig/ lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de'ang thos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos
28a7(dkon brtsegs): nas yang rgya cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
28b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag yongs su stobs shig/ grogs po dag yongs su stobs shig/ de nas lnga'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// thogs pa
28b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ma 'jigs shig/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag deng bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal
28b3(dkon brtsegs): ba der song zhig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jig pa stsol bar mdzad do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis
28b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig de skad ces smras nas/ de nyid du mi sdang bar gyur to/ de nas bdud sdig can 'khor bdud sdig can 'bum phrag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad nas shing
28b5(dkon brtsegs): gtugs la 'jigs shing lag pa 'khar ba la chen bzhin du 'dong zhing skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgyu skard mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
28b7(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum
29a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan yongs su bsngags pa ni mi dang lags kyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de la ma lags so// de ci'i skad du na na/ 'jam dpas
29a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos nas bdag cag 'jigs shing sngangs la skrag par gyur te/ 'chi 'pho ba snyam du 'tshal cing / ma mchis par 'gyur ba skam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// de
29a3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud sdig can dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon
29a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang / byed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang sems can
29a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas/ de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming yongs su bsgrags pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags
29a6(dkon brtsegs): pas ni/ khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di/
29a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar lus 'khogs pa 'dis nyam thag cing ngo tsha lags pas bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag gis kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lag pa de lta bu 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
29b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig 'di nyid du rjod cig dang / des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar par byed par
29b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te// spyan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor
29b3(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdang / lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / sgo 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma
29b4(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag rab tu ga sil zhing / me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ha dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha sdug gis yongs su bskor cing
29b5(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar he/ bkod pa chen po dang / rnam par rtse ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ka bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
29b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'jug go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
29b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'as
30a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams par 'jug lags so// bcom ldan das kyis bka'astsal pa/ 'jam pa 'khyod gyi nga dzin bslab pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/ cod kyis nga ba zhi sa
30a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ni ji srid cig lon// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing / bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshen bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chu
30a3(dkon brtsegs): tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gang las ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci// 'jam dpal gyis gso
30a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs/
30a5(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog man+da ra ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
30a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das byung ste/ de ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de gsung bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos lags so//
30a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bsgrub pa de dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
30b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam par 'jig cing / 'dod chags kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa
30b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang rnam par 'jig cing / zhe sdang gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / gti mug rnam par 'jig cing / gti mug gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / phrag dog rnam par 'jig cing
30b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal rnam par 'jig cing / nga rgyal gyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 'chab pa rnam par 'jig cing / 'chab pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / khro ba rnam par 'jig cing / khro ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam par 'jig cing / yongs su gdung ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /
30b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes rnam par 'jig cing / 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / lta ba rnam par 'jig cing / lta ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / rtog pa rnam par 'jig cing / rtog
30b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / len pa rnam par 'jig cing / len pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa rnam par 'jig cing / 'dzin pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par
30b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing / mtshan ma'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / srid pa rnam par 'jig cing / srid pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / rtag pa rnam par
31a1(dkon brtsegs): nga / rtag pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par cing pa dang / rlung pa rnam par 'dug cing / rang pa'i rnamasarnam par 'jig par sna pa dang / rlu /
31a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig cing / phung po'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khams rnam par 'jig cing / khams kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / skye mched rnam par 'jig cing /
31a3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khams gsum pa rnam par 'jig cing / khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang
31a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo//
31a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / zab pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
31a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhi gang /
31a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ srub ma mchis pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis ngam 'cha' ba dang / 'du shes kyi dbang gi spyong yul ma lags pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
31b1(dkon brtsegs): ma sa na sa sa gas nga mamam yas rna sa hA/
31b2(dkon brtsegs): mas gnamamaldan pa dang / dag pa'i chus ma spang ba dang / byas pa dang / rgyam mas dang / nga sa pa pa dang / /
31b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rgyas das tsha rin pa dag dang na ting dzin / ma ldan das su grubams pa sa ni na ma/
31b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims ma rab ba dang / tshul khrims mi rten pa dang / tshul khrims na gnog ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bani po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin
