57a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha'ang thogs par mi byed/ ral gri'ang ma yin/ bong ba'ang ma yin/ dbyug pa'ang thogs par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dong ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/
57a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can sems can zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can sems
57b1(dkon brtsegs): tsan zhes bgyi ba ni/ 'di sa ste/ ming tsam dang / 'dzin pa'i 'du shes tsam lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sgra'i bu nges pas na bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsang par bya'o//
57b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsang bar bya'o// srog tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsang bar bya'o// ming du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes
57b3(dkon brtsegs): gsang bar bya'o// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal cis dgum par bgyi'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyi mtshon gyis bsad par bya ste/ shes rab kyi mtshon des kyang
57b4(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang 'dzin pa med pa dang / gcod pa med pa de ltar gzung bar bya zhing de ltar gsang bar bya'o// lha'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar gang gis bdag gi 'du shes dang sems can gyi 'du shes
57b5(dkon brtsegs): gsang pa des sems can thams cad gsang ba yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sgra'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu
57b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te khyod mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te 'jug cing / nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de
57b7(dkon brtsegs): stan kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skang ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nyid
58a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa des de mnyam pa nyid yin pas de mnyam pa zhing du 'jug par byed pa dertan kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spong ngo // wa'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nag
58a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nying gang yin skam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bya ba ma mchis pa dang / skrag par bya ba mi bgyid pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs
58a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang yin sbrum/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sngo/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs lags/
58a4(dkon brtsegs): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ spu'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyis sgrib par nus sam lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni
58a5(dkon brtsegs): las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de wa na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par
58a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'dod do zhes ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skra'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod gsang ba dang po phyir phung ba de'i mgo sa mtshon
58a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'debs par byed pa de ltan kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa tshungs par spyod 'dong ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gsad pa
58b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dod chags ni gsang pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang dang gti mug ni gsad pa zhes bya'o// ngargyal dang / khro ba dang / 'chang ba dang / drag dog dang / b+hu dang / gso dang /
58b2(dkon brtsegs): ser rdza dang / skrag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba ni gsang pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de dag ni gsang ba yin pas gsungs so// 'i bu rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyong pa
58b3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed// zhi bar byed/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa de la ni spong par snang bas/ mi sdug pa la 'jug par mi byed par sems 'di ga las skyes/ gang du 'gag/ yul gang la
58b4(dkon brtsegs): chags par 'gyur/ gang gis chags par 'gyur zhes 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar so sor rtog par byed pa na 'dod chags kyang mi dmigs/ gang sa
58b5(dkon brtsegs): chags par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis chags par 'gyur ba de'ang mi dmigs so// gang gi tshe mi dmigs pa de'i tshe mi len to// gang gi tshe mi len pa de'i tshe mi 'dor ro// gang gi tshe mi 'dor ba de'i tshe mi 'dzin mi
58b6(dkon brtsegs): spong ste/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / 'chab ba dang / phrag dog dang / rgyu dang / g.yo dang / ser sna dang / skrag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma
58b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i sems la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lha'i bu gang gsang pa de lta bu skyes ma thag tu bsod par byed pa de ni gsang pa dang po phyir phyung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'debs pa
59a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// sgra'i bu
59a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed/ chos mnyes par mi byed/ dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dong ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las
59a3(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te de skad ston 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings lags so/
59a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyes par byar nus skam mam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
59a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed pa de lta ma kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod do zhes ston to// lha'i bu chos chos shes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes
59a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ skra'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos ni
59a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byar nus snyam mam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod chos mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo
59b1(dkon brtsegs): khyong da tshangs pa mtshungs par spong 'dong ngo zhes ston to// klu'i bu dge 'dun dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ skra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas 'dags pa can thos rnams ni 'dus ma bgyis kyis
59b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bye ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma bgyis pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kwa'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dus ma byas mnyes par byar nus tham
59b3(dkon brtsegs): mam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de ldan kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa
59b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par spyod 'dod ngo zhes ston to// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas su dmigs pa de ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed do// gang chos su dmigs pa de ni chos mnyes par byed do// gang dge 'dun du
59b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni dge 'dun mnyes par byed do// lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas su mi dmigs pa dang / chos su mi dmigs pa dang / dge 'dun du mi dmigs pa des ni sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/ des ni chos
59b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par ma byas/ des ni dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa kho na yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des de dag ma dmigs pas na/ des mnyes par ma byas pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang dag sa
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la chags pa dang / chos la chags pa dang / dge 'dun la chags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par byas/ chos mnyes par byas/ dge 'dun mnyes par byas pa yin no// gang dag gis sa
60a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma dmigs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas la chags pa med pas/ de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang dag gis chos ma dmigs pa de dag ni chos la chags pa
60a2(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ de dag gis chos mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang dag gis dge 'dun ma dmigs pa de dag ni dge 'dun la chags pa med pas/ de dag gis dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// lha'i bu
60a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par ma byas pa mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni rnam par bshig pa'i gnas yin/ de ni sems dang /
60a4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni ma byung ba'i gnas yin/ de ni rnam par nges pa'i gnas yin/ de ni yid byung bar ma byas pa'i gnas yin pas/ de'i phyir mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de'i phyir ro /
60a5(dkon brtsegs): bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes smon to// de nas lha'i bu
60a6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di ltar ji tsam du khyod chos zab mo'i gnas dag ston par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gis khyod la bgyis pa
60a7(dkon brtsegs): gzo bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod byas pa gzo bar ma byed cig/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci bgyis pa mi gzo bar bgyi'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
60b1(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu khyod byas pa mi gzo bar byos la/ byas pa gzo bar ma byed cig/ sna'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod bgyis pa mi gzo ba lags sam/ 'jam dpas kyis smras pa
60b2(dkon brtsegs): bu de de bzhin te/ kho ba ni byas pa mi gzo ba yin gyi/ byas pa gzo ba ma yin no// skra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad gron/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ skra'i bu byis pa rnams
60b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pas nA/ byis pa rnams ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gi byed pa po ste/ gang gi phyir lnga ba'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa gzo ba zhes bya'o//
60b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dag ni bya ba 'am/ mi bya ba gang yang mi byed de/ gang gi tshe mi byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa mi gzo ba zhes bya'o// ji skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ lhag par byed pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' la/ gzhan len par yang mi byed/ bya ba gzhan yang mi
60b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pas mnyam pa nyid yin no zhes gsungs pas na/ de'i phyir byas pa mi gzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod bzod pa 'am/ 'on te chos nyid dam/ gang la gnas
60b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzod pa la'ang ma yin/ chos nyid la'ang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na khyod gang la gnas te de skad ston/ 'jam
61a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas pa la'o// skra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas/ 'jam dpal gyis
61a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu rgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus ni de bzhin nyid gang la gnas pa de la gnas so// lha'i bu gzhan yang de skad ces khyod bzod pa 'am/ 'on te chos nyid dam/ gang la gnas te de skad ston
61a3(dkon brtsegs): ces zer ba ni/ lha'i bu bzod pa zhes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming la ni gnas par mi nus so// chos nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rtog pa med pa ste/ de la'ang gnas med do// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs
61a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can thams cad gang la gnas te smon par byed pa de nyid la bzhugs te ston par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te ston la/ sems can
61a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro//
61a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi na/ ji tsam gyis na dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi
61a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze'ang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams la'ang mi chags/ gzun
61b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs med pa'i khams la'ang mi chags pa de ni dge slong yin no zhes lo bo lnga zhing / sa'i bu gang mig las mi 'dzag/ na pa las mi 'dzag/ snga las mi 'dzag/ lce las mi 'dzag
61b2(dkon brtsegs): lus las mi 'dzag/ yid las mi 'dzag pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo sprul/ lha'i bu gang la gnas pa med cing / gnas par gdags pa med pa dang / kun tu gnas pa med cing / na
61b3(dkon brtsegs): du gnas par gdags pa med pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir dang / sna'i bu gang las kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro la/ rma med cing ma dang bral ba de ni bram ze yin zhes kho ba su
61b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze'ang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i bstan pa de ni de yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub
61b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi bsgoms pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa de dag da rung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas/ gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gnas
61b6(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon pa gsar pa dang / ma gsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsad pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran zhing / de dag la las kyi rnam par
61b7(dkon brtsegs): smin pa de'i las kyi lhag ma yod pas/ de dag sems yongs su gdung ba des chos zab mo dag la mi bzod cing / bdag nyid la rten cing rnam par rtog pa kho nar byed de/ de dag gis 'di lta ste/ chos
62a1(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa ma thob pas/ kun nas sdang ba de rnam par gnon par ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gdul ba'i
62a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang gi phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems bsdu bar mdzad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ lag pa g.yas
62a3(dkon brtsegs): pas ral gri blangs te legs par bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su brgyugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
62a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal nga ni bsang zin cing legs par gsang zin gyis thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal skyes bu gang zag gis gang gi tshe bsad do snyam pa'i sems skyed par byed pa'i sems skyes
62a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yun ring po nas bsang zin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma spa bu ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can/
62a6(dkon brtsegs): nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do// 'di la pha'ang med/ ma'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ chos kyang med/ dge 'dun yang
62a7(dkon brtsegs): med do// 'di la gang mtshams med pa byed par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ yid gzhungs pa
62b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsgom/ bsngags pa/ zab mo la bzod pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa
62b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa yin na/ de mtshon rnon po thogs
62b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der rgyug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de skad ces/ 'jam dpal nga ni ngasang zin cing legs par bsar zin gyis thong zhig ces gsungs pa'i phyir ce/
62b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / pa zhes bya ba dang / ma zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba'i chos ther zug tu gnas pa
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par gyur na ni/ mtshams med pa 'dzin pa de la nges par 'byung ba'ang yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir chos de dag ni med la/ log pa yang dag pa ma yin par
62b6(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba/ spong pa sgyu ma lnga bu yin pa de'i phyir 'di la gang byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de
62b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis de ltar shes pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ha la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ mngon par
63a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gis mngon par song / sa na sgyums bus/ yongs sna chog papa mas bskyed/ 'dis thas pam
63a2(dkon brtsegs): chim te// rlom 'di thams cad spong pa lags// bdag tu 'du shes mongs pa rnams/ log par yongs su rtog par cing// dzin gyi mam ni ming zang pa'o// zugalas babying par yang d+han// na rabs
63a3(dkon brtsegs): snga ma rnams su ni// pha ma sbyin gnas bkum gyur cing // dge slong dgra bcom dkum pa yin// sugre las shin su mi bzang bgyis// sug las de yi rnam smin gyis// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong gyur cing /
63a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyor pa skyes par gyur pa ni// chos thos pas na rnam dag gyur// grags chen zug rngu 'byin pa yis// bdag cag 'gyod pa gsal mdzad pas// gang la nyon mongs ma mchis pa'i// chos dbyings rjes su rtogs par
63a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur// sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa ste// thub pa las kyi mkhyen pa mnga'// thabs des sems can thams cad kyi// 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par bsal// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na// 'di las sangs rgyas
63a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang yang // dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di la ni// pha ma ma mchis dgra bcom min// 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te// 'gum pa 'ga' yang mchis ma lags// mnyam nyid ji bzhin 'byung ba ste// de ni chos rnams
63a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid lags// 'jam dbyangs shes rab chen po pa// chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis// mtshon cha rnon po thogs nas ni// sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs// sangs rgyas ji bzhin mtshon de bzhin/
63b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gnyis ka mtshan nyid gcig/ mi rtse 'byung ba ma mchis te// 'dil dbum pa 'ga' ma mchis// mchod rdzogs pa'i chos kyinamagrangs 'di da shang ban/ phyogs bcu'i dngas rgyas kyi ning na'i rlung ma
63b2(dkon brtsegs): gleng dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / sa chen po g.yos pa'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sa sangs kyis bcom ldan
63b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis ngog sa chen po g.yos pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ sangs
63b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
63b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba chos ston mo// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjeng de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des
63b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lnga rtse/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ shes rab kyi ral gri'i mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal ba de logs su bcugs so// de nas
63b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang sems can dpag tu med pa dag mig rnam par dag pa dang / sems rnam par grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes pa dang / byang chub
64a1(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs par gyur pa de sa de ltar chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang 'khor de na sems can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa mang ba gang dag 'a'od
64a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gis mtshon de mi mthong zhing / chos bstan pa de'ang mi thos pa de lhar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
64a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis smon par grongs pa'i phyir/ btul ba'i las mi bzad pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyod la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin
64a4(dkon brtsegs): no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kho bos las mi bzad pa de lta bu ni byas na/ de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de lnga mod kyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i las gang du rnam
64a5(dkon brtsegs): par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thams cad kyang me rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// /
64a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de btsun pa nyid la dris/ khyod ji ltar bzod pa de ltar sbron cig/ btsun pa mtshom dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal re ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
64a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa las dmigs su yod rngam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rnam par smin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/
64b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de mam yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshon yang med/ las kyang meng / rnam par smin pa'ang med na/ 'o na las de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ shArin
64b2(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsam pa des bstan pa lhur na/ las de ni gang du'ang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad las med pa/ rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir/
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
64b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sumachi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de skar thugs brje bas spros par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang
64b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag je rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi
64b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bltas so// bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan pa'ang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs
64b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug cing / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri ba la chos ston pa dang / de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de sbed dang / lha'i bu 'dus
65a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de sbed kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yol la/ thams cad du'ang de bzhin nye bar smon pa ni/
65a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar to// ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' re dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag 'din sde/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan/
65a3(dkon brtsegs): ni sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir stan las kyang mi g.yo la/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang smon par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par bslabs pa'ang sgyu ma sa
65a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du de bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyed du sprul pa dag sprul par byed do// re ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyir ro//
65a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni chos
65a6(dkon brtsegs): dang dge 'dun 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam
65a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches pa dang / byang chub
65b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing po la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni 'ang ba yin no// 'jas dpal kyis gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de la lags te/ de ni spong pa nyid yin pa na pa ba lags so// dmatshanam mamachis par+sa/
65b2(dkon brtsegs): swa ba de sar 'dra ba lags so// ngani smon pa ma mchis pa'i rdzab de na 'arba ba lags so// de ni de bzhin zhing ji smra ba de sar 'dra ba lags so/ rini chos kyi dbyings jis pa sam 'dra ba lags so// de ni
65b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de sngar 'dra ba lags so// de ni mnyam pa nyid jin pa de sngar 'dra ba lags so// de ni rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni dben pa ji ska ba re lur 'dra ba lags so//
65b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i rus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod
65b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rnalam du zag par 'gyur ba resar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas de'i tshe grong gsum gyi srong chen po'i 'jig can gyi lam
65b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing / shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs dag rab tu rgyas la lpags par gyur ro// rdzing bu dag
65b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang pad+ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ nyi ma rang zla ba 'di dag
66a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi sdang bar gyur to/ sa bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgul mi rangs te/ phreng gi bar lda du la 'ayod nas me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bengs shing /
66a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i char dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// sil sman dag kyang rab tu bsil zhing / lha'i glu dbyangs mang po rag kyang bsgrags nas/ thams cad kyis thal
66a3(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud de/ kha mthun par tshig 'di skad ces/ a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/ a la la chos a la la chos 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba'ang
66a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // sems can gang dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas
66a5(dkon brtsegs): skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la skrag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gso//
66a6(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du rdza ltas 'di dag byung ba las na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam rapas
66a7(dkon brtsegs): re de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga lhas byung ba 'di dag yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs mang du gsos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsumal
66b2(dkon brtsegs): bden nas/ rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na myong par gyur cig 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ba
66b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa dang / shed las skyes pa ma mchis pa dang / shed bu ma mchis
66b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tham na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom
66b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang /
66b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis pa dang / sgru ba ma mchis pa dang / srid pa ma mchis pa dang / srid pa yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / lus su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / sems ma mchis
66b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa ma mchis pa dang / dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang / gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / zhe
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / mig ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rna ba ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / snga ma mchis pa dang / dri ma mchis pa dang / kye ma mchis pa dang / ro ma mchis
67a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / reg bya ma mchis pa dang / yid ma mchis pa dang / chos ma mchis pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs kyi khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma
67a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / chad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus snga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
67a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs
67a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang /
67b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jig pa rnams ma mchis pa dang / ye shes ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis
67b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon sum du gyi ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis
67b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang / thar pa ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis
67b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ming du gdags pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya bla ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden
67b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma gyur/ ma grol/ mi sbyor/ mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig res chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na
67b6(dkon brtsegs): spyong bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga'
67b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma bkrol/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma bsres/ ma bshig/ chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed/ ma bkag/ rnam par ma bshig/ sa spyod
68a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan
68a2(dkon brtsegs): zla bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur/ 'gog par mi 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/
68a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol/ yongs su mya ngan las mi zlo/ de dag
68a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes/ mi 'jig/ chos 'ga' yang mi sgying/ mi 'gog/ rnam par mi 'jig/ mi skyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i
68a5(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la cung zad kyang ma smras/ ma brjod/ ma bshad/ ma bstan/ ma brtags/ ma
68a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngags ma bskang/ ma sngos/ ma bzlas shing / chos bu sman pa 'di la yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la/ chos bstan pa 'dig gis kyang ma mnyana'aga' yang zhan par mi 'gyur/ 2
68a7(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam par thos par mi 'gyur ba'i dngang ba dang / bden pa'i tshigangs chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sum man 'angs bu'i thing na myar bar gyur cig bcom ldan 'dis 'dasas
68b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas ma mchis pa dang / shes
68b2(dkon brtsegs): rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus snga brgya tha man 'dzam bu'i gling na myong bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rtsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims srung
68b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyid/ bzod pa sgrub par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams sgom par mi bgyid/ shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/ byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid yang dag
68b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chub thob par mi bgyid/ stobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/ mi 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang po rnam thob par mi bgyid// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
68b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar mi bgyid/ sems can rgol bar mi dgyid/ smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na
68b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/ de nas de'i tshe srong gsum gyi grong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
69a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni ga lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
69a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi gyur na/ ma legs kyis thong zhig/ de skad ces
69a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi rmad
69a4(dkon brtsegs): dugashad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhis bstan te/ thams cad du'ang 'jam
69a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus so// byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
69a6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' smras pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskas pa grangs med pa phrag 'dus 'das pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me sog mngon par/
69a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa se ge'i rgyas gyi mon can phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam zangs 'di thos so// chos kyinamagrangs 'di ba shang pa na sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag srin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
69b1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems skyes so// de'i nyis 'gyur sbed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob po// de'i nyis 'gyur steng ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go
69b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
69b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / gnas bcan 'od srungs chen po dang / zhwa dang / mi dang / sgra ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
69b4(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 'dus pa sum cu rtsa drug pa
69b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa bzhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa bam po bzhi
69b6(dkon brtsegs): sh+lo ka spong nyis brgya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sing ha pa ri prits+tsha na ma ma hA yA na sA tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
69b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo'i mang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dnga'athams cad sa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di gang bdag gis thos pa dus gcog na / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i lab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ris pa rig slong thong ni
70a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/ thams cad mkhyen cing
70a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzigs// rgyal ba'i gang zag mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi bu// seng ge zhes ni grags pa zhig/ tshong dpon bu mo lnga brgya yis// mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu// rgyal po'i
70a3(dkon brtsegs): khab nas de byung nas// rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po yis// gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas// zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lnga brgya po yis gdugs
70a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag/ tshang bar thub pa che la phul// kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni// de dag mi 'jigs skyes gyur nas// seng ges thal mo sbyar byas te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa
70a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang // de ni dran par bdag la gsungs// gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags// gang gis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa chen pos lung bstan
70a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de dag lhag pas ma ye shes kyis/ mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyong gang zhes/ khyod kyis dris pa de bstan to// bzod pa yi ni mdzes par 'gyur/ tshangs par
70a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyang bas rdzus te bye// chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran/ gzhon nu ngesar shes par gyis/ gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtsham dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu dang // gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing /
70b1(dkon brtsegs): de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa kun gyi mtshan du 'gyur/ byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang // sems can kun la sems mnyam pas/ rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur
70b2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur// gang gis ting 'jim skyes 'gyur lags// gzung ba'i tshig zhu gang gis 'gyur// thub pa chen po bstan du gsol// chos la bzod pas gzungs rnams 'thob
70b3(dkon brtsegs): sems snyoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye// bkyil pa'i tshig rnams spang byas na// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa ji skar blo gros ldan// ji ltar chos spyor cu
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bsags// skyes bu dam pa mA khas cis 'gyur// g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur// don la sems pa blo gros ldan// gus dang bcas pas chos spyor 'gyur/ chos kyi mtshan cing rtogs pa mchi
70b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// las gang gis ni rtse bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du// zhu ba zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis chos kyi sbyin pa la// nam yang bar chad mi byed
70b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de ni des na myur rab tu// 'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur// gang gis mi 'o ma spong bar 'gyur// gang gis bzang 'gro mchi 'gyur lags// skye ba kun tu bye ba na/ bag mchis par ni ji ltar
70b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// ngad pas mi lom spong bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro// stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na// rtag tu bag rang ldan par 'gyur// thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
71a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur// ji ltar bdud kyis sgras mi thogs// ji ltar chos kyis 'phongs 'gyur spong // rnam par grol bas las rnams 'dag/ brtson
71a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur// ci smras de bzhin byed pas ni// chos kyis 'phongs pa spong bar 'gyur// ka la bing ka'i sgra sran dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji ltar 'gyur/
71a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi// sems can rnams ni gang gis dga'// bden par smras pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ngag rtsub spangs pas sgra snyan 'gyur// bkyal pa'i tshig dang phra ma rnams//
71a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags// bro nang nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyer 'gyur//
71a5(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur// mi 'tshe bas ni nang nyung 'gyur// mi mthun pa dag bsdums byas na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi byed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags//
71a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba der// dbang cher grags pa ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams 'grug/ ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phes/
71a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du skye ba der/ phrag dog med pas dbang cher grags/ ji ltar lha yi mig 'thob 'gyur/ rtsa yirna pa'i slar thob// sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag 'dren ma gang gis 'tshal bar/
71b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ mar me sbyin pas mig 'thob 'gyur/ ros mo'i sgra yis rna ba dag/ 'chi pho skye shes ye shes kyis// debs des ma grub par 'gyur/ 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi/
71b2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur// tshe rabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags// rdzu 'phrus ci yis thob par 'gyur// bzhon pa sbyin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob// dran pa bsgoms pas rjes su dram
71b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs byas na// zag pa zad pas reg par 'gyur// gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs// cis na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur// sa
71b4(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcur lhang nger ganga'// smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing // bsru bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// 'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas// phyogs bcur lhang rer snang bar 'gyur/
71b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni// chos gang gis ni thob par 'gyur// gang dang gang du skyes pa der// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba thob// sems can thams cad thar pa'i phyir/ byung
71b6(dkon brtsegs): chub don du sems btung bas// des na chos rnams bsdu ba'ang 'thob// des ni dga' ba'ang 'thob par 'gyur// bslab pa ci 'dra bslabs pa dang // sems ni ci 'dra bsgoms pa yis// thub pa
71b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod 'dra ba'i// ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad sa// mnam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang // mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na// tham/
72a1(dkon brtsegs): cang zil gnod rgyal bar 'gyur// skye ba kun du byang chub sems mims na yang sems de ni/ 'dor mi 'gyur namathas mo thos ci 'chal bar gang gis gyur
72a2(dkon brtsegs): grong dang grong khyer rnams su 'am// gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/ byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud// des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar yang // ji ltar spobs ni cher
72a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang // rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / bdud rnams bye bas tshugs mi 'gyur// 'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing // skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/ gang dang gang du skyes par yang /
72a4(dkon brtsegs): des na spobs ni char 'gyur te// rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang // bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba re// 'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du// lung bsun ma 'a
72a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas su// sa rig ming ni dag par gyur// seng ge grogs dang na cig tu/ 'di gad kyi ni drig smra te/ myong ba bstan pa 'dis ni// bag cagardzas su 'thas par gyi// demam pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'dzu mdzad // grong gsum po yang gcom gyur nas// ma pham pas ni sangs rnas sa/ ci zhig thang du 'dus mdza ga// rdzu chen lung brtan gsos zhes zas/ de ga cu bcus
72a7(dkon brtsegs): padang // ma rnam pas sangs rgyas kyis/ 'dzid ces nig 'grus so// gang gi tshor ni dzum mangs/ sa pa mang las 'di mad cig gsangs rgyas bye ba kyang cu dang // gnas
72b1(dkon brtsegs): drig phrag bcu la/ byang chub don du 'dus nas ni// mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gnyis mchog mar me mdzad pa chun changad du/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams/
72b2(dkon brtsegs): nga yis yongs su smin par byas// snang ba che zhes bya ba yi// bskal pa chen po 'byung 'gyur te// de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste// ye shes tog gi rgyas mtsham nas/
72b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig can 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi dkod pa sbyar// de dag gi yang de 'dun 'gyur// byams pa nas ni bzung nas su// danal ba sum rgya chang bar ni// de yi bar du du
72b4(dkon brtsegs): kud du// cag tu sangs rgyas phred par 'gyur// 'di dag byang chub thob pa yi// ming ni gang sus thos pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig nyid du// kun mkhyen gang bag mtshungs med 'gyur//
72b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas// mos pa skyed par byed pa ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na// de dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// gang gis bskas pa drug spong du/
72b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas// byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa pas// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug
72b7(dkon brtsegs): maM/ sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis// grangs dang char yang mi bong ngo // chos 'di bshad pa'i chen ni/ 'jig cen mgon po'i mthu yis ni/ sa rnams mi ga char ba 'a'angs
73a1(dkon brtsegs): sasung po yang g.yos par gyur/ me gzigs dang bcas y-is mngon pa dges nas/ nga cag na pa sa
73a2(dkon brtsegs): de kun gyis ni ting 'dzin thob// zang mi shes kyi gzungs kyang thob// sems can rnams kyi don byed de// sangs rgyas chos la 'jud par byed/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba ldan pa na// sems
73a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sras nas// seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang // s+ya dang / mri dang / lha ma yin dang / dri ba
73a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskong ngo // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa yas/ 'phags pa
73a5(dkon brtsegs): seng ges zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur/

74a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas su us sa du smras

79b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor byar 'khor bar byab sa bdag gisems sum par mi b+h+ya/ 'jigs par myeH/ snyems smras par ma~M D+hA/ yongs su brdu bar ma
79b5(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba re lha de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di'ang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing / phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang
79b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed ngo // rigs kyi bu yongs su bcag pa nye bar gzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu thu
79b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i zhes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na'ang / thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o// de skad ces
80a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji skar na
80a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so so thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na/ bskal pa
80a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
80a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa
80a5(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang // khams dang / kye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
80a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshag/ ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rnas pa med cing sangs rgyas kyis
80a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i skas pa med de// de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gso//
80b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can thams cad kyi smon pa lags te/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs sum chung ba'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de/
80b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong gis nyes pa byung ba mthong na bcab par mi bya bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smos shig ces bka' stsal
80b3(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na/ grong khyer gzhan zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog
80b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med gcig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de bdag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan
80b5(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po ma lon par de nas de'i modo la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog
80b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sem
80b7(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pas bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam mam/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
81a1(dkon brtsegs): bkun dga' ba 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' gas pa'i chos dang ldan pa rji TI/ den tshangs na bku 'angs
81a2(dkon brtsegs): yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su
81a3(dkon brtsegs): glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pas nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yongs su gzung du
81a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du
81a5(dkon brtsegs): shes ma skyed cig/ kun dga' bo 'di sa ste/ dper mnyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba la bar chad med par
81a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing / dga' ba dang /
81a7(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
81b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa ni dkon mchog gsum po'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
81b2(dkon brtsegs): ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral
81b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtsa ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa
81b4(dkon brtsegs): yin par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang gis phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyas po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa las nyon cig/ kun dga' bo bung med
81b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel bar gyur kya
81b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/ gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug
81b7(dkon brtsegs): pa na 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi
82a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo 'das pa dang / snga dro'i dus kyi tshe shem thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod kyi zong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyor chen por/
82a3(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ sring mo de'i khyim gal ba der zhugs nas/ nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'jig
82a4(dkon brtsegs): des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khor do// 'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi
82a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ de na byis pa'i spyod yum yin/ 'dod la sred pa spangs byas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bo de nas sring mo nges tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas// dga' ba dang
82a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ khri de las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gang sangs rgyas
82a7(dkon brtsegs): smad pa dag/ slan chad don du gnyer mi bgyid// 'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas// mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chag//
82b1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun la sman slad du// bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa skyed// kun dga' bos de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag
82b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas/ bstan las langs te song ngo // kun dga'
82b3(dkon brtsegs): bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bo nga ni sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu/
82b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
82b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na'ang sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to// kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor
82b6(dkon brtsegs): gang bzung na log par srung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das rje
82b7(dkon brtsegs): gangs la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsud pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par gyilas kyi
83a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung
83a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang /
83a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma legs so snyam du sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
83a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang
83a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ldan par mi 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa
83a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'das
83a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag tu tshangs par srung ba sbyang nas/ delo ba ni khri nyis sdong po de 'das pa dang / rgyas pa'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so// nga grongs khyer chen po der zhugs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo cig gis bram pa'i
83b1(dkon brtsegs): khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de mthong nas/ de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so//
83b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma nges bu mo ngal 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod ci 'dod des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u lo mo ni khyong 'tshal lo// des de la 'di
83b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// sring mo la po ni 'dod pa rnams don du gcer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye ru gal te khyong dang ldan cig tu
83b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lha na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas
83b5(dkon brtsegs): deng brtul zhugs bshig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas/ gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje chen po skyes
83b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis brtu la zhugs bshig ste/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhing / bu mo 'di
83b7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de nas phyir log ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung ste/ de la 'di skad ces
84a1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// bzang mo longs shig dang / kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u kar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon
84a2(dkon brtsegs): par byung sde/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngo'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa desas
84a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi bal+la'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to// shAkya'i bu mos
84a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ma de ni nga'i tshe de'i dus mchongs dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ba bsnyil cing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig
84a6(dkon brtsegs): rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la khros/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes ngam pa la 'di skad sa kyu' sngam so// rigs kyi bu gas te dge slong
84a7(dkon brtsegs): shAri'i bu dang / mazums kyi bung mamangs samangs payin par gyur nani// radam ngozhigasapa'angamams cand myal bar 'gro bar mi gyur ro/ ci'i phyi chen la kyi su ma ma na pamal
84b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba'i chos smra ba zhig byang bar gyur/
84b2(dkon brtsegs): de dgon pa'i phug cig na gnas so// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong snga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing / char chen po bab par gyur to// de nas dung
84b3(dkon brtsegs): med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bslab pa'i phyir dge slong dri meng gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/ phug de nas phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de
84b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/ e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas/
84b5(dkon brtsegs): tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de'i tshe sdang gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la
84b6(dkon brtsegs): la bdun sring tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par byed pas ni phreng gi bar sna
84b7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag sngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so// rigs kyi bu
85a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar sdungad la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na mi/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen/
85a2(dkon brtsegs): por lhung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
85a3(dkon brtsegs): blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /
85a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka'ang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs
85a5(dkon brtsegs): des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu
85a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di sgra ste/ dper na smad 'tshong ma spu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni/ de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su btang zhing dag
85a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de lha de ltar gnas par byed do// de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu ni de la mi \u0f7f
85b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sems par spongs par byed cing / de gni las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig cam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du// rigs kyi bu byung chub sems dpa' thabs sa mkhas pa'ang thabs
85b2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pa 'i sra ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing / de dag la yo byad rnams
85b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mi bri bar byed do// sems can rnams kyi dge bra la dga' bas/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi yo byangs dga' bas ni ma yin no// gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di
85b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur pa dag se/ 'di dag gis phyir yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes nas ni/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la mi phra bar spangs
85b5(dkon brtsegs): ce/ 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med kyang myu gu 'byung
85b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skal ba ni med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi
85b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na/ de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sangs
86a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sde/ dper na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad
86a2(dkon brtsegs): las dri snom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang / gang la'ang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing / de dag las dri dang / 'dab ma dang / sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par
86a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa de bzhin du / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par byang ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par
86a4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang / de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi srid pa skyed par yang mi byed la bdag kyang smras par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smras par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu
86a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di na ste/ dper man pa shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srang bu gtsigs gzan ma btags te/ mchis pa byas nas/ mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// da srang bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po/
86a6(dkon brtsegs): des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho chen po nas mchis pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
86a7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug
86b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi
86b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta sde/ dper na skyes bu rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni/ rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang / de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i na
86b3(dkon brtsegs): na rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs
86b4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing / de dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang / de gang gi tshe 'dod
86b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i tshe na shes rab kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad
86b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bcang de// de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bsgrubs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa
86b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig thogs te/ 'gron pa mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na/ sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje ba dang / brnyas pa'i
87a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzhu'ang med/ ral gri'ang med/ dong ba'ang med/ 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'gron pa 'di dag bsgral par mi nus
87a2(dkon brtsegs): te ra/ 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ 'gron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'a
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par son te/ chom rkun pa'i tshogs skyugs par gyur pa na mnga' gzhu thogs te/ go cha smra ba bgos nas/ mtshon
87a4(dkon brtsegs): cha de gzas te chos rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas/ yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
87a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba
87a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chung ba de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe/ de dag de la ma dad pa dang /
87a7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing bdud kyi
87b1(dkon brtsegs): rje bam par byed par sdug la 'gyur te// de ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi legs
87b2(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su zin pa ni/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral zhing rab tu gtubs nas shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang
87b3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa dga' byed ces
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mtshan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnan mod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na tshong dpom nig gi khyim du phyin pa dang / tshong dpon des
87b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyugs chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des dge slong de'i skad thos nas/ bsod snyoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed
87b6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ngo // de nas bu so dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis/ dpe byad las byang
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang / sgra skad dang / kha dog gi mtshan ma bzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis kun nas bzang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su
88a1(dkon brtsegs): gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas/ lus rgyas par gyur nas/ 'bre bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to//
88a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lha ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/
88a3(dkon brtsegs): yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig la chags sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa
88a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ sems pa med pa 'dus byas pa/ rim pa bdun pa sha'i ri lu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ sems par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do// rna ba dang /
88a5(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / phag pa dang / mdog dang / sha'ang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad klad pa man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na/ nang dang phyi rol na gang chags
88a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'am/ ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so// des ma dmigs nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur cing / des sems kyis
88a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la
88b1(dkon brtsegs): tal bdun sring tsam du mngon par 'phags te mnyan mod kyi mong khyer chen po la san bdun bskor ba byas nas/ nam mkha' de nyid las rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshul gas pa dang / bcom thams/
88b2(dkon brtsegs): gal ba der song ngo // / bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed phreng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyas
88b3(dkon brtsegs): po skar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsangs pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed phreng
88b4(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan
88b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la bachen sa chos thams cad yongs su btsam pas/ bdud kyi rje brtul cing chos kyi 'khor mo rab tu bskor to//
88b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing / sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha rnams da
88b7(dkon brtsegs): skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thag tu del rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gnas med yang dpag chad bcu gnyis pa'ang byung bar gyur/ de'i rim gro byed pa'i bzhin bkur ma lha'i bum ma
89a1(dkon brtsegs): 'i slong sa bar gnas par gyur to/ de'i mongs des bdag gis las kyi zhig byas shing bsags pa sku 'dir skyes par byung ga cu ma dung / de d+hI rnam
89a2(dkon brtsegs): radag mim ma myod kyi thong rgya chen nga dzi ma bum gyu snyas sa sa
89a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing bad/
89a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'byor pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa'ang skyes par gyur to// de nas sku'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi
89a5(dkon brtsegs): sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing / bsnyen bkur
89a6(dkon brtsegs): byas na sgra smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod cing bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing ma
89a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu de 'khor
89b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / smos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'byed ga la ba der/
89b2(dkon brtsegs): song nas/ kha dog shin tu 'phags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshas snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
89b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug phug por
89b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab// bde gshegs rnams
89b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab// grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur// tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi// mdzes shing
89b7(dkon brtsegs): thog mar phyugs chung gyur pa lags/ pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams// sangs rgyas sras po smang bar ma gyur pa// mthu chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang lags pa// bsod snyoms
90a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis// skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas// bdag cag sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni/
90a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa// dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis// mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang // ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te/
90a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te ji ltar bsam bzhin ma mjal na// srog la mi lha 'gum pa'i dus bgyid snyam// tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas// de la bkal mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang /
90a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms stsos pa'i rdo yang ma thogs nas// rdul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur// bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe// skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te/
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas// bdag gis 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob// rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi// gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing //
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha yi bu ma ni// khri dang bzhi spong tshang ba'ang byung bar gyur// bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni// sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba// rjes su
90a7(dkon brtsegs): dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid/ chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas/
90b1(dkon brtsegs): sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des// ngan bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na// gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te// gang la/
90b2(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug 'gyur ba// de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags// ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang /
90b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gad+hA'i bye snyed snar dgyi bar/ bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la// chos kyi mchong ba mchog gis mchod par bgyi// gang dag
