90b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur/ bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas// de
90b5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'jigs med skyes pa 'thob 'gyur ba// byang chub snang mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi// lus rdul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni// bu mo'i pha mcho nges 'debs byed cing // dge sbyong de yis
90b6(dkon brtsegs): byang snyems byas snyam ste// ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod// sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi bu de ni// song nas pha ma dag la tshig smras pa// dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed//
90b7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring sdug bsngal 'grub par ma byed cig/ bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de// sum cu rtsa gsum skal ba mnam gyur cing // des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te// de ni/
91a1(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bu pho 'od gsal gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar khyed deng la/ khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di shogs shig/ sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs
91a2(dkon brtsegs): par sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan meng // 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas/ pha ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas spa thos nas// nye ru tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs
91a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur// mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// khro ba'i sems kyi zhes pa bshags byas nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas
91a4(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bde gshegs rang byung la ni zhu zhus pa/ ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de yi lan ni stsal du gsom/ thos
91a5(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags// rgyal bas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas// 'jig chen mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa/
91a6(dkon brtsegs): de yis brtan par byang chub sems steng cig bu mo'i pha dang ma dang ne du ni// lnga brgya tshang ba rung ba ma yin pas// sdes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos nas// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bcan
91a7(dkon brtsegs): par bskyed/ rgyal ba kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa/ kun dag 'jim bshad pa 'di 'on cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba bsam las te/ shes rab thabs la mkhas nga'ang de ni
91b1(dkon brtsegs): mo dga' byed smon 'am sang dang sang 'debs pa/ bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas/ de dag myur du byes bu 'jig ci shog dung
91b2(dkon brtsegs): med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa// de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur// kun dga' 'dod chags
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyed pa gang gis ni/ sems can gnan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing // skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos// kwa'i bu gang gis sa
91b4(dkon brtsegs): mchong byas te/ gus dang bcas pas byang chub mcho ga zhugs pa// des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas// rgyal pa brdzun mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur// rdza brgya gang dag kyang chub chugs gyur ba//
91b5(dkon brtsegs): dengang mi mtshag rnams su 'byung 'gyur bas/ yang sa dang byas pa de ba bsam mas pa'i// 'jig canamagon la su nig sus mi byed// gang ga pon mangs rnams kyang ba byinan// gang dag sus
91b6(dkon brtsegs): byed nges kyi smos pa/ grags cheng blan gyi rgyal pos bu yi byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa su ldang byed / de ma com ldan 'das la tsho dang ldan pas dga' bos 'di sa kyi
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// na pabacom ldan 'das 'di sa ste// dper bgyin/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ ngang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am
92a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang las dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na// de dag thams cad 'di na ste/ gser gyi 'dog gcig par 'gyur/
92a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar
92a3(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na'ang / de dag thams cad 'di lta ste// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems
92a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de slan chang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
92a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ rang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna
92a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis thebs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sem
92a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i blo/
92b1(dkon brtsegs): nang rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsas pa/ kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ legs so lags sornam
92b2(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bya ba byen no// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma tsho dang ldan pa 'od grangs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das glang gi srang du byang chub sems
92b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dor ba'i khams na'ong kun tu gda' ba
92b4(dkon brtsegs): dang spong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
92b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la'ang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po'ang kun tu skyed par bgyid la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la'ang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan
92b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
92b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad srung bar bgyid cing 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang /
93a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la chags par yang myi 'gyur bya dag ming su la mkhas pa zlasam gyis mi khya pa la gnas pa lags s+ho/ btsun pa so na 'dus pa / zung chubs sa /
93a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ rang 'ga' zhig brjod par spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa stobs lags so// com ldan 'das kyis ka' byas pa/ 'od srus
93a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod spobs par byis shig/ 'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin 'brog dgon pa chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa cheng
93a4(dkon brtsegs): de la'ang ming pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i rab mchis par gyur cing 'brog dgon pa chen po deng yang phyog chags 'bum thag du me zhig zhugs par gyur la/ 'drog dpon pa chen po la'ang chab po mang ce/
93a5(dkon brtsegs): cig mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang hA cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ gtsang ba/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ rtse bo dang mi mang pos kun tu gtams pa
93a6(dkon brtsegs): thams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de sa'ang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / gang dag zong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur ba de dag ni dga' ba dang / 'dum pa ma
93a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de na'ang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing de'i g.yas g.yon na chu 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yangs chen po dag kyang
93b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis par gyur la de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas/ sems can mkhas pa/ zhib pa/ glo ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du 'gyur bar 'tshal ba
93b2(dkon brtsegs): sman par 'tshal ba/ bde bar 'tshal ba grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba sman par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/ des 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di
93b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces/ kye grogs po dag kho bo ni khyed cag gi yongs su skyob pa yin te/ 'grog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang yang mi ring ba na/ grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba
93b4(dkon brtsegs): legs pa thams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni/ rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhing / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
93b5(dkon brtsegs): na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par yang 'gyur bas sems can shes pa dang ldan pa dag tshur shog/ grong khyer chen po der 'dong ngo zhes sgra bsgrags
93b6(dkon brtsegs): shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/ de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'gyur ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi
93b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo bar gdams shis rjes su bstan pa de'ang 'tshal la/ bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na mchis pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchis lags so//
94a1(dkon brtsegs): sa gu ga du smrasas su sa
94a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu nga sa sa sa
94a3(dkon brtsegs): san
94a4(dkon brtsegs): ma sa mas pa'i gsu smra pa /
94a5(dkon brtsegs): sa sa pa tsa gnas pa sa ma ga ngas
94a6(dkon brtsegs): pa chis pa thas ma shAn gyu pa myo sa
94a7(dkon brtsegs): nga / 'jigs su rung ba bams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur / zing byar ma gru sa ma sa dang/ dun pa dang / yon mtshachis pa sa
94b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du/ chos ston par yang bgyid pa zhig mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de
94b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni 'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i tshig
94b3(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas lags so//
94b4(dkon brtsegs): 'brog dgon pa chen po la'ang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lags so// skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can
94b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las
94b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi g.yo la/ grong khyer gyi yon tan yang 'tshal ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can rgya chen po la mos pa'i tshig 'di skad ces
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can bsod/
95a1(dkon brtsegs): #nams chung ngu sgra de nan cing thos nas kyang dang pa mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ gzhan mu thugs can spyod pa pa dang / kun sa tu dag gi tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog nganan
95a2(dkon brtsegs): mchen po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba jis pa de bzhin du ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa khas par bgyi lags so// mthogang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul
95a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ji rtsa ba de bzhin du ni/ chos kyi dbyings pas par bgyi lags so// de'i g.yas g.yon ma thu 'bus tsam mchis pa'i g.yangs chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
95a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par blta bar bgyi lags so// g.yas g.yon gyi g.yang sa de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
95a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lags so// rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi la zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can/
95a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams sdud cing yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi ba dag blta bar bgyi lags so// slang bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa smon pa dag mchi'ang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta bar bgyi lan/ de bzhin du sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun tu spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de
95b1(dkon brtsegs): dgal 'bya ba dang / spong bar gyi ba dag kyang bas par bsti lags so// slar yang mi sa la zhes bgyi ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang sdug pa'i bsam pas sems babyung ba'i tshig rmu dgas
95b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// g.yas g.yon du'ang mi smra bar zhes bgyi ba de ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la mi dga' ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer chen po
95b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi tshig bla dgas lags so// ngi d+ha di zlar mchi bar 'gyur ba de na de skar grong khyer dri mthong bar yang 'gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
95b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrengs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi smod pa dang / ye shes la nges par bgying pa dang // shes
95b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// ji ste ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang
95b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer der zhugs na/ rga ba dang / 'gum pa
95b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bron ma mchis par 'gyur zhing sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid la/ skye ba dang / rgab dang / bro nang dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i sang du
96a1(dkon brtsegs): matsun par sa paci skyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga cos pa yang ngas par rdzogs pa'i rgyas kyi kyi ma sagasas / ca pa du
96a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ye shes dang ldan pa sngags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag kyi
96a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la legs so zhes bya ba b+hin te/ 'od srungs legs so legs so// 'od sbyangs khyod kyis desar byang chub
96a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni/ yang khyod legs te/ 'od srungs khyod kyis dpe brjod pa nges lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri nyis spong gis bla
96a5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa legs par bslabs pa/ yon tan
96a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mi
96a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig kyang mi smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
96b1(dkon brtsegs): semams rnamam sa shes dam pas 'di byur rjes gnam sa// btsun pa chos su ngas/ sa na 'das kyi du / cung rlung sa smra
96b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gzham gdung bar 'gyur ba des du'i tshig mi smra lo gas paka' stsal logs na/ mamaldan 'das 'on ci'i slang du byang chub sems dpa' sti ba gcig gis thogs pa bram de'i
96b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'phreng zhes bgyi bar gyur pa ma/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rabras/ 'di sa ces dge sbyong
96b4(dkon brtsegs): mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dga' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo regs byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
96b5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te gsungs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
96b6(dkon brtsegs): to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshad rab tu rnam par dbye bas khyod ci zhig bya thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
96b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lha de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir
97a1(dkon brtsegs): lo rigs kyi bu de sa mong kyi/ 'on kyang legs par rab su 'on la/ tshul bzhin du myid la zung zhig dang / thabs snyamangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'jug pa zhes bya 'i
97a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// ji skar byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar med mdzad tshun chad duthabs la ma khas
97a3(dkon brtsegs): babasam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de dag las phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
97a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar der/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / brjed pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs
97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
97a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskam
97a7(dkon brtsegs): pa stong gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can
97b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod na bsam bzhin du srid pa len cing 'gro bar yang byed do// de ni thabs sa mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe
97b2(dkon brtsegs): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing / 'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid yongs su skyo ba med par gnas
97b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ byang chub sems
97b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang ni ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi/ de ni lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyan thos ni bdag zhid yongs
97b5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho nar shes par byed kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson bgru
97b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi gcod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na/ snying rje chen po skyed par yang byed de/ de'ang bya
97b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang dag par
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang byed nus mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dzam bu ming
98a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'dzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab par nus so snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas
98a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan
98a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas/ ma'i mngal du ma zhugs shing / mngal gyi dri mas ma reg pa kho mar de'i skad cig de nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang nus
98a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du 'di lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'jig las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang/
98a6(dkon brtsegs): thetshom ste bar 'gyur te/ de dag nim nu ma dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skyes par gyur na can mongs pa yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir chos can par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ rtson 'grus
98a7(dkon brtsegs): rlom par mi bying ngas byang chub sems dpas mang na gnas pa bstan pa'i byin ninam rgyan pazhino// rigs kyi dbyed 'dimam du byang chub pa mas dpa' sa sa kyi sams su tshu sa pa na/
98b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de sngar mi bsa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rtsi gnas na gnas bzhin du/ de la snyoms par
98b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing yongs su bsten nas ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug tu nus mod kyi/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis den de ma mthong ngas
98b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs so snyam du shes par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo gzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / kye ba dang / mngon par
98b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / bka' ba spyod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun tu ston par byed de/ de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
98b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni kun tu rkyong pa gtsang ba yin pas phyir mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i pA la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal
98b6(dkon brtsegs): kar ru bsgyur te/ ma'i mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyang par sna sa
98b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pas na des ni ci nas kyang lha 'am/ mi gzhan gang la'ang med pa de lta bu kho nas mngal du 'jug pa bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
99a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dkur ma yin zhe na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du kye ma gzhon nu 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i rus
99a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma rdzogs pas/ dbang po mtshang bar gyur to snyam du sems dpa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / mngal gyi dus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/
99a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi/ dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas pa na'ang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /
99a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa
99a5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas/ lha'i bu sa ya phrag gnyis dang bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
99a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan brtol te/ mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed ce na/
99a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes pa ma yin no snyam du sems dpa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa'i
99b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma'i mtshan com te/ mangs kyi gnas nas 'byung ba sum su brtson to// byung mthag tu sums mo spu 'phrul gyi lum 'a'ang mamed cing thos mengs byang chub sems dpa' mangs na gnas pa'i
99b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe yum sam sku 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa des bu'i bde ba ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing / sngon nam yang ma myong ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i
99b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang
99b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / grong du btsas na lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gis shin tu 'phags pa'i mchod pa byed par
99b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang brgyags pa dang / bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma
99b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yum gyis shing blag shi'i yal ga la bzung ste// bang ma la ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas she na/
99b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'di snyam du yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni ji lta bur bud med gzhan dag gzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing / byang chub sems dpa' btsas so snyam du sems pa'i sems
100a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi sa tshom bcad pa dang / byed par bcas pa ma bstan par bya ba'i byeng / spyas rgya mo chu ci shing drug ng+gA'i sas gas bdung rgyu/
100a2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas so// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa bcol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing /
100a3(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas nas kyang ma yin/ lus kyi phyogs gzhan dag nas kyang ma yin zhen byang chub sems dpa' ni kun skyong pa gtsang ba dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par
100a4(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ des ni ji ltar sems can dman pa gzhan dag bzhin du ma'i mngal du sbyin cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / btsa'
100a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing / byang chub
100a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mtshan yang rma med cing spos med par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems
100a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bzung la/ mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pas/
100b1(dkon brtsegs): zhwa'i dbang ba rgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas mthag tu gos rin po ches gzung bar bya'o// zhes rlon ston lam btab pa'i phyir/ ngan byung chub sems dpa' ma
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la drug kyang ma yin brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ji ltar gzhan sus kyang sngon ma bskrun pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi brtson 'grus
100b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsa la gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / gom pa bdun bor bas sems can gang dag gi don bya dgos pa de dag gi ngo gom pa drug gis kyang mi
100b5(dkon brtsegs): cho ga la/ brgyad ni lhag par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin te/
100b6(dkon brtsegs): de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun 'dor ba na tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nab
100b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes rjod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu de 'khor de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa dag 'dus par gyur te/
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod la nga rgyal gyis khengs pa de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni ches bla ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems shing / 'dud par
101a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ rab tu 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/ rab tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas na/ des na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs
101a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lha'i bu 'di dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad
101a4(dkon brtsegs): ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin no// nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes sbas te/ tshig gi sgra des stong
101a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar gyur nas/ lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra de thos nas lhags par gyur cing / de nas lha'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin dang /
101a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo phug phug por sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mngon 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar byed
101a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'a/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin/
101b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni de yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni yang dag pa yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gang
101b2(dkon brtsegs): mo cher dgod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ zhe sdang dang lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ gti mug dang lhan cig skyes pa dgod pa'i
101b3(dkon brtsegs): gang mo'ang med gang du dgod pa'ang med mod kyi'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni bdag dang ldan cig tu byang chub tu sems
101b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgreng pa las bdag gis ni byang chub thob par gyur gyi/ sems can 'di dag ni le lo'i dbang gis 'khor ba thabs por gnas par gyur pas kye ma sems can 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen
101b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rjes bgrod par bya ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pa yin mo zhes de sar zhing rje chen po bskyed na/ sems can de dag gis byang chub sem
101b6(dkon brtsegs): rapa' ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig la bdag cag ni dman pa dang bag med pa yin par rig nas/ de dag bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub
101b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang mo cher dgong bar byed de re'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' drim med pa btsas mthag tu tu byin dang tshangs
102a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis 'khru bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag mchod pa'i las byed pa'ang yin la/ 'jig rten na'ang khye'u dag btsas ma thag tu gdon
102a2(dkon brtsegs): mi za bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas/ byang chub sems dpas kyang 'jig rten shes pa'i rjes su gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na/ don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir/ byang chub
102a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag
102a4(dkon brtsegs): kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar ci'i phyir grong du 'jug ce na/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa kun tu bstan pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa dang / dga' ba
102a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rtsed mo dag kun tu bstan nas kyang / gling chen po bzhi la mi lta bar spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi rjes su slob
102a6(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor rgya chen po dag spangs te rab tu byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems
102a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar grong du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa
102b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ yum sna mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ce na/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa med
102b2(dkon brtsegs): deyum lha mo sku 'brus cing tshe zang nas dus las 'das pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi
102b3(dkon brtsegs): tshem lha'i mig rnam par dag pas yum skra mo spu 'phrul gyi chos so sor brtags na/ byang chub sems dpas yum snga mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe'i lhag nA ni zab bcu dang zhag bdun las ma las par
102b4(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'phos he/ ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar yums
102b5(dkon brtsegs): mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
102b6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / bstan bcos dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mnga' gzhu'i thabs dang / 'byed stobs dang /
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / skar ma'i dpyad dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dag legs par bslabs she na/ 'jig rten dang rjes su 'thun par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
103a1(dkon brtsegs): dpas dang po nyid nas gang la legs par bslabs pa ma byas pa'i bzo 'am/ gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags sam/ bstan bcos sam/ bro gar ram
103a2(dkon brtsegs): klu 'am/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ bzhad gang ngam/ 'jo sgeg gam/ dga' ba 'am/ rtsed mo kun tu bstan par bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dga' yang
103a3(dkon brtsegs): med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni btsas ma thag kho nar 'jig rten la smra 'das pa'i bzod dang las kyi gnas thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon
103a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu legs par bslabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byung /
103a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' srid pa mtha' ma pa btsun mo dang / sras dang / g.yog 'khor len par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin no// de ci'i//
103a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de'i gnas skabs na skyes bu dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa mtha' ma pas ni btsun mo dang / sras dang / bu'i 'khor gdon mi
103a7(dkon brtsegs): za bar bstan par bya dgos te/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi/ za ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por/
103b1(dkon brtsegs): don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par sbyang bar 'gyur bas/ sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / 'di sa ste/ sras sgra gcan 'dzin kun tu bstan
103b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so// gang dag 'di snyam du zas sgra gcan 'dzin ni yab dang yum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yin no snyam du sems na
103b3(dkon brtsegs): de slar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sra gcan 'dzin 'dis ni sngon 'di skad du/ bdag srid pa mtha' ma pa'i bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ sgra gcan 'dzin ni skra nas shi
103b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas 'dir rdzus te skyes pa yin gyi pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma'ang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis blangs pa yin te/ des
103b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar bram ze'i khye'u khyod srid pa mtha' ma par gyur pa na/ bdag gi khyim thub tu gyur la/ bdag kyang khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cing ces smon lam btab pa'i
103b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di skad ces/ bzang mo nga ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du gyur cig ces ut+pa
103b7(dkon brtsegs): la'i phyir las blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de ni mi slu ba yin pas na/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
104a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa mtha' ma pas ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog 'khor gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos te/ 'di ltar shAkya'i bu mos 'tshoms byang chub sem/
104a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / lha'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ 'di skad du kye ma bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos 'di
104a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma byang chub kyi
104a4(dkon brtsegs): sems brtan par bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir yang / byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so// gzhan yang sems can gang dag 'dod pa dang / zan dang / chung ma dang /
104a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi mtha' dang / khang khyim dang / nor rdzas kyi 'du 'dzis spags nas/ yongs su 'dzin pa spangs te/ rab tu 'byung bar mi nus pa'i sems can de dag la 'dod pa'i sred pa dang
104a6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyong dang / nor rdzas dang / chung ma la mi lta ba kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang / byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs nas khang khyim dang / nor rdzas dang /
104a7(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang 'khor rnams la mi lta bar spangs te mngon par byung na/ sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di'ang de ltar btsun mo dang / nor rdzas dang / 'khor dang /
104b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyor rgya chen po dag la mi lta bar spangs te rab tu byung na/ de'i phyir bdag cag kyang ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi bya snyam du sems par bya ba'i phyir ro//
104b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bud med gzhon nu bsnyen bkur ma gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs
104b3(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byas shing yid gcugs par gyur pa de dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag khyod srid pa mtha' ma par gyur pa'i bar tshun chad kyi btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ de dag
104b4(dkon brtsegs): gi dkar po'i chos rgya cher smin par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor rnams blangs te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas pas/ bud med bzhi khri nyis
104b5(dkon brtsegs): stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// lhag ma rnams ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du byas te/ rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems
104b6(dkon brtsegs): dpas 'khor rnams blangs so// gzhan yang bud med gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung ba chen pos yongs su gdung bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu
104b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar kum tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi chu zheng dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i
105a1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa mngon par sprul nas/ sprul pa de dang bud med de dag lhan cig dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ de dag so so nas 'di snyam du
105a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed do snyam du sems par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i gnas
105a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gnas par byed do// sprul pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad nas/ byang
105a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// shAkya'i bu 'dun pa dang rta bsngags ldan gnyis kyang de gnyis kyi sngon gyi smon lam nyid yin par blta bar bya ste/ de'ang
105a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'o// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ngan gnas
105a6(dkon brtsegs): pas lha bye ba phrag bdun cu gtul ba dang / yab dang yum dag yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab che ba nyid
105a7(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma gtang ba nyid kyang kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma
105b1(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan byed pa'i rgyu ni nga yin rkyen ni nga yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad don du mi gnyen
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung zhe na/ rgan po dang / nang pa dang / shib kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / nye du rnams kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' nini du rnams mi 'dod pa
105b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags pas gnas pa ma yin par rig nas/ mngon par byung ba
105b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes shes par 'byung ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'i phyir
105b5(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang rtsed mo don du mi gnyer ba'ang skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
105b6(dkon brtsegs): nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe mngon par 'byung la nyin mo ma yin zhe na/ sems can rnams gang la gnas na dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkar po'i
105b7(dkon brtsegs): chos don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus ni bde ba rgya chen po ji snyed pa'ang yongs su spangs te/ nam byed dus kyi tshe na ma dris mi ltos par mngon par 'byung bar bya ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa dag kyang /
106a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs par bya ba dang dkar po'i phyogs yongs su nyams par mi bya ba'i phyir te de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems
106a2(dkon brtsegs): dpas skye bo rnams gnyid log par byas te mngon par byung zhe na/ skye bo rnams ni lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas pas/ lha rnams kyis nyes par kun tu bstan pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' la nye du
106a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / skye bo rnams tha ba dang / zhe sdang gyi sems bskyed par gyur na/ de dag la yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ de bdag
106a4(dkon brtsegs): gis skye bo rnams lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas shing lha rnams kyis sgo phye ste bar snang la khyer bas/ de ni byang chub sems dpas mnyes so zhes shes par gyur na/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la
106a5(dkon brtsegs): dang brgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur bas don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir/ kye bo rnams gnyid log par byas nas mngon par byung rje/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// tsa
106a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpas cha dang rgyan rnams shAkya'i bu 'dun pa la phyir bskur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos shes pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gzhan dag 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni
106a7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar rab tu byung bas na gser dang dngul dag don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas phyi ma'i skye bo dag rjes su slob tu bcu/
106b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gang dag bstan pa 'di la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis ni nga'i rjes su bslab cing / dngos po thams cad la mi sba bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la brten nas
106b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung bar bya ste/ rab tu 'byung bas ni dang po 'o na nas 'tsho ba la ltos shing rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
106b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyis ral gris skra bregs te rab tu 'byung zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te/ skra 'breg
106b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bzod pa'i lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med pa dang / byang chub sems
106b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de nyid rab tu 'byung ba don du gnyer bas na dad pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kun tu bstan pa dang / bdag nyid kyis skra bregs te rab tu byung na/ rgyal po zas gtsang yang sus nga'i bu'i sgra bregs pa
106b6(dkon brtsegs): de chang pas gcad do zhes mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis rang gi ral gris sna bregs so zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas cang mi zer bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i
106b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu
107a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa'ang nyon cig/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams
107a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dag la nges par skyo bar bya zhing / 'dun par bya ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
107a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces
107a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / ldem po ngag yin par blta bar bya ste/ las kyi sgrib pa de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad do// byang chub
107a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas ci las bsams te tshig de skad ces smras she na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la/ bram
107a6(dkon brtsegs): je'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de la ne'u ldangs bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa lnga zhig yod pa de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang dang / sdig
107a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po dang 'phrang bas byang chub kyi sems de dag brjed par gyur nas de'i tshe na rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag mu stegs can gyi bcul zhugs skyor par gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs mi spyod
107b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags la bcom ning / sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags la mi brtson pa dang / mu stegs can la mos shing mu stegs can gyi dbang gis byang chub ni bdag cag la yod de//
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas yin no zhes bdag nyid smon pa yin par las 'che bar byed do// bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis rigs kyi bu de dag sdong yin par rig nas/ de thabs la mkhas pas bram
107b3(dkon brtsegs): ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag rim gyis mu stegs can de dag gi drung nas phyir ldog par 'dod pas/ des thabs la mkhas pas rdza mkhan bum byed la tshig 'di skad ces dge
107b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer
107b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng de sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas rdza mkhan bum byed nges phyogs de ga la ba der song rtse/ de bzhin gshegs
107b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bsngags pa rjod cing / bsngags pa brjod nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od zer 'dre
107b7(dkon brtsegs): tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng 'di snyam du sems te/
108a1(dkon brtsegs): kye ma bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa yin pas/ gal te bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
108a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srungs dang byang chub kyi bsngags pa brjod cing mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na rigs kyi bu 'di dag yongs su dogs par gyur nas de bzhin
108a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar mi gyur pa'i gnas de lta bu yod do snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de sngar dam bcas pa de
108a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid rjes su srung bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pas tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya / byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka'
108a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so// ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
108a6(dkon brtsegs): myong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub kyi 'du shes kyang med sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyang
108a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni nang du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni phyi rol tu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni nang dang phyi rol tu'ang yang dag par rjes
108b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de ltar chos thams cad ma skyes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub ni gtan stong pa nyid yin pas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
108b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa des tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub
108b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la yod ces smras so// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag dang chu 'gram zhig na 'khod par gyur pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
108b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ rdza mkhan bum byed chu 'gram de ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od zer 'phreng tshur
108b5(dkon brtsegs): shog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
108b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis smras pa/ dge sbyong sgre bo mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ bya/
108b7(dkon brtsegs): chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
109a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gror ma btub pa dang / de nas rdza mkhan bum byed des bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gi thor ho nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
109a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ga la ba der khrid de song ngo // bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng yongs su bskor te
109a3(dkon brtsegs): yid 'dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu
109a4(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes pa lnga po de dag cher 'dun par gyur nas 'di snyam du 'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
109a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od srungs la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rdza mkhan bum byed 'dis thor to nas bzung
109a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du'ang bdag nyid kyi srog yongs su btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de ni/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba zhig yin sangs rgyas kyi chos de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis 'dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
109b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs la blta ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi thang du dong ngo // de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mtsha
109b2(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul bas dang pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis dad pa thob nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng la smras pa/ ston pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu
109b3(dkon brtsegs): rag khyod kyis sngan chang kho bo cag lam sbas so zhes smos so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
109b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi dpal rang gzi brjid kyang mthong / spobs pa'ang thos tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs baspags pa'ang thos nas skrag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa
109b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi lhag
109b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs rdo rje'i tshig chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de lha de ltar
109b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bstan par mdzad de/ des rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar nang ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' bas/
110a1(dkon brtsegs): khyed cag la gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng nges rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
110a2(dkon brtsegs): srungs kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na ni/ des na rigs kyi bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
110a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i gnas dang skabs kyang med na dang pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lha ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do zhes lung ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
110a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pas tshig
110a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras par zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu phyir
110a6(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing / byang chub la'ang som nyi med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang som nyi med de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
110a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byas shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang ngas lo drug tu
110b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba spyod pa spyad par gyur pas/ sems can mi shes par spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni/ dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la zhog nas tshig rtsub po sbas la/ de dag gis
110b2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang rung mi shes kyang rung / shes pa dang ldan yang rung / shes pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ brjod par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug
110b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / log par srung bar 'gyur bas na/ sems can de dag la las kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas las de kun tu ston par zad kyi/ byang chub sem
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la tshig rtsub po smras nas bdag la ni thar pa'i skal/
110b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med do snyam nas 'gyod pa la gnas shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi 'gyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ yang las de kun tu bstan to// de dag 'di skam
110b6(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces byang chub ni mchog tu
110b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras kyang / de la rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod par gyur na/ bdag cag mi shes pa rnams lha smos kyang
111a1(dkon brtsegs): dgos snyam du sems shing de dag sdig pa'i las kyi nyes pa de'ang 'chags la/ gzhan dag kyang mngon par 'du mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
111a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzhan mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa kun tu bstan gyi/ las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
111a3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang / bram ze rgya shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig tsam za zhing / zas gzhan mi za bas rnam par dag par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag yod pas/ de dag tshur gcad pa'i
111a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i lam la ma brten par rgya shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig tsam gyi zas ngan pa za bas rnam par dag par mi nus par brtsan pa'i phyir te/ 'di
111a5(dkon brtsegs): lhar byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ las/
111a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba de la dmigs nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan to// byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan pas/ lha dang phyi rol pa'i drang srong ngan pa la mos pa sa ya phrag bzhi dang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'bum yang kha zas ngan pa nges btul nas/ de dag gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub
111b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas zas la yongs su longs spyad de lus kyi stobs dang / shugs dang / mthu yang dag par bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du song gi/ lus nyams pa dang / lus nyam chung bzhin
111b2(dkon brtsegs): drum song zhen/ byang chub sems dpas ni zas ma thos shing / lus nyams pa dang / lus nyam chung bas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya bar byas na/ zas ngan pa zos pas sa ci spos te/
111b3(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa zas mi za bas byang chub yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag bkres pas yongs su gdungs pas/ ye shes bsgrub par mi nus pa de dag la snying
111b4(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas zas la yongs su longs spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni chos rnams mngon par brjod par nus kyi/ sdug bsngal bar
111b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams kyis ni mi nus pas ngas sems can de dag la bde bas ye shes rtogs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dziH zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang grong ma'i bu mo'i zas
111b6(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su longs sbyar nas zas kyi bde ba nyid kyis byang chub thob po zhes sems can rnams nga'i rjes su slob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// des na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / kye bo phyi ma rnams la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas de'i kha zas yongs su longs spyad nas/ byang chub thob/
112a1(dkon brtsegs): par kun su bstan par zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum/
112a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang por kha zas med par gnas par nus te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtswa dag slob par byed ce na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
112a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang nA'i gding ba la mos shing / gdan la gdu ba ma yin pas/ chog shes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro//
112a4(dkon brtsegs): des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la nA dag phul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas na/ de'ang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
112a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas lung bstan te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
112a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ bdud sdig can ma 'ongs par myur ba myur bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas skabs ma phye bar bdud
112a7(dkon brtsegs): sdig can byang chub kyi shing drung du 'ongs pa ni gnas med cing skabs med de/ de ni gnas mer mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa na 'di snyam du/
112b1(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'dod pa'i khams 'di na dbang phyug ni su yin/ sems can 'di dag ni su'i dbang du song snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ni bdud sdig can yin
112b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i dbang du song ngo snyam nas/ de na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bdud sdig can dang g.yul spang de/ de las rgyal bar byas na/ 'dod pa'i khams thams
112b3(dkon brtsegs): cad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur la/ bdud kyi 'khor mang po'ang 'du bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor dang / srin po'i 'khor dang / dri za'i 'khor dang / snga ma yin gyi 'khor yang 'du bar
112b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / 'khor mang po 'dus pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i rnam par brtse ba mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cing / smon lam
112b5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs par yang 'gyur la/ gzhan gang dag gis mthong ba de dag la'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro snyam ste/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
112b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi shing drung na 'dug pas mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye'o// 'od nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dag kyang yongs su gtug
112b7(dkon brtsegs): te bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkod nas 'od de las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo // shAkya'i sras po de shAkya'i khab nas mngon par byung ste/ de ni nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
113a1(dkon brtsegs): dubya/ rgya bar 'gyur bas bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' zhing / sems can brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed
113a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas bdud kyi phyogs nyung ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor nyung bar 'gyur gyi khyod song la de dang g.yul smod cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas 'od des bdud sdig can la yang dag par bskul
113a3(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ de mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos gzir bar gyur te/ khro zhing rngam bzhin du de'i mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bshams shing bsdus nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der song ste
113a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' la bgegs bya ba'i phyir dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug tu bdud kyi dmag gis gang bar byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rin po che dang / byams
113a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas nas/ shes rab rin po che las nges par byung ba'i phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bus sa gzhi chen po la brdabs te/ byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi sde thams cad
113a6(dkon brtsegs): pham par mdzad do// bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad ma thag tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis
113a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / sku mdog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs kyang mthong / stobs dang shugs dang / mthu dang / seng ge rnam par brtse ba'ang mthong
113b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): chub brnyes nas/ zhag bdun du skyil mo krung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs she na/ den gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu zhi bar sbyor pa dag kyang 'khor la/
113b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa mthong nus dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes shing / dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga'
113b4(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems ci la rten pa nges par brtag par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag gis zhag bdun du sems gcig tu bsdus te brtags
113b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ci la rten pa ma rtogs nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes nas/ lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs
113b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pas byang chub kyi shing la rtog par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas/
113b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub brnyes nas/ zhag bdun du skyil mo krung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spya na mi 'dzums par gzigs pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni nga yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
114a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med pa nas rnam par thar pa'i sgos sems can thams cad dbugs phyung zhing mgron du gnyer nas/ tshangs pas
114a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba ma btab par chos ston par mi mdzad ce na rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phal cher tshangs pa la rten cing / tshangs
114a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gtso bor 'dzin pa yin pas/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pas sprul to// bdag cag ni tshangs pa las skyes te/ tshangs pa ma gtog par 'jig rten gyi byed pa po gzhan yang med la/
114a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'ang gzhan med do snyam du sems pas de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis tshangs pa 'ong bar byas shing / tshangs pa la bsdad de/ tshangs pas phyag byas na/ tshangs
114a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la chen pa sgra dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur la/ tshangs pas gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad kyi/ ma gsol
114a6(dkon brtsegs): bar ma bstan na/ de dag nga'i chos kyang 'dzin du nges so snyam du dgongs pa'i phyir te/ tshangs pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mthus/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab
114a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'ongs par zad kyi/ tshangs pa nyid la ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes yid la byed pa'i sems gcig tsam yang med do// de ltar na tshangs pa la
114b1(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshangs pa la nges pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa 'ong bar mdzad cing / tshangs pa la gzhes te/ gang gi tshe tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor
114b2(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa de'i tshe na tshangs pa drug khri brgyang spong gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin no//
114b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gtso bo yin no// 'di ni rab mchog yin te/ bdag cag kyang ye shes 'di lta bu dang / yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
114b4(dkon brtsegs): hu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka'
114b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la las kyi rgyud bcu po 'di dag bstan pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa
114b6(dkon brtsegs): yin par yang blta bar bya/ ldem po ngag yin par yang blta bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du phra ba 'ga' dang ldan na'ang byang chub
114b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas med do//
115a1(dkon brtsegs): byo na// rigs kyi rung bzhi gshegs pa ni dge pa'i chos rnams cad mnung/ 'tsham pa sa su nga sa/
115a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ni sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i thag mas spangs pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba tsam yang mi mnga' na/ las kyi sgrib pas spos kyang ci dgos te/ ngomag
115a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang sems can gang dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chung gson cing las kyi rnam par smin pa la ma dang pa'i sems can de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu ba san par bya ba'i/
115a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud kun tu ston par yang mdzad de/ chos kyi bdag po nga la'ang las rnam par smin par 'gyur na/ khyed cag la wa ci'i phyir las rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
115a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyur ston par mdzad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang
115a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste dper na yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis legs par bslabs pa'i slob dpon ni byis pa rnams bslab pa'i don du byis pa rnams bod pa'i tshul gyis/
115a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug par zad de/ de ni de la mi shes pa dang sgrib pa med mod kyi 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis bdag las thos nas ci nas kyang yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag
115b1(dkon brtsegs): cis dang / bgrang ba dag gi rjes su slob cing / byang bar bya ba de'i ched du yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la legs par bslabs pa
115b2(dkon brtsegs): de'ang ji wa ji ltar sems can gzhan dag gi las yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de sa de ltar gsung zhing / des de ltar las nye bar ston par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di ca ste/ dper na ldan pa
115b3(dkon brtsegs): nang thams cad rab tu ni bar bya ba la legs par bslabs pa ni/ nang mang bzhin du sems can nang pa rnams kyi mdun du su na tshab dag gi ro myang bar byed cing bsngags brjod par yang byed ka rab
115b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa rjod par yang byed de/ nad pa rnams kyis de mthong nas sman tsha ba de dag 'thung bar byed/ yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / de dag nang de dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba de
115b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po nyon mongs pa'i nang thams cad las yongs su thar pa chos thams cad sgrib pa mi mnga' ba brnyes pa'ang / las dge ba
115b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kun tu ston par mdzad cing / ji ltar na sems can rnams las kyi sring pas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / lus kyi las dang /
115b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam nas/ bsams bzhin du las kun tu ston par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ma tshong dpon gyi bu 'am
116a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gi bu btsas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig la pa mngag gis ma ma zhig byin par gyur na/ ma ma de nang med par gyur bzhin du / 'dis ste/ lte'u de'i 'o ma
116a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par bya'o snyam nas/ sman la ba dang bska ba dag so sor brtags shing 'thung bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig cen thams cad kyi yab kyang spun mi mnga' ba brnyes
116a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ las kyi bya ba chung gson pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya'i phyir/ las kun tu ston par mdzad de/ las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes thos na/ sems can de dag med
116a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba thos par 'gyur zhing / de dag yid byung na sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan
116a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar
116a6(dkon brtsegs): me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na tshong pa nor 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / de'i tshe na 'gron pa de dag nyid kyi nang na mi las nag po byed pa sdig pa'i las byed pa
116a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phod cam gyi rig pa legs par bslangs pa chom rkun byed pa chong pa'i malugs kyis gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig kyang thub chad cing kyi mang du zhugs par gyur to// de nas de 'dirnam
116b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ bdag gis gang gi tshe myong pa 'di dag don sgrub cing bya ba byas pa de'i tshen/ tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang bral la/ no rangs kyi rnam pa thams cad d+d+he ras 'jam bu'i
116b2(dkon brtsegs): gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems so// rigs kyi bu de nas tshong pa de dag don grub ste pha rol tu 'gro 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / de nas mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni
116b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad khyer he 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba'i dus la bab po snyam pa dang / de'i tshe na ded dpon snying rje chen po
116b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur te/ de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de gnyid log ste/ rmi lam rmi ba na/ rgya mtsho chen po de nyid na gnas
116b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha gang yin pa des de'i rmi lam ru bstan pa'agron pa 'di nyid kyi nang na mi ming ni 'di zhes bya/ gzugs ni 'di 'dra/ cha byad dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ni 'di 'dra ba chom
116b6(dkon brtsegs): rkun ba 'chu ba gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la/ nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad khyer
116b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems pas gal te mi 'dis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral bar gyur na ni/ de'i tshe sdig pa'i las dam po byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
117a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
117a2(dkon brtsegs): skrag yin pa'i phyir te/ gal te mi 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bsad par 'gyur na ga de las kyi sgrib pa'i zhes pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa'
117a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis yun ring po ji srid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sreg par 'gyur ba/
117a4(dkon brtsegs): de la ded dpon khyod kyis de lta bu las brten te/ ci nas kyang mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag gsang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de
117a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i thabs la mkhas pa bsam par gyis shig ces bstan to// rigs kyi bu de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de sar nas 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag
117a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gsang par mi 'gyur la/ 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang mi mthun pa'i rlung la/
117a7(dkon brtsegs): te sdong pa'i tshe zhag bdun du su la'ang mi smra bar sems pa la zhugs par gyur pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la tshor pa 'di dag kyang gsang bar mi 'gyur la mi 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba
117b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ni/ mi 'a bad thog dang dpral bar bya ba ma gcogs par gzhanan mang ngomam nas di ma mdus sas te/ gas pa gagis ngos ra brgyas
117b2(dkon brtsegs): cang la bsgrags par gyur na mi/ 'di dag gis rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis mi 'di'ang srog dang bral zhing gsad par 'gyur la/ 'di dag thams cad kyang sems can dumyal pa rnams su 'gro bar
117b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'di srog dang phral nas/ gzhi des bdag bskal pa 'bum du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sreg par 'gyur yang /
117b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de la spro bar bya'i tshong pa snga brgya tsam po 'di dag srog dang bral bar gyur na'ang mi rung / mi 'di la sdig pa'i las de snyed cig rab
117b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'phel bar gyur na'ang mi rung bas bdag rang gis mi 'di srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ded dpon zhing rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po de dag kun tu bsrung ba/
117b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi de'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba las kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po de dang thabs la mkhas pa des bsams bzhin du/ chom rkun pa'i mi de mdung thung gis btab ste
117b7(dkon brtsegs): srog dang phral nas 'gron pa thams cad kyang ngom grub cing rang rang gi grong khyer du byin par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
118a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes
118a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro// tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po gang dag gru bo che de nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni/ gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
118a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya yin no// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la mkhas pa de dang / snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum du 'khor ba bsnyil
118a4(dkon brtsegs): te bor bar gyur to// chom rkun pa de'ang de nas shi 'phos nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems ka gang gi phyir thabs la mkhas pa de dang / snying rje chen
118a5(dkon brtsegs): po des bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar gyur pa'i don byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi sgrib pa yin par bsdusam na/ khyod kyis de skar mi bcu ste/ de ni bas la mkhas pa da yin par ma
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// / bamadobazhi pa po tha ma'o// rigs kyi bu bani ma gshegs pas sems rnanams kyi byab la bzung ba'i phyir/ thabs sa mangs pas seng rdzong gi ma
118a7(dkon brtsegs): nabs la zug par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug pa gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid yin par blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs
