118b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni rdo rje mkhregs pa ltar mi shigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'on kyang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na srid pa mtha' ma pa'i mi'i bu dang / mi'i bu po de dag nyid kyi gra kho min
118b2(dkon brtsegs): shu zhig kyang yod par gyur te/ re nas mi dgra po sring bu po de dag rang rang gi sku dag gis 'di na bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bdag cag gis mdza' ba shes par bcos twa/ rang rang gi dgra bo rnams kyi khyim
118b3(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs la/ de dag srog dang dpral bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/ gcig la gcig tshig tu ni ma smras so// rigs kyi bu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus srid pa mtha' ma pa'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag dang /
118b4(dkon brtsegs): mi de dag gi dgra bo bsod pa po'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
118b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi bzhi bcu po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi
118b6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po deng sa phyogs 'di nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g.yas pa'i mthil du zug
118b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mo la sa phyogs de nyid nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa rnon po mtho gang tsam gyi tshad cig byung
119a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas bcan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di 'jig rten
119a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gzhan du dor bar bgyi lags so// ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'dis phyogs 'di nas gzhan du dor bar mi nus so// /
119a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stobs kyi shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa de bzung ba dang / 'di ltar sgong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la gyen du bltas te/
119a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos par gyur kyang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang mi 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam
119a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas su gshegs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de'ang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi rna rnams kyi gnas su 'ongs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sgra nas kyi gnas su ririb kyi snying dug shed/
119a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de'ang ri rab kyi steng du 'ongs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam kyi gnas su'ang gshegs/ tshas
119a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang gshegs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ongs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te/ gdan la bzhugs pa dang / serang sdeng gi
119b1(dkon brtsegs): tshal bde'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pas zhabs g.yas pa brdung ste/ deng rjeng gi tshal pa rtse mo sa
119b2(dkon brtsegs): gtsigs la zug la/ rtse mo ya gtsigs las gyen du lta ba de'i steng du zhabs bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa'i steng du zhabs bzhas mthab tu/ de nas de'i mad la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
119b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas nga la gnas brtan kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon 'dzin las kyi sgrib pa ci zhig mdzad lags ma
119b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur lags/ ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo sngon nga rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song ba na tshong pa g.yon can zhig mdung thung gis btab te srog dang bral bar gyur pas/
119b5(dkon brtsegs): ni las de'i lhag ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de nas mi nyi shu de dag gsod par 'dod pa'i mi mdza' bshes lhar bcos pa'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po
119b6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang las rnam par smin par 'gyur na/ bdag cag la lha ci'i phyir rnam par smin par mi 'gyur snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang srog chag
119b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gums pa dang / rjes su 'gums par 'tshal ba lags te/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nongs pa de dag nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gis
120a1(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de dag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes nyes pa la nyes par bshags so// de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la las kyi bya ba dang / las zad pa/
120a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba las brtsams te/ de lha de ltar chos bstan pas mi bzhi bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to// srog chags gzhan bzhi khris ni chos mngon par rtogs par
120a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// gang gis phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems
120a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa spyan dang bral ba ldan pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ut+pa la ha rtsagam
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bslangs te gsol bar mdzad ce na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na so sor thar pa'i bsrub pa bcas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig ma dge slong rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i sring pa mtha' ma
120a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga brgya zhig nags khrod cig na gnas pa de dag la 'di ltar sman bkrus te bor bas 'tsho bar mi nus pa de lta bu'i nang zung bar gyur nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pas sman gzhan
120a7(dkon brtsegs): sten par mi byed tshol bar mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas dge slong de dag sman gzhan zhig tshol zhing sten par rjes su gnang bar bya ba'i
120b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs na ci yod/ rnam grangs ni ci yod snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i byin+da zhem/ 'di skar gal te de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong rnams la sngan gzhan dag rjes su ma gnang na
120b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dge slong rnams 'phags pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing 'phags pa'i rigs 'jal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas thabs
120b3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ut+pa la ha s+ya gan d+ha bslabs te gsol ba dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di
120b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sngan gzhan dag tshel la 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag
120b5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i mthu med cing dbang med pa yin pas shi bar gyur kyang kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag
120b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'da' bar mi byed do// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po
120b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis kyang sman bkus te bor ba spangs nas sman gzhan btsal gyis/ khyed cag kyang sman gzhan tshol cig/ de nas dge slong de dag 'gyod pa dang bral nas sman gzhan btsal te bsnyen pa dang /
121a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag nad de las yongs su thar nas/ nad dang bral ba de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas spyan sa
121a2(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba ma mdzad du zin na/ dge slong de dag kyang sman gzhan tshol bar mi byed pas/ de dag nang de las thar pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams las grol zhing dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas
121a3(dkon brtsegs): med de/ skabs ma yin zhing / de ni gnas med/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad dang ldan pa
121a4(dkon brtsegs): grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur ce na/ rigs kyi bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on
121a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse ba dang / rjes su bsrung bar bya dgos te/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa gang la la dag thong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang /
121a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms mi rnyed pa de'i tshe ma/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
121a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de nyid kyang grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa de bzhin du bsod snyoms ma rnyed par phyir byung bar gyur na
121b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams la lha smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na bdag cag bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas yi chad pa bskyed pas mi bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ don gyi dbang de
121b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang gang la sa dag 'di skad ces gang dag gis de bzhin
121b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la bsod snyoms ma phul ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag ni bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes smra na/ rigs kyi bu de sar mi bsdu'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can gyis ni
121b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag byin gyis brlabs par zad kyi/ rang gi blos ni ma
121b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sems can de dag nyid yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji skar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du/
121b6(dkon brtsegs): zhug pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to// zhal zas bcad pa de'i tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dus pa yid mi bde ba med cing / sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin ce/
121b7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba'ang med/ dma' ba'ang med par gyur to// gde nas de'i mod la spu'i bu bdun bris dang thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btung ba dang / re bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag 'a cims kyas
122a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de ste de ltar chos bstan to// bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang dus gzhan zhig gi/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe na/ bston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang chog shes pa dag thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te nyes pa la nyes par bshags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la 'phags pa'i bden
122a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi'i gtam yang dag par bstan pa mdzad par/ de na sgra dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis song chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ste/ gang gi phyir de bzhin
122a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bram ze'i grong shing sa la chen po can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji skar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ba'i rgyu ni de yin// rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
122a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ dge sbyong khyod kyis kho mo sdum par byas kyi/ kho mo la zas dang gos byin cig ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa
122a6(dkon brtsegs): btab par gyur ce na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' sde/ de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig cen gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng du 'phang ba
122a7(dkon brtsegs): byor mong kyi/ ra bzhin gshegs pa des mngon bzhin du btang sgoms mad cing / zabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa mdzad do// ci'i phyir nen/ khyi ma'i dus na brten pa 'dis rab tu byung ba'i dge mo
122b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas/ de dag 'gyor pa dang / sems zhum par 'gyur zhing / de dag mngon par mi dga' ba dang / thams pal 'jug par 'gyur bas/
122b2(dkon brtsegs): dag skur pa btab pa'i tshe na ka 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa de nyid kyis kyang skur pa brnyes par gyur na/ bdag cag gis sa ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran
122b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas/ tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma
122b4(dkon brtsegs): ni re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma dad pa mang ba yin pas/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa des na/ phung po dang / khams dang / kye mched de dag nyid kyis bstan pa 'di la gdon mi za
122b5(dkon brtsegs): bar rma 'byin par byed pa yin te/ de sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa des gal te rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur na'ang / de nyid kyis sang pa'i tshe ni dri mar yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal
122b6(dkon brtsegs): te de bzhin gshegs pas thabs 'ga' zhig gis de mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa de las zlog par spyod na ni zlog par yang mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pas srung bar spyod na srung bar yang
122b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci
123a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pas kun tu rgyu mdzes ma kun tu chu dag gis srog dang bral te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'obs kyi nang du bor ba btang snyoms su
123a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang ldan pa yin pas// de bzhin gshegs pas de de ltar 'gyur bar mkhyen cing / de bzhin gshegs/
123a3(dkon brtsegs): pas de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis rlob par yang sbyor mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu mdzes ma nyid tshe'i tshad zad cing / gdon mi za bar gzhan gyi gnod pas tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
123a4(dkon brtsegs): nam grangs de na gzhan mu stegs can dag 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dkar po'i chos rnam par 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar
123a5(dkon brtsegs): de la gzhag par bya ba de lha de ltar de la 'jog par mdzad do zhes bdag nyid kyi rang gi nyes pas shin tu tshar gcod par yang 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun gyi bar du grong khyer du ma zhugs par lha bye/
123a6(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag drug cu btul nas/ zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'khor bzhi po dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ye shes mthong ba skyes
123a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de lta de ltar de dag la chos bstan te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyon mongs med kyi
123b1(dkon brtsegs): ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du skye bo rnams la bag pab she/ bram ze mon mongs med kyi rnachas kyi nas dag gsol can/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji skar khyim padang
123b2(dkon brtsegs): des de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi ge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas/ ri mo mi byed par yang mkhyen mod kyi/ des mkhyen bzhin du dang du blangs shing btang snyoms mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
123b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dbyar zla ba gsum du gang dag gi rna chas kyi nas dag gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngon
123b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa sha stag yin te/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las dang / las dman pa byas shing mngon par 'dus byas pas/ las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
123b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na/ rta cang shes gcig yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gyis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/ rta lnga brgya
123b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag thams cad kyang sngon mir gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/ de de dag yongs su thar par bya ba dang / yongs su smin par bya/
123b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir der skyes te/ ha cang shes de nyid kyi mthus/ rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing / de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de
124a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rtar gyur pa lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gi don du dbyar zla ba
124a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum der gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so// de man lnga brgya po dag gi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed byed ni dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul lo// cang shes kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag
124a3(dkon brtsegs): las phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo// phyed ni rta cang shes de nyid za zhing / ha cang shes des ha'i skad kyis rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa daste/
124a4(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun de dag la phyag 'tshal du'ang bcug go// rta cang shes des rta lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces khyed cag gi chas kyi nas dag las phyed phyed de bzhin gshegs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol to/
124a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes go bar yang byas so// de ltar rta lnga brgya po de dag gis sdig pa bshags shing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dad pa bskyed nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rus gzhan gyi tshe na
124a6(dkon brtsegs): ta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes nas/ sbar gyur pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas phul zhing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas
124a7(dkon brtsegs): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// rta lnga brgya po de dag
124b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta ji gang yin pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems rul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pas ma cang shes da'ang sangs rgyas
124b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa la mchod pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu
124b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de lha mod kyi/ mi'i kha zas gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bsod pa cung
124b4(dkon brtsegs): zad kyang med de/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dag zhal zas kyi phyir yongs su longs spyad par gyur
124b5(dkon brtsegs): na'ang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gasreg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang / ro bro ba'i mchog gi khyad par gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni srong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
124b6(dkon brtsegs): khams na'ang 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di skar de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhal zas mi
124b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod pa thams cad gsol ma thag tu'ang lha'i kha zas las yang dag par 'das pa'i ro dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas
125a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs te rab/
125a2(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas/ ra rta chas kyi nas ngag gsol bar mdzad pa ste zhes yid mi bde bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas/ kun dga' bo 'di ci'i ro yin shes sam zhes nas kyi
125a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bru gcig byin pa dang / des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ nga la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing / rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
125a4(dkon brtsegs): ro'i mchog 'di lta bu ni sngan chad ma 'tshal ma myong lags so zhes zer te/ de'i byin gyis dge slong kun dga' bo zas gzhan mi za bar dga' ba dang bde bas zhag bdun 'das par gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des
125a5(dkon brtsegs): ma khyod kyis 'di ltar de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin gyi/ las kyi sgrib pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa das/
125a6(dkon brtsegs): mgron du gnyer la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pas ri mo mi byed pa'i sems can de dag la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rgyud de lta bu dag kun tu ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la ri mo ma byas pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
125b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la skos/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par las blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag gis rta chas kyi nas zos pa de dag las dge slong
125b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu ni 'dod chags spyod pa dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma spyod pa yin pas// gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zos par gyur na/ de dag gi 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu
125b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags kyi kun nas sdang ba des bsrabs shing med par gyur te/ de dag gis 'dod chags kyi kun nas sdang bdag rnam par bsal nas// reg
125b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas/ zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ska bas na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rengs
125b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pa des zla ba gsum du na chas kyi nas ngag gsol bar zad kyi/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs
125b6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gso sbyong la zhugs pa na/ 'od srungs nga ni ro rgyab na bas/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces bka' stsal ce na/
125b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na lha'i bu nyan thos kyis 'dul ba gang dag sngon dge slong 'od srungs kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / zag yod pa'i bya ba dag la yang dang yang du dad pa bskyed cing / yang /
126a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du bcug pa brgyad stong 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pas/ lha'i bu de dag gis sngon yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag thos la wa'i bu de dag
126a2(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong 'od srungs ma gtogs par/ gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bstan par gyur kyang / de dag gis chos bstan pa kun shes par mi 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir dge slong 'od srungs kyis byang chub
126a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag rab tu dbye ba rgya cher bshad pas/ lha'i bu brgyad stong po de dag gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can gang la la dag nad kyis gnod par gyur cing nad par gyur/
126a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ chos nyan du ma 'ongs shing / chos mnyan pa'i sems can chos ma thos pa de dag 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag gsan nas srung nad las yongs su thar
126a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos mnyan par mi bya snyam du sems par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / sems can nad pa rnams chos la gus pa kun tu bstan par
126a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshig 'di skad ces/ 'od srungs pa ni ro rgyab nabs/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces gsungs par zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spun mnga' ba ni ma yin
126a7(dkon brtsegs): mo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku yin te/ de dag la 'byung ba'i lus rags pa yongs su grub pa med pa'i phyir te/
126b1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas shUkya rnams rab tu rnam par 'jig par gyur pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces kun dga' bo grang pa na ning mi
126b2(dkon brtsegs): bde'o zhes gsungs she na/ rigs kyi bu de ni sems can gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pas nye du rnams kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po mthar mdzad pa mi shes pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du
126b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir rab tu byung nas/ rgyal po'i gdung brgyad thams cad chud zos kyang des nye du rnams yongs su ma bskyabs pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni te ru rnams
126b4(dkon brtsegs): la phan par bzhed pa'ang ma yin/ don du bzhed pa'ang ma yin/ bde bar bzhed pa'ang ma yin/ grub pa dang bde bar bzhed pa'ang ma yin no snyam du sems par mi 'gyur bar sems can de dag gi sems gzung ba'i phyir/
126b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la tshig 'di skad ces/ bklang pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la
126b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces/ kun dga' bo ngaklad pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe na/ lha'i bu chad par smra ba gsum stong 'dus par gyur pa dang // sems can srog gcod pa rab tu mang po dag kyang 'dus par gyur pa/
126b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / de na sems can chad par smra ba de dag dang / sems can srog gcod pa de dag las kyi bya ba la gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas srog gcod pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu srung zhing
127a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bde'o zhes las kyi rgyud de kun tu bstan so// de na de bzhin gshegs pas gsung gi 'phrin las brjod pa de bstan pa na/ sgra dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags rdzi /
127a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas skyo ba rnam pa brgyas smyos pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa smos pa
127a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang du len par mdzad ce na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dza spyo bar byed pa la phyir skyo ba 'am/ yang na de phyogs gzhan du 'phang ba 'am/ yang na de de bzhin gshegs pa la tshig
127a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tsam gyis skyo bar yang mi spobs pa de lngar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par yang spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor der lha dang mi mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma zhum pa
127a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma khengs pa dang / zugs mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / sdom ji ma bar phyis kyang de bzhin pas/ bzod pa'i spobs bskyed pa mthong nas srog chags bzhi stong
127a6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas smyos pa btang snyoms su bzhag go// des kyang skyo bar byed pa/
127a7(dkon brtsegs): bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dza de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhing / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi sa bon bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la
127b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phye ba thams cad dang / srid pa thams cad kyi sgras byin yang dang yang du rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa de'ang byang chub sems
127b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhas byin la brten nas nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs shing / sems can dpag shu med pa rnams kyi don kyang byas pa'i phyir ro//
127b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs gang gis she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la gang gi tshe sems can rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'ang mi shes len pa po'ang mi shes pa de'i tshe ma lhas byin byang chub sems
127b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i drung du 'ongs te/ bu dag kyang slong bar byed/ chung ma dag kyang slong bar byed/ rgyal srid dag kyang slong bar byed/ lag pa dang rkang pa dag dang / mig dang mgo'ang slong bar byed cing / de dag la
127b5(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa dka' ba dang / sems can rnams la bde ba skyed par byed pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang slong bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' zhum pa med par de dag sbyin par byed pa de sems can dpag tu
127b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gis mthong nas/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ spo ba bskyed nas/ 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces/ de dag sbyin pa la mos shing / byang chub tu
127b7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs par yang byed do// gzhan yang lhas byin dang // sems can dpag tu med pa gang dag tshul khrims 'dral bar 'dod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mi 'dral ba mthong nas/ de dag kyang tshul khrims/
128a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len par byed pa dang / sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' rjes su slob pa na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag la smos sam/ rkyang bkagasaH/
128a2(dkon brtsegs): brdegs na'ang 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing / bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rnam grangs des kyang sems can rnams kyi don byas pa yin no// gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dkrongs pa'i phyir
128a3(dkon brtsegs): gsheg ma'i mi dag zar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dkrongs pa'i phyir glang po che gdug pa nor skyong zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de'ang /
128a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'ilas kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa de la brten nas sems can dpag tu med pa dag
128a5(dkon brtsegs): gi don mdzad pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu mdor na lhas byin de ni nga'i ston pa phan par 'dod pa yin no// las kyi rgyud bcu po thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'i/
128a6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can las kyi bya ba dang rnam par smin pa chud gzon pa rnams las kyi bya ba dang rnam par smin pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs/
128a7(dkon brtsegs): pas thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin// las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kyi rgyud kun tu bstan te/ de thos na
128b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / dge ba'i las la sgrib pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba la mi g.yel bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu thabs la
128b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni gsang bar bya ba yin te/ sems can dman pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya/ bstan par mi bya/ bshad par mi bya/ bklag par
128b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi lha smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro// /
128b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa 'di la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'dis don du 'gyur ba med de/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di'i sdong du 'gyur ba dang /
128b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis bstan pa 'di la bslab par bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
128b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang du 'bru mar gyi mar me phyung ma khyim gyi snod thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas kyang thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos na
128b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par mthong zhing / bdag gis kyang 'di la bslab par byas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams
129a1(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'jug cing 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de ni legs par yang dag par brtson pas sla'o snyam du sems pa dang / de thabs la mkhas pa de dag la legs par bslabs pa dang / sems
129a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams smras par mi byed pa de lta bu'i ming du'ang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer bas na/ gang nas tha
129a3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa 'di rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba'i dpag tshad 'bum du'ang 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos ni/
129a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob par 'gyur zhing / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nem nur dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'khor bzhi po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
129a5(dkon brtsegs): snod du gyur pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur to// gang dag snod du ma gyur cing mi shes pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa
129a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rna lam du grag par yang ma gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri nyis song dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes
129a7(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar gyi
129b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pag kun dga' bo nga'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa zhes bya bar rung zhig/ thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes
129b2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar yang zung zhig/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan
129b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
129b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
129b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskong ngo // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen
129b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
129b7(dkon brtsegs): su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ le'u 'di la shwa lo ka stong nyis brgya rtsa bcu gsum mchis/
130a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma sa sa / yog sa nga sa nas sgru /
130a2(dkon brtsegs): dmam / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams cadas tsug la // 'dzin dag gis kyis pa dus gas na/ ma ldan ma maman
130a3(dkon brtsegs): ma chas b+ha ka yan taka gnas pa na/ shA ri'i bu la sogs pa bya ba byas pa/ byed sa byas pa// dge slong srong gis pacwacwa bcu'i dge slong gi 'dun chen po na ga na so/
130a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zad na lus sgom pa dang / gnyis kyis gnas pas lus nyan mongs pa med cing lus sgom pa med par gnas so// mang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi namakyim
130a5(dkon brtsegs): man cu'i tshas rgyas pa sur drang bar gyur to// nganas sa song dag 'di snyam du byams te// bcom ldan 'das kyikyis gyi mangs pa'i rna'aHsa pas thumang ba gyur pa lasam/ som ldan sa
130a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ang chos kyi tshul dzi ma bu zhig ston pa dgongs shig gusam mo// de nas de'i tshe tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba 'khor tshong pa drug dri dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thang dru // mas
130a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang myong shin tu gzhon sha can la lus kyi mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa dang ldanam/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa rab su ni pa dang / rus
130b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yom tan gyi gter du gyur pa/ gser gyi shing sngon pa skar gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo // de nas bzang srong dad pa skyes te/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma thams
130b2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes 'jig rten du snyan pa dag grags pa 'di ni mi brdzun no snyam mo// de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
130b3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la gtugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta ba gtad de 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la gzigs nas sku las 'od zer byung ngo // 'od zer
130b4(dkon brtsegs): des kyang tshong dpon bzang skyong mi 'jigs pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
130b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la da gdod dang pa thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lha lags pas/ phyogs 'ga' la re ba/ chos 'tshol ba/ 'khor ba'i gnod pa rnams kyis
130b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyon mongs pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i shas che ba/ ngo mtshar du gyur pa can bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni the tshom can lags/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni som nyi can lags na
130b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdag rmongs par 'gyur zhing / 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba ma 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'grub mdzad pas/ yid bzhin gyi nor
131a1(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che lta bu 'jig rten du de'u ma byung ste byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pas na pham sa bu'ang lags so// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom
131a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o//
131a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bzang skyong zhu bar 'dod pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// tshong dpon bzang skyong gzi brjid 'bar zhing gzugs bzang po phun sum tshogs pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa/ tshe dang ldan kun dga' bos mthong
131a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzang skyong 'di'i mdog bzang zhing rgyas pas rgyal po'i dpal yang zil gyis non te/ lhag par mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar lags
131a5(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos bzang skyong 'di'i bde ba'i yo byad gang yin pa dang / dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/
131a6(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa ma gtogs par/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la'ang med // 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ma khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la'ang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
131a7(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di'i nor du gyur pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i
131b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyod kyis tshong dpon dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa 'di'i 'byor pa dang longs spyod rgyas pa nyon cig/ kun dga' bo nor dang gser phun sum tshogs pa'i tshong pa drug khri 'di'i byi ba ni ma 'brang ngo // mal
131b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshim sna tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa smig thags cad la sran nang tshangs can bting ba ka g.yas g.yon du sngas dmar po bzhag pa drug khri dang / bud med bgo ba dar dang / du gu la'i ras dang / men
131b3(dkon brtsegs): dzi dang / mon dar dang / mes sbyangs pa'i gos dang / la tshig gu'i snod kor dang / dmar po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sngam phran can gyi gos gyon pa/ 'od chags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag mthil reg
131b4(dkon brtsegs): na sri zhing shin tu 'jam pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba/ rgod cing dga' ba dang / tshig 'chos shing sgeg la/ snyan pa'i gtam brjod pas bskyed pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas dgod par
131b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ khyim thabs la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul gyis lus la spong bar byed pa/ skyes pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i rgyud spangs pa/ 'dzem pas 'dud cing bla gos bzang po bgos pa/ gcig la gcig
131b6(dkon brtsegs): phra ga dog gis 'thab pa dang / rtse bas bzhin khro gnyer gsigs shing mkhur ba 'gyur ba/ rkang lag dang sor mo shin tu 'jam pa/ rkang lag gi tshigs kyi bar mtshams mi mngon pa/ rkang lag rgyas pa/
131b7(dkon brtsegs): snga mnyam zhing bcos la g.yas su 'khyil zhing mdzes pa/ snying chags pa dang ldan zhing shin tu snying nye ba / snyan par grags pa'i rigs dang / rus las byung bas grags pa dang / legs par bskyed pa/
132a1(dkon brtsegs): lus shin tu 'jam pa/ rigs mtho ba'i bud med rtse bar 'os pa'i khang pa dang / mal cha rgyas pa dang ldan pa drug khri dang / btso zangs drug khri gang ba'i 'bras chan bzang po tshod ma shin
132a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dri zhim pos sna tha dad par phye ba sA lus bzang po'i chan dang / chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa lta bu'i kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong la dga' ba skyed par byed pa na/ nyon ma mongs par grub
132a3(dkon brtsegs): cing bsod nams kyi byung la dring zhing mi gtsang ba dang / lus kyi skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa
132a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye la sdug cing mdzes par byas pa dang / ras sbyangs shing rlung gis bskyod pa'i bun long dang / me tog sil mar gtor ba dang / bsil ba'i chus reg na bde bas khyab pas/ bsil bar gyur pa/ 'khar
132a5(dkon brtsegs): rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga chen po las byung ba'i sgra sbran pa'i ngar rir dang / phug ron gyi skang yid du 'ong zhing chags su rung bas mdzes par byas pa
132a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi 'khri shing gis rtse mo dkris la/ sbrang bu sgra snyan pa 'byin pa lha'i gnas dang / ri rab kyi phrag gi bar lta bur rlung skyabs dang ldan pa'i mar me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid dang / sman gyi sngon ma
132a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ra ba drug khri dang / grong khyer bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / ba gam dang / srang sdug gus mdzes par byas pa/ yul sna tshogs kyi skang dang / spyor ba dang / zong dang / tshor khang rna
132b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ tshong pa'i tshogs stong dag gis yang long du gyur pa// nags dang shing ljon pa rtswa tshogs brgya stong dag gis 'jigs pa/ ku mu du'i me tog rgyas pa dri ma med
132b2(dkon brtsegs): paspel bas mdzes par byas pa na dang / glang po che dang / shing rta'i mchog gis bun long du gyur pa drug khri yod do// kun dga' bo grong khyer de dag gi nang na tshong dpon dang / tshong pa dang /
132b3(dkon brtsegs): yul gyi mi dang / ded dpon 'khong ba rnams kyang / tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong de'i bsngags pa rjod cing snyan par smra bar byed de/ nyin gcig bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas 'dud par byed do//
132b4(dkon brtsegs): yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de'i dbang phyug dang / 'byor pa dang / longs spyod rgyas pa mthong na/ bdag nyid la mi dngul po lta bur 'dzin to// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba
132b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa 'di ni btso zangs 'bum gyis g.yos byed pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lus bskor te/ kun dga' bo de'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang bud med lnga stong yod do// kun dga' bo zla ba 'byor pa de la ni
132b6(dkon brtsegs): gya rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo byad kyis kyang cha tsam du'ang mi phong ngo // kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zab 'byor pa de la ni/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gi gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog rgyas
132b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba'i yo byad kyis brgya'i char yang mi phong ngo // kun dga' bo 'on kyang bzang skyong la ni lha'i shing rta lha'i nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba/ nam mkha' skar mas sbas pa dang 'dra ba
133a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gser 'tsher rabs ngos spras pa/ rdo rje dang / spug dang / me shel sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs shing / nam mkha' lding gi
133a2(dkon brtsegs): shugs lhar 'gro ba de la zhon na rin po che'i gling du'ang 'gro zhing / bde ba dang ldan la/ rtsed mo nyams su myong nas/ phyir 'ong ba'i shing rta'i mchog yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod do//
133a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bsags lag/
133a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ kun
133a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ngo // kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong de ni de'i nyan thos gtsug
133a6(dkon brtsegs): phung bzang zhes bya bar gyur te/ bslab pa'i gzhi ma nyams shing tshul khrims ma 'chal bar spyod pa/ chos smra ba thos pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin par gyur te/ des zhin gcig bzhin
133a7(dkon brtsegs): du sems can rnams la skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / zab cing brtan pa dang / gsang mtho zhing zur phyin pas chos bstan to// gang gis chos de thos shing kun chub par byas pa de'ang /
133b1(dkon brtsegs): byin chang log par srung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa des bsal pa dgu bcu cu gcig gi bar dugyu dang mi rnams mgu bar byas so// kun dga' bo de'i shing rta'i gan
133b2(dkon brtsegs): med khang gang yin pa de'ang bshad par bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'dis dge slong tshangs par spyod cing / tshul khrims dang ldan pa lus nyam chung ba zhig la dad pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms byin nas/
133b3(dkon brtsegs): ldam zung gcig kyang byin te/ de'i bsod nams rnam par smin pangs ni lha'i shing cha'i mchog mngon par grub par gyur to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
133b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis kyang / 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'byung ba des khyod lung bskum
133b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di ni ngas 'dul ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
133b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das tshong dpon 'di ni nor dang gser phun sum tshogs la/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yul rnams kyis kyang dregs par ma gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
133b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa'i khyab par dag gis dregs par mi 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di ni dge ba'i chos can dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams su myong ba yin no//
134a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas/ tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong gis bdag nyid kyi skabs bye bar rtogs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
134a2(dkon brtsegs): la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sman 'dog shing
134a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rtse ba can la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod kyis dri ba dang mthun pa'i dus la bab kyis/ bzang skyong
134a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems
134a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal te/ za ma tog gi nang gi rin po che mi rig pa bzhin du/ thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtogs na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de gang lags
134a6(dkon brtsegs): skar na rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji skar na mi gum pa'i rkang lag dang / mig nyams shing 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dbang po rnams 'gag cing khams rnams dang mi ldan par gyur pa na//
134a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes 'di lus las ji ltar 'pho zhing mchi/ gzugs ni ji ltar bu lags/ rang bzhin ni dzi sa bu lags// lus dang ni ji skar 'bral bar 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa 'dis lus yongs su btang nas/
134b1(dkon brtsegs): lus gzhan ji ltar len par 'gyur/ ji skar na khams rnams yongs su btang zhing / skye mched rnams bor nas/ 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar 'gyur/ ji sa na lus tha dang bdag len par
134b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid bcom ldan 'das ji sar na mi gum pa'i skye mched rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'jig cen pha rol tu ji ltar myong bar 'gyur/
134b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na phung po 'di dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags la/ phyis phung po gzhan dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ ji sar na skye
134b4(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang skyong legs so legs so//
134b5(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te khyod kyis nga la bskul ba bzhin no// bzang skyong de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'pho ba dang / 'gag pa nyon cig/ bzang skyong dper na rlung gi
134b6(dkon brtsegs): khams gzugs can ma yin pa'ang bstan du yod cing / gzung du yod pa dag las gzugs su snang ngo // de la bstan du yod pa ni shing 'gul zhing g.yo ba dang / sgra skad 'ur 'ur po'i sgra 'byin pa
134b7(dkon brtsegs): dang grang ba dang / dro ba'i reg pas tshor ba skyed pa yin yang / de la rkang lag dang / mig dang / gdong dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ sngo bsangs dang dkar ba zhes kha dog lhag par mi dmigs so//
135a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang gzugs su mi dmigs shing / gzugs su snang bar mi 'gyur te/ khyod kyis rgyu'i byi ga dag gis rnam par shes
135a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams rtogs par bya'o// de la rgyu gang zhe na/ sems pa dang / tshor ba dang / chos kyi khams so// de la ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas/ tshor ba
135a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sems pa len zhe na/ dper na rlung gi khams kyis me to gi dri bsdus nas 'phos he 'gro ba de las lha'i me tog gi dri 'di dad ldang ngo zhes shes mod kyi/ rlung gi khams kyang me tog gi dri mi 'dzin la/
135a4(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams med par yang me tog rnams kyi dri mi dmigs so// dri de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin/ sna'i dbang po de'ang gzugs can ma yin no//
135a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong de bzhin du mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa des tshor ba yongs su blangs shing / sems kun tu blangs te/ chos kyi khams yang dag par blangs nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ste/ pha ma
135a6(dkon brtsegs): phrad pa las rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa skyes na/ tshor ba rnams dang sems pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur te/ dper na me tog gi dbang gis snas tshor la/ sna'i dbang gis dri dmig
135a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang lus kyi dbang gis rlung gi rang bzhin gyis reg pa dmigs par 'gyur la/ rlung gi dbang gis me tog gi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis
135b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ tshor ba'i dbang gis sems pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems pa'i dbang gis gang gis dge ba 'am mi dge ba shes pa'i chos kyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na ri mo
135b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan rtsig pa dang shing leb shin tu byi ngor byas pa la ci 'dod pa bzhin du las byed de/ las la blo sbyangs pas ci 'dod pa bzhin du gzugs rnams mngon par 'grub par byed kyang / de'i rnam par shes
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma yin pas kyang / gzugs sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis
135b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi lus drug mngon par 'grub par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi rkyen gyis gzugs mthong la/ rnam par shes pa mig la rten pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// rna ba'i rkyen gyis
135b5(dkon brtsegs): sba ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// sna'i rkyen gyis ji ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// lce'i rkyen gyis ro ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// lus kyi rkyen gyis reg bya ste/ de'ang gzugs
135b6(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin no// chos kyi bye mched kyang gzugs can ma yin no// rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin pa ste/ de bas na spyod yul rnams kyang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar
135b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro zhe na/ bzang
136a1(dkon brtsegs): skyong 'dir 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe las zad pas tshe 'gag pa na/ las kyi sgrib pas zin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'pho bar 'gyur te/ dper na dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms
136a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de log pa 'gags nas yongs su 'phan pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing / khams rnams bor nas/
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag ni mchod sbyin gyis byin zhes bya ba de nyid yin te/ lus kyi tshor ba dang / yid kyi tshor ba dang / tshor ba rnam pa gnyis kyis zin to snyam du rab tu shes te/ de
136a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ni lus kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi nas ni yid kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/ sa bon gyis lus kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub
136a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed la/ sems pas shes pa dran pa thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na sa bon dang shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas shes pa de rtogs pas na/ de'i phyir rnam par
136a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang de dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i spyod yul shes pas na/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// sa bon gyis myu gu bskyed pa bzhin du lus 'grub pas/
136a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis lus yongs su btang nas/ 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa de ni/ dper na me long gi
136b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyanas bu dang / 'ji ba la rgyas btab pa'i 'bur bzhin no// dper ma ni ma shar na rab rib dang mun pa med par 'gyur la/ nyi ma med par gyur na yang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/
136b2(dkon brtsegs): mun pa de'i gnas ther zug pa 'am/ ther zug pa ma yin pa'ang med la/ mun pa de la'ang gzugs dang tshor ba mi snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus skyes nas/ mun pa
136b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du lus la gnas par 'gyur te/ mis kyang rnam par shes pa mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus 'di 'dzin par byed do// dper na bud med kyi mangs na bu gnas pa la ci
136b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi lho na 'dug pa 'di khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ram/ ser ram/ dbang po ma tshang ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rkang lag mnyam pa yin par mi shes la/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): lho'i mngal na gnas pa de'ang kha zas ha cang tsha bas 'gul zhing rig la tshor bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang
136b6(dkon brtsegs): mig 'dzums pa dang / 'byed pa dang / las thams cad yongs su spyod cing / dgod pa dang / gtam dang / bsam pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can lus la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la bdag gis lus
136b7(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par shes pa gnas pa 'di rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig snyam du sems can rnams kyis mi shes so// bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / dngos po
137a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la chub pa yin la/ dngos po rnams kyis kyang gos pa med do// bzang skyong 'di na rnam par shes pa ni brkos pa yin te/ dbang po drug po rnams dang / dbang po chug sa
137a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul rnams dang / khams bzhi po rnams dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams dang / bzang skyong 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa la bsgo bar bya ba yin par blta'o// dper na shing gi 'khrul 'khor bur bu
137a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis gzugs byas pa de bya ba thams cad byed de/ rtug pa dang / mchong ba dang / gar byed pa dang / bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag la 'jug na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrul 'khor de ga
137a4(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bkas rmas pa de'i rgyus ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'khrul 'khor de ni
137a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste/ las de'ang gzugs can ma yin zhing / rnam par shes pa las mngon par 'grub pa'o// de bzhin du lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di'ang rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'byung ste/
137a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshogs la 'jug pa yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus skyed par byed pa'i phyir byed pa po'ang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus kyi
137a7(dkon brtsegs): khams la rten pa'i phyir mi zad pa'ang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i phyir blo phun sum tshogs pa'ang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dzin
137b1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni dri nga ba dag dang / mi gtsang ba dag dang / ro dag la'ang 'bab ste/ 'on kyang de dag la dri nges gos par mi 'gyur la/ nyi ma'ang dri nga ba
137b2(dkon brtsegs): bor te'ang mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang phyi sa dang skrag snyig za ba'i khyi dang phag gi skye gnas ngag tu'ang skye ba yongs su 'dzin te/ 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams sa
137b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod ba ngan pa de dag gis gos pa med do// bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus yongs su btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de'ang ji lta zhe na/ rnam par shes
137b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis lus 'dir bor nas/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin to// dper na rlung gi khams brag gi phrag nas byung nas/ shing tsam pa ka dang
137b5(dkon brtsegs): brang de spos shin tu dri zhim pa khyer nas yang dring ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / ro'i dri'ang khyer he 'gro la/ bzang skyong de las gang ches shas che ba de'i dri dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji skar rlung gi khams re rje
137b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gnyis khyer te 'gro'ang / rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin la ga dri de gnyis kyang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus las 'phos te/
137b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba khyer nas 'pho ste/ de ltar na de'i 'pho ba dmigs so// dper na rmi lam na mis dngos po thams cad shes kyang na lus de mal na 'dug par mi shes pa de bzhin du/ bsod nams su
138a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rmi lam rmib bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lkog ma'i ming pa rnams nas kyang mi 'byung / bu ga rnams nas kyang ma yin te/
138a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni lung bu dang gseb rnams mi tshol lo// de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bya gag gi sgong
138a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ ngang pa'i sgo nga ma 'phrugs pa shun pa ma rdol bar sgo nga'i nang nas bye'u phrug rnams 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na bu ga ma brtol bar rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
138a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dper na til 'bru tsam pa ka'i me tog gis bsgos nas/ legs par brdungs te btsir ba las til mar byung ba ni tsam ka'i til mar zhes bya'o// 'di lta sde/ dper madri ngas kyang til 'bru ma bcol bzhin du dz+ra
138a5(dkon brtsegs): zhim pos bsgos te 'pho zhing 'gro'ang dri res sdum gyi ro myong bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'bru'i rkyen dang me tog dang phrad pas til mar dri dang 'dres pa'i dngos por 'gyur te/ 'on kyang til gyi 'bru de la me tog gi dri
138a6(dkon brtsegs): de gseb nas 'gro ba ni med la/ de'i rkyen gyis dri de 'pho zhing 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang me tog gi dri bzhin du sgo nga'i shun pa ma brtol bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ de'i 'pho ba'ang de
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang de'i 'pho ba ni nyi ma dang / me shel dang / bsreg bya dang 'dra bar yang blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang sa bon 'pho ba dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs gang du sa bon btab na/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): sa'i bams dang / rtswa'i 'ams dang / me'i rnams dang / rlung gi thams gtsug pa 'on lasas bamangapal ten cing rdzong bu nga ma mthun por 'grubs mchog pa yo 'a rdzon
138b2(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ dmar por snang ba 'am/ kha dog sna tshogs sam/ smin pa'i ro tha dad par 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos kyi khams gcig pu 'di las sring
138b3(dkon brtsegs): par skye ba thams cad du lus sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ba 'am/ ser ba 'am/ khra bo 'am/ mnam po 'am/ rang bzhin gyis mnyen por skye bar 'gyur// bzang skyong gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe
138b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas/ sa bon du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid rkang lag dang ldan par shes so// 'on kyang de la yan lag dang nying lag ni med do// de'ang sa'i khams yod
138b5(dkon brtsegs): su ba'ang nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su 'dzin te/ chos kyi khams de'ang dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan no// rngan pade'ang myor yum gyi spobs dang ldan mo// chos kyi khams can pa dang mtshungs par dzan
138b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i len pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa yin te/ rnam par shes pa ma gtogs par yang chos kyi khams mi dmigs la/ chos kyi khams ma gtog par yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med do// rlung gi khams ni rnam
138b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de'i rjes su 'jug go// gzhan yang lha'i khams 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i khams dang / tshor ba'i khams dang / chos kyi khams rang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa rnams kyang rdzas su 'jug go/
139a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji skar na rnam par shes pa de gzugs can lags/ bcom ldan
139a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzugs yod de/ de la nang gi gzugs gang zhe na/ zin pa'i mig gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// mig gi rnam par
139a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gis gzugs so// rna ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi gzugs so// snga gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so//
139a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// lce gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// skye'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// lus gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// /
139a5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// bzang skyong 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dmus long zhig nub mo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa na/ lha'i gzugs rkang lag/
139a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam zhing mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dag mthong la/ des de dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed de/ gnyid log pa las sad pa dang gzugs de dag ma mthong la/ de nam nangs nas 'di skad du khyod
139a7(dkon brtsegs): zhon cig/ mdangs mtshan mo bdag gi rmi lam du bud med kyi gzugs mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dang skyeng mos tshal mi stong gis gang ba mthong ste/ der bdag gis mi lus shin tu gzhon sha can lag pa
139b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po che mchog gi snga sngar ring ba thal gong yangs shing rgyas la/ zung yangs shing ma khregs pa dag mthong ngo zhes smra zhing / mi de dag gi lus kyi rgyun mdzes pa gang yin pa de dag bzlas la/ de nas
139b2(dkon brtsegs): long des mi de dag nyid kyi gzugs rnams ma mthong na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dmus long nges rmi lam du gzugs rnams ji ltar mthong / bzang stong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
139b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i slang du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bas na nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas mi lam du gzugs rnams mthong gi/ sha'i mig gis ni ma yin
139b4(dkon brtsegs): no// ji ltar mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du yud tsam zhig dran pa 'byung ba bzhin du shi ba'i dran pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ nang gi gzugs de'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang mi shi ba'i
139b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams de sa bon gyi khams bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro ba ngas bshad par bya ste/ dper na sa bon gyi khams sa gzhi la btab na/ khams bzhi po dag sdud par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam
139b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang dran pa rab tu 'dzin cing / tshor ba yongs su 'dzin te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang rjes su bzung nas/ lus yongs su btang ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
139b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa de dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ bzang skyong dper na nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga ni 'od nag po 'am/ dkar po 'dzin te/ 'od kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu rin po che de/
140a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'byung zhing / de'i rang bzhin nyid nor bu rin po che de la snang bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang dang gang du 'phos pa de dang der kha dog dag snang ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'ang dge ba
140a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba yongs su bzung nas 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na lus 'di la rnam par shes pa rtogs par 'gyur
140a3(dkon brtsegs): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong rnam par shes pa 'di bsags pa 'am/ spungs par mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di skye zhing 'gag pa'i
140a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// bzang skyong dper na sa bon las myu gu 'byung mod kyi/ sa bon rul ba las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ sa bon ma nyams pa las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ myu gu'ang 'grub par
140a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems myu gu de'i sa bon sdong bu 'am/ lo ma 'am/ sbubs gang na gnas/ sa bon ni shing gi rtse mo na'ang mi gnas so// de bzhin du lus 'di la rnam par shes
140a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang na'ang mi gnas te/ mig la'ang ma yin/ rna ba la'ang ma yin/ sna'i dbang po la'ang ma yin no// sa bon gyi myu gu skye ba gang yin pa de ni sems pa chung ba yin no// mngal du skye ba de ni tshor ba chung ba/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ dper na mu gu 'byung zhing dus tshig dang ldan pa na/ me tog rnams 'grub ste/ me tog grub na 'bras bu 'grub pa yod pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus 'grub par 'gyur ro
140b1(dkon brtsegs): lus grub pa na yan lag dang nying lag gang la'ang rnam par shes pa mi gnas la/ rnam par shes pa med na'ang lus skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dper na shing yongs su smin pa las sa bon 'byung la
140b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma sbyin pa las ma yin pa de bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lus las rnam par shes pa 'di snang bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ med pas bsdams pa/ dran pas yongs su
140b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba/ dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ mi dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ rlung gi khams kyis yongs su zin pa/ shes pas mngon par brlan pa/ rkyen la mngon du phyogs
140b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par shes pa pha ma dang phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro// dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang yang / bzhin med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung la/
140b5(dkon brtsegs): yong med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste/ ji ltar bzhin dang me long phrad pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs brnyan de'ang gzugs brnyan yin la/ de la tshor ba dang rab tu
140b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'ang med de/ lus gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang de nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing / ji lta bur lus smra ba dang / 'bod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang bar byed pa de bzhin du/ bzhin
140b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo // bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi dbang gis gzugs brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ mi'i dbang gis gzugs brnyan gda' ste/ de'ang
141a1(dkon brtsegs): me long gi rkyen gyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gda' labazhin gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi gzugs brnyam 'byung lags so//
141a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong ji ltar lus kyi dbang dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis lus 'di tshor ba myong zhing / 'du shes dang
141a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang / yid la byed pa 'grub par byed do// de la me long gang yin pa de ni pha ma phrad pa lta bur blta'o// ji ltar lus mi snang na gzugs brnyan mi snang ste/ dper na me long gyi dkyil 'khor la gzug
141a4(dkon brtsegs): brnyan gyi rang bzhin yod pa spangs nas/ yang chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus yongs su btang ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas/ phung po
141a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan thob par 'gyur ro// dper ma sa bon gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang / shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum wa ral sogs pa'i shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas/ yang shing de yongs su btang ste/ shing gzhan
141a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la/ sa bon gyi khams yongs su btang ba na/ dus bzlog par 'gyur bas/ shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par 'gyur ro// khams kyi bcud rnams med par gyur pas shing de yongs su rnyis shing
141a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phra shing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang lus rnams bskyed nas/ yang yongs su btang ste/ lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed do// dper na nas dang /
141b1(dkon brtsegs): til dang / gro dang / mon sran the'u dang / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i sa bon cung zad gang na yod pa der cung zad sems pa lta bur gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang
141b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi ris gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der sems pa yongs su bzung zhing / tshor ba chung ngu dang / bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa rjes su bzung nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa
141b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu 'pho'o// dper na bung ba rol sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te longs myang nas/ me tog yongs su btang ste/ me tog gzhan du 'bo la/ bung ba de'ang me tog dri mi zhim pa la longs
141b4(dkon brtsegs): spyang nas/ dri zhim por 'gro bar byed de/ me tog gang dang gang la 'jar ba de dang de la chags shing / ro'ang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i lus
141b5(dkon brtsegs): blangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu longs spyad nas/ phyir yang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du lus blangs te/ des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas/ yang phung po lnga po gzhan dag len to//
141b6(dkon brtsegs): de la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar brtsa zhes na/ dper mgur gum gyi sa bom nam/ le bcan ci'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la/ de dag gi khong mamu gu'ang mi snang / me tog kyang mi sdang / kha dog
141b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi snang / yang sa bon de sa'i khams la btab na/ chu'i khams kyis yongs su brlan nas myu gu mngon par grub par byed de/ myu gu mngon par grub na me tog dmar po 'am dkar po 'am/
142a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'byung bar 'ju / 'on kyang la dog 'das por gyi 'o na mi gnas pa/ sa 'on ma ma ladog dang myug 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dab nadu/ rnam par shes pa
142a2(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su pacang nas/ mi'i gzugs can yin la/ shazug gu'i dbang po 'byung ba'i bye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te/ de ci'i mig dang / Tha'i da ba dang ldan cing rba dang //
142a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ro dang / chos kyi bye mched rab tu shes pa'i bdag cing can du 'gyur sa/ 'di nyim du gang bdag gis las byas pa de cing ni 'di dag yin no sam dur shes so// sus da'ang rnam pal shes pa
142a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis brdzus pa yin te/ dper mdar gyi srin bu rang gi lus las srung ba'i chu byung bas khyim byas la/ de 'ang de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus
142a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su btang nas med par 'gyur ro// dper na pad+ma chu'i nang nas skyes te/ lha'i dri dang kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang / pad+ma dkar po de la chu'i
142a6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang mi dmigs la/ de'i nang du mi sdang bar gyur nas/ gang du sa bon gnas pa der kha dog dang / dri dang / ro rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du 'pho zhing
142a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba der dbang po dag gi spyodang yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang / sems pa dang / chos kyi khams rnams kyang der 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che gang du/
142b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba der longs spyod thams nang 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na ni ma dang 'brel ba'i 'od zer rnams nyi ma gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid 'od zer rnams kyang rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rnam par
142b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang de nyid du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'bo zhing 'gro'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang
142b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongs su bzung ste/ sha med pa dang rus pa med pa'i lus 'grub par byed do// de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni gzugs yin no// dbang po'i dngos po rnams ni tshor bas
142b4(dkon brtsegs): myong ngo // dran pa ni lha'i lha bas mthong ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang yongs su len to// dper na rgya shug dang / 'bra go dang / a mra dang / nyo ti dang / se'u dang / bil ba dang / ka pir
142b5(dkon brtsegs): thal sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni ro du mar 'grub ste/ tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / skur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / bska ba la sogs pa'i tshe re rer rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ la la ni ro tsha bar 'gyur/
142b6(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sgyur/ la la ni dngar ro// 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der ro'ang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der/
142b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dran pa'ang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni lus yongs su btang nas/ bdag
143a1(dkon brtsegs): gis lus 'di yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes te/ de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o// dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// mi dge ba'i las
143a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu shes so// las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
143a3(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di'i bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dper na rlung gi khams grang bar yang 'gyur zhing / tsha bar yang 'gyur la/ dri zhim por yang ldan zhing / ji nga
143a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ldan ste/ sbyor ba de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las 'byung yang rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ len pa'i rgyus snang ste/ ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo
143a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa las rlung gi khams shes par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang gzugs can ma yin te/ gzugs len pa'i rkyen
143a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod pa len pa'i rkyen dang / lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa len pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis lus dpa kha dog skye
143a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'grub par byed pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshong dpom gzhon nu zlab 'byor pa snyam las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// @
143b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzugs ji sngar blta bar bgyi len pa ni ji lta bu lags las len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi lta ba len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ tshul khrims dang bcul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin
143b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zlab 'byor pa legs so legs so// mkhas pas ni mkhas pa'i mtsham nyid nge sar shes so// zla ba 'byor pa 'ang
143b3(dkon brtsegs): na kha dog bzang po 'am/ kha dog ngan pa'ang rung ste/ de ni sha kham tshad dang / rtsa dang / nus pa dang / mgo bo dang / klad pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang /
143b4(dkon brtsegs): mjal ma dang / snying dang lto ba dang / rmo ba dang / byi sa dang gcin dang lgang pa dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang zhag dang / chu sar dang / rnag dang khrag dang
143b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhris pa dang bad kan dang / ngar snabs dang / swa dang / la sru nga / sen mo dang spu dang / pags pas g.yogs pa/ shin tu gyur pa mi thug pa dang / mi gtsang ba mang po la rten pa'o//
143b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi rgyur byas pa las mngon par 'grub ste/ de'ang pha ma phrad pa'i rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bsam
143b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs len pa'i rgyu zhes bshad do// zla ba 'byor pa lus kyi sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so// bsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so// rdo ba nyid dang yongs su smin par byed pa
144a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so// g.yo ba nyid dang / bskum pa dang brkyang ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so// lus de'i rab tu shes pa dang / ro'i khams dang /
144a2(dkon brtsegs): dri'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / dran pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pas 'di
144a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/ lus las rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/
144a4(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su btang nas 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa 'dir lus 'di gnas par gyur nas/ rus log par
144a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur par khams rnams yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ dper na 'o ma dang chu bsres he lhan cig tu bzhag pa me dang phrad na 'o ma'ang logs shig tu 'gyur zhing / chu'ang logs shig tu 'gyur
144a6(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma'i sdum gyi khams gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// zlab 'byor pa de bzhin du mi shi ba'i log pa'ang logs shig tu 'gyur/ khams rnams kyang logs shig tu 'gyur/ rnam par
144a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'ang logs shig tu 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa de'ang khams kyi rten yongs su blangs nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len to// dran pa ni chos kyi khams dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ dran pa chos
144b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang 'brel ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba blangs nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na dge ba chen po zhes bya ba'i sman mar de ni/ sngan ro tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / skur ba dang
144b2(dkon brtsegs): lan tshwa'i ro dang / bska ba'i ro'i mthu dang / rnam par smin pa du ma blangs nas lus kyi nang du 'gro'o// dge ba'i sman mar gyi ro'i mthu dang rnam par smin pa de nang du song bas/ lus la kha dog dang / dri dang
144b3(dkon brtsegs): ro skyed par byed cing / de mar gyi khams yongasu btang nas lus la 'pho ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su spangs shing
