144b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/ rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi khams gang yin pa de ni lus lta bu'o// sman rnams phrad pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams phrad pa lta bu'o// /
144b5(dkon brtsegs): sman rnams kyi kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa lta bu'o// 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'pho ba'i rnam par shes pa 'pho ba lta bur blta bar bya'o// mi'i la
144b6(dkon brtsegs): dog rgyas pa dang / mdog bzang zhing bde bar smin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen po'i sman mar nges mdog ngan cing skya bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba lta bur bstan
144b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ dge ba chen po'i sman mar rin po che ji lta ba de bzhin du ni rnam par shes pa'i khams blta bar bya'o// ji ltar dge ba chen po'i sman mar gyis sman rnams kyi kha dog 'jug par byed cing / ro dang dri 'jug
145a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang / mar de la rkang lag dang mig med pa de bzhin du ga rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len cing
145a2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba yongs su len te dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to// zla ba 'byor pa mi shi 'phos pa des kyang lha'i dran pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba bcu drug kyang
145a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // bdag nyid kyi lus rkang lag nyams pa'ang mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi log pa yin no snyam du'ang shes so// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i dran pas lha'i sgras khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra zhing /
145a4(dkon brtsegs): shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing dang / sdum bu sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ gser btsom gsar pa'i mdog ltar sba ba sbas pa rnam par dbye ba byas pa dag mthong ngo // des lhas de mthong nas mchog tu
145a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyed te/ de dga' ba skyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa de ni rta la zhon pa dang 'dra bar blta ste/ dper na g.yul ngor chas pa na//
145a6(dkon brtsegs): dmag mi'i nang na mi ci la ma rag par chas pa sga las bzung ste myur ba myur bar zhon par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang dge ba la dmigs pa dang / 'brel cing dbugs rgyu ba nod pas
145a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams yongs su blangs shing / skye mched 'gags te/ lus bor nas/ lha'i gnas 'og min man chad tshangs pa'i bar du yongs su len par 'gyur ro// / bam po
145b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa sde tha ma'o// de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa lus las 'pho ba de'i rang
145b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin jim bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngamache na sngar khyod kyis nga la ji skang bskul ba de ni de bzhin te// legs so legs so// dri ba 'di ni mchog tu zab bo// rdzib
145b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya ba yin te/ rnam par shes pas de ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong
145b4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sma na chen 'di ni zab mo'i zhu ba zhu ba la mkhas pa lags te/ blo zhib cing mdzangs la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan
145b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de de bzhin te/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sma na chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa yin no// bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon
145b6(dkon brtsegs): nu sma na chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan mu stegs can du gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du chog ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di su yin/ rnam par shes pa'i
145b7(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di ji lta bu zhig yin no snyam mo// bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du ma chung de/ ngas 'di'i the tsom bsal bar bya'o// de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sma ma chen la 'di skad ces
146a1(dkon brtsegs): sbas so// sman chen leg so legs so// khyod mi shes rab rgya che zhing yangs la/ chos zab mo nu ba la mkhas so// snga ma chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes la 'jug pa blo dag pa'i
146a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bar gyur pa la skul cig/ zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni byis pa ste/ yul la sred pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la lan 'ga' yang ma bskul bskul ba ma byas so// de bzhin gshes
146a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' la/ dam pa'i chos dang phrang pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dkas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zab pa zab pa'i gnas rnams bcom ldan 'das la skul cig de nas
146a4(dkon brtsegs): sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ston ka'i dus kyi me tog pad+ma'i tshal rgyas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sman chen dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
146a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'tshal ba lags na/ bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ bskal ba'i mthar ma thug par yongs su mya ngan ma 'das par gshegs pa zhig tu gyur na/ de'i slad na sems can
146a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gis las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'tshal to// 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa
146a7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi don gyi phyir yang brag gi rtse mo nas rang gi lus bor te dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyams su myong ngo // sman che mchod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la lan gdab bo// de skad ces bkan
146b1(dkon brtsegs): la nam bcom ldan 'das sa spyan chem gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snyam pa lashes pa 'di'i ngas can cigags/ co ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa rnam
146b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhan gyi ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / me'i grib ma chu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba ma yin zhing / mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mig dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang
146b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa bzhin no// sman chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying du sdug pa'i
146b4(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba na/ mig gi dbang po 'pho ba dang / ji ltar mis me long la rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong la/ me long gung du phyung na rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba de bzhin du ga rnam
146b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams 'di 'bros na/ rang gi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams nges mthong ngo // dper na mi dmus long gis nyi ma 'char ba 'am/ ki mgung na 'dug
146b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang mi mthong la/ mtshan mo'ang zla ba 'char ba dang nub pa mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang yus la mi snang ngo // sman chem 'on kyang lus la sred pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
146b7(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te/ de'ang lus 'di'i khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / phung po rnams phrad par byed pa yin no// de la gzugs
147a1(dkon brtsegs): da na skye du / rlu hA/
147a2(dkon brtsegs): sa sa/ ma pa skyes pa sa sa /

147a5(dkon brtsegs): gcugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'di gang ces gcom so// bcom ldan 'das bsnod rnams dang bsod nams ma lags brtsong ba dag lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gaga' phrul la/
147a6(dkon brtsegs): ro'i phyir rnon cig/ bden pa ma mthong bas ni rnam par shes pa 'ang mo mthong ste/ de ni lag mthil du b+ha nAr ba nag pa bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// don mig la'ang mi gnas te/ ga sa
147a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams 'ang jo bu gzigs pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang gzugs camam
147b1(dkon brtsegs): yin par thugs su cung nga / 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dpes bstar so// bzang myong 'dim nam par shes pa'i khams 'dis bsong nams ngang bsod/
147b2(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig ste ka dper na mi la la skyem byed dam/ brjed byed dam/ dri za'i gdon nam/ lha'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ bzang sdong 'diji snyam du sems// tsa mde'i khong na 'dug pa'i/
147b3(dkon brtsegs): skyem byed dam/ dri za 'am/ lha de snang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni lags so// mi de'i nang ngam pa slad rol na'ang gdon mi ganga' rtse/ gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so//
147b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri zhim pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsod nams dang ldan pas
147b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang lus blangs nas/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/ tshong dpom nyid dam/ sgra nyid byed du 'jug d+hA/ re skar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// ji ltar d+ha'i
147b6(dkon brtsegs): gdon de lha'i me tog 'phreng byin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing / mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
147b7(dkon brtsegs): lus de'ang tshim par 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// bzang skyong dper na srul po'i gdon mi sdug cing gzugs mi snang ba mi'i lus la gnas te/ mi
148a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / ldan ljin dang / sgor lung nas 'bab pa dang / gtor ma 'dod cing de'ang gtor ma des dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi 'ang gdon
148a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang gis dring zhing mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas btsog pa dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i
148a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyis skye gnas ngan par skyes te/ dbul po 'am/ yi dgas ngan pa 'am/ ldan sprin za ba dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma
148a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa myong ba'ang yin no// dper na lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'di'ang bsod nams gzugs can/
148a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams skyed par byed do// dper na srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa mi la gnas shing phyis sa dang ldan sbyin za bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i lam
148a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang bsod nams ma yin par che bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro bar yang badz+ra'o//
148a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong de bas ma/ khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o// gdon gyi longs spyod bzang po dang ngan pa gang yin pa de dag ni
148b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba lta bur bcu'o// mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus 'a
148b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rgyu ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/ dper na gtsub stan las kyang brten/ gtsub shing las kyang
148b3(dkon brtsegs): brten/ de skyed pa'i mi'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di len pa'i rgyu skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / gzugs la
148b4(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// dper na me tog las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me tog de la'ang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ 'bras bur grub pa la'ang me tog mi dmigs
148b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ 'on kyang lus de la'ang rnam par shes pa mi snang la/ rnam par shes pa ldog pas kyang lus kyi rus pa dang / rkang dang / mer mar
148b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / mi gtsang ba rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dper na sa bon de me tog gi kha dog dang / dri dang / ro 'debs pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs
148b7(dkon brtsegs): su btang nas dge ba dang mi dge ba btab cing tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa'ang btab nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o// dper ma skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyi
149a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po gnyis zad nas dga' bas brlan te/ bud med la shin tu dam por 'khyud nas nyon mongs pa 'byin par byed de/ de gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur na
149a2(dkon brtsegs): yang bral bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der nyon mongs pa phyung nas 'dod chags med par 'gyur te/ yang gcig la gcig 'dod chags
149a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas dga' ba bskyed de/ chags pa 'phel bar byed do// dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs
149a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong na skyes pa'i 'dod chags skyed la/ yang phrad pa las bral na phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su blangs nas/ yang bor te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par
149a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'di la pha ma grang ba dang / dri za nye bar gnas pa dang / las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de/ las de dag kyang gzugs can ma yin la/ skyes pa dang bud
149a6(dkon brtsegs): med kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// len pa'i rkyen las 'dod pa 'byung ste/ de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// gzugs kyis 'dod pa len pas na/ de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes
149a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// sngan chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa de gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par gsem pa dang /
149b1(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o// de'i mchog tu 'dzin pa ni chum du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'o// de'i len pa ni srid pa ste/ spu dang mir skye zhing / skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa skyed pa ste/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba yongs su smin par byed do// phung po rnams
149b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa bon yang rlan par byed do// las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do// rnam par shes pa'ang sbyor bar byed do// nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang sreg par byed do// de bas na 'di
149b4(dkon brtsegs): ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par
149b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongs su len pa lags/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ 'di la
149b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/ lha'i lta ba bskyed de/ de'i lta ba de'ang sha'i mig la rten pa ma yin no// de'i ska bas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni len pa zhes bya ste/
149b7(dkon brtsegs): de bas na lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o// de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/ der lha rnams lha'i rtse ba dag gis
150a1(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba mthong nas/ de der chags pa skye'o// 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ bdag ni der 'gro'o snyam mo// des des chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so//
150a2(dkon brtsegs): dur khrod na 'dug pa'i log pa de'ang des mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len pa gang yin pa'i bdag
150a3(dkon brtsegs): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam mo// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa log pa de la chags
150a4(dkon brtsegs): na ci'i slad du mi gnas log pa de nyid la ci'i slad du mi cen bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sman chen dper na mi la la'i skra dang kha spu bregs te/ skra dang kha sru de mthong nas mi de
150a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhing gnag pa yin gyi/ 'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems ci sna de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis log pa bor nas phyir yang log pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do//
150a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar sgrub par bgyid cing /
150b1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje sngar sra ba'i log pa'ang ji sngar rtsol bar bgyid/ glang po che dgu skyong gi spobs dang ldan pa'i mi dang / glang po che'i rgyal po'ang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
150b2(dkon brtsegs): sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa ri'i phrag na gnas pa de'ang ri'i phrag de nas byung ste/ ri rab dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i ri'i rtse mo snyil bar byed cing / 'byes par byed/
150b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ri de'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra mtshan gyis gsol pa/ rlung gi khams ni snyi zhing lus ma mchis par bsla bar bgyi'o// bcom
150b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sma ma chen de de bzhin te/ ji ltar rlung gi khams snying zhing lus med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa 'di'ang zhan cing lus med mod kyi/ lus chen po dag dang chung ngu dag
150b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang skyed par byed de/ sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin te/ glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no// dper ma mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am/ khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de
150b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang chen po rnams 'grub par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad
150b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci las de gzugs can zhig lags sam/ 'on te gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/ rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyi/ bcom
151a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngan chen 'di la las rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang 'byor ba dag dang / swa'i kha zas 'thob pa yin te/ dper na mi dbul lo//
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las/ der cig gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la/ gcig ni skom sgo shi na/ chu de la la zhig gis snyim pas bcus te mi de la byin pa'ang med/ lal zhig gis mi cig shos de
151a3(dkon brtsegs): ma bkag pa'ang med kyi/ bsod nams kyi mthu 'bra' zhig gis gcig gis mi chu rnyed la/ gcig gis ni ma rnyed pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos de dag basmra bar bya'o// za ba yar gyi ngo dang
151a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dper na shing thog rlon pa yongs su smin pa na/ kha dog gzhan du 'gyur te/ kha dog de dang yongs su smin pa'ang me'i khams kyi dbang gis
151a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lus 'di'ang bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser 'byor pa dag tu rgyan nye bar ston to// lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar ston te/ dbang phyug gi rgyan gang yin pa de
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bsod nams kyi dper bstan to// dper na sa bon sa la btab na/ shing gi rtse mor snang bar 'gyur la/ sa bon de'ang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing / shing gi nang na'ang sa bon de mi dmigs la/
151a7(dkon brtsegs): mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon de blangs te/ shing gi rtse mor bzhag pa'ang med cing / ma bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba'ang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba lus la gnas pa
151b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo // dper ma sa bon las me tog 'grub pa na/ sa bon gyi nang na'ang me tog mi sdang zhing / me tog gi nang na'ang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su
151b2(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa de bzhin du/ lus las kyang las 'byung las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi lus kyi nang na'ang las mi sdang las kyi nang na'ang lus mi snang ngo // dper na me tog yongs su smin pa na
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du / lus smin na las rnams dmigs so// dper na gang ma sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar spang ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der
151b4(dkon brtsegs): las dge ba dang mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/ las de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par smin pa'ang gzugs can ma yin no// dper na mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin pa 'byung la/
151b5(dkon brtsegs): mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ thib pa de'ang mi de'i lus dang 'brel pa ma yin la/ lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di la dge ba dang mi dge ba 'brel bar 'dug ste/ lus gang /
151b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'brang bar 'gyur te/ lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba'ang ma yin la/ lus med na'ang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dper na sngan tsha ba dang / kha ba dang /
151b7(dkon brtsegs): bska ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkru sman btang na nang thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i mdog rgyas pa'ang lus la sdang bar 'gyur ba de'i ltar sngan tsha ba dang la ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog
152a1(dkon brtsegs): gnom par 'jug pa dang / yin du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing / 'dims du mi 'das ni sngam thos gang mchag sa rnam zhugs par 'gyur song bya/ kun de dag ga dang rnanapa
152a2(dkon brtsegs): de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ 'o dang sbyin pa gzugs can ma yin pa'ang mo'i mngog rgyas pa las spang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du// dge pa'i las 'di'ang gzugs cams yinas/ rims sus dru nas
152a3(dkon brtsegs): khazas dang / nye bar ldang ba dang / longs stong dang / gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gis gang lag mnyam ning mchog tu ba ba dang snun/ nor dru dang / gser dag/ dngus 'byor bar 'gyur ba de dag rnams ca
152a4(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no// rigs dang longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las rnams pa dang / nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la ra ba dang / kha zas ngan pa za zhing mal lhan ngan pa dang / gzugs
152a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan cing mi thug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dper na me long gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa 'am/ mdog mi sdug pa snang la/ me long gi gzugs
152a6(dkon brtsegs): brnya na de'ang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di lha rnams dang / mi rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dag
152a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sma ma chen las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa/
152b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis dbang po rnams ji ltar 'bebs/ lus chen po'ang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di lta ste/ dper mngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du
152b2(dkon brtsegs): song na/ gzhu shin tu bkang ste/ drug mangs thos kyi glang po che bong tshong che ba la baspun la/ dug de'ang khrag dang zad na yan lag dang nying lag rnams su 'pho zhing 'gro ste// dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad
152b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dor la/ gnad rnams su bsnun cing khrag gi kha dog bskur te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la/ phyir yang lus bor nas/ dug de lus las phyir byung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du
152b4(dkon brtsegs): sems/ dug de dang glang po che'i log pa de'i tshad ji tsam/ gsol pa/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang/
152b5(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su spong zhing / dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la/ khams rnams kyang yongs su gtong ngo // de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do// sman chen gzhan yang khyod kyis
152b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni/ ji ltar lo lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te/ dper na ri'i rgyal po rag
152b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri ba ni srong yong la/ de'ang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis sum khris su yongs su dkris te/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas rgya mtsho ba nyung ngu mi rung
153a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / de gnyis kyi dbugs kyi ri rab kyang g.yo bar byed de/ de gnyis ji ltar dug che la sprob che zhing yangs pa bzhin du/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog po gnyis kyang de dang
153a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'o// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sbrang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam nas/ de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang
153a3(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ de nyid de dag gi'ang yin no// dper na dug bar sa nA ba dang / ha la ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu'ang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos na/ de dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
153a4(dkon brtsegs): sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / bad sa nA bA dang / ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang yin pa de'i nang na ches mang ba gang yin pa gsol pa/ bcom
153a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar blta bar bgyi ste/ bad sa nA bA dang / ha la ha la'i dug ni de sa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po
153a6(dkon brtsegs): glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la/ gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa de 'ang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par
153a7(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ dper ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon chung ngu las shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing rgya chel / yal ga dang / yal ga ze'u brgya stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems sa bon ri'i tshad
153b1(dkon brtsegs): dzaM tsamA/ shing de'i tshad mi ji tsam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang bar snang bzhin te/ ljang tshe lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/ sman chen bzhin dus
153b2(dkon brtsegs): bon de'i nang na'ang shing mi snang la/ sa bon med na'ang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ ji ltar sa bon za mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs chen po 'grub par
153b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ lus la'ang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la/ rnam par shes pa med na'ang lus skye ba mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces
153b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyam chung ba rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na mi dbul
153b5(dkon brtsegs): bo la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che nang na/ des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas/ lha'i gnas dang / rtsed mos tshal dang / skyeng tshal dang / ning dang / rab dang / sgo 'ang dang /
153b6(dkon brtsegs): shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang / khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang / rdzas dang yo byad dag sprul na/ sman chen de dag thams cad ni mi brtan zhing nyam chung la myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa'i
153b7(dkon brtsegs): chos can yin te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de mi de'i lag nas sbyor na/ de'i bde ba'i longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi byed la/ de'i yo byad de
154a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin lta bu yin la/ lus gang yin pa de ni snying po med do// gsol pa/ bcom/
154a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa des ji skar gzugs mkhrang zhing sra ba phye sde 'pho zhing 'chi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na chu'i rgyun shin tu 'jam pa ri'i gseb na 'dug pas
154a3(dkon brtsegs): ri de nyid bcol te 'byung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i nang na ches sra ba gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis mkhrang la/ rdo rje skar brtan zhing sra ba lags la/ cha ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam
154a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing reg na bde ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas/ lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
154a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi ris nas sems can shi 'phos te/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba len pa lags/ ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman
154a6(dkon brtsegs): chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ sems can de shi 'phos nas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su zin na/ lus yongs su btang nas/ rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te/ sgra'i
154a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo // lus de'ang 'dar bar mthong ngo // lha rdzas kyi sgra'i gnas dang /
154b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' tshul dang / 'dus tshas dang / me tog gin rgyan dang / shing ku she sha ya dang / ko kan dang / gnal med khang dang / tshal drug po dang / wa'i bu mortsa bas bkor ba'ang mthong ngo // drug
154b2(dkon brtsegs): shu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas bu'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang / se mo do dang / gdub zum dang / gdub leb dang / dpung rgyan spa ning sbas pas brgyan pa de dag kyang nges
154b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // lha gnon nu dang / lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing yang rab tu dga' ba'ang des mthong ngo // des de dag mthong nas kun su chags pa skyed de/ de der kun tu chags pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro//
154b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// de snying dga' bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'di skar bzhin gyi mdog pad+ma sna bur snang bar 'gyur zhing / sba ba byin ci ma log par 'gyur ro//
154b5(dkon brtsegs): sA'ang yo bar mi 'gyur/ de'i kha'ang mnam par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de'i mig ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur/ de'i gnang rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur/ de'i khrag kyang zag
154b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur/ byi sa'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur/ de'i sen mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur/ lag pa'ang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/ rkang lag kyang g.yob par
154b7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed de/ rkang lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro// sman chen de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i lhas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong
155a1(dkon brtsegs): gis brgyan pa mthong ste/ lha'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i 'phreng ba shin tu dri zhim pa dag mthong ngo //
155a2(dkon brtsegs): lha gzhon nu rgyan dang / gser gyi mchog dang / se mo ngo dang / ga ru bu dang / dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo // des lha gzhon nu de dag mthong nas mchog
155a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba skye'o// de yid dga' bas log pa la lhas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ so me tog kun da dang ku mu da ltar dkar bar snang ngo // mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums ha cang yang mi 'byed do//
155a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo // de'i bzhin yang pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro// shi ba'i log pa'ang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/ ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams
155a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sde sngags chen po 'don par mi byed do// de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs
155a6(dkon brtsegs): shim ci zhim zhing / shin tu yongs su dag patshor bar 'gyur ro// de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/ de'i lha ba'ang byin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na ming/
155a7(dkon brtsegs): ches shing dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na/ gzhig nas phyir 'ongs pa 'am ga ring mo nig hu gung na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul nas 'khyud cing yid rab tukyi dga' rtse/ 'di meng/
155b1(dkon brtsegs): du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul ni 'di yin gyi/ dang dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong zhig ces/ des gnyen de dag yang dag par dbugasu 'byin par byed do// sman chen gal
155b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam re re la tshogs bcad dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / gtam sna tshogs dang / gtan tshigs sna tshogs rjod
155b3(dkon brtsegs): cing spru la/ de'i tshe zhing la'ang srid par mi 'gyur zhing / gnyid kyi dbang du'ang mi 'gron/ bde ba thams cad ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rtsa dang lha mo stan cig su nig cig
155b4(dkon brtsegs): gi steng du 'dug la/ snga mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa lha'i lag pa'i steng du gzhag cing / de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag kyang byung ste/ snga mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas/ g+ha de la 'di skad
155b5(dkon brtsegs): du/ lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro// des kyang me tog rnams lag par mnye zhing phur bar byed do// des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi
155b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang dbang po rnams bor zhing / dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste khams rnams yongs su btang nas/ khams kyi don yongs su
155b7(dkon brtsegs): blangs te/ mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin la/ rta zhon pa lta bu dang / nyi ma dang / me she la dang / bsreg bya lta bu dang / chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar dge
156a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho ning 'gro'o// de yang de'i tshe me tog la brten nas ka ba mkhri gcig la 'dug cing brad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi nang
156a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'dres par 'gyur ro// yang der bdur rtsi 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha gzhon nu rna cha ga dub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang ldan pa
156a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sna nachen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i rkyen gyi dbang
156a4(dkon brtsegs): gis gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ rkyen rnams la'ang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing
156a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang / ri dang / nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa 'di'ang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs
156a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'grub par byed do// sA na chen gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun zad de/ gcig la gcig rdul cing gtsubs pa las me 'grub par 'gyur te/ me de'ang shing gi nang na mi snang la/ shing /
156a7(dkon brtsegs): med na'ang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ me de'ang rkyen gyi dbang gis shing las 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ rkyen med par mi 'byung ngo // gzugs kyi dbang gyis kyang shing gi nang na me mi snang lag shing ma
156b1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par yang me mi dmigs so// sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa de'ang pha ma'i dbang gis 'jug rtse/ rnam par shes pa'ang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs la/ lus med par yang rnam
156b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa mi 'byung ngo // sman chen dper na me ma byung bar gzugs dang / rdo ba dang / kha dog gsal bar mi gnang ngo // sman chen de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba dang /
156b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams mi snang ngo // sman chen dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bar snang zhing gzi brjid kyis lam mer 'dug kyang / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi ma'i
156b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gnag gam/ gser ram/ dkar ram dmar ser du mi mthong ngo // sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lba ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg
156b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa dag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi/ lus la rnam par shes pa gnag pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am/ gzugs su sdang bar mis mi mthong ngo // dper na nyi mtsha ba dang / ser ba dang / 'gro ba
156b6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyir yang 'char ba dag gi rtags las snang ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'ang rtags dag gis blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol
156b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i rtags ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du byed kyi rtags dang / tshor ba'i rtags dang / 'du shes kyi rtags dang / sems pa dang /
157a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / gdung ba dang / yid mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rtags su blta'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems dang
157a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems las blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las
157a3(dkon brtsegs): blang rje myur du rtse ba yongs su len pa lags/ rnam par shes pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongs su ma bzung ba des ji skar lus gzhan la gnas par bcing rnam par shes pa'ang ni skar sa
157a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phra na chen dper na mi la la lag pa ring zhing thur du brkyang la/ g.yul gyi go cha gyon te lha'i rtsa rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la
157a5(dkon brtsegs): non nas g.yul du 'gro ze/ re g.yul ngo der song nas/ mdung dang / ral gri dang / mngar dag gis snying myos te/ g.yul ngor na'i mchog de las sal srung la/ de'ang lus kyis
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bod cal yongs su blangs pa zhig kye myur ba myur bar sa las ca'i rgyab tu 'gong par byed na/ ji sa myi ri nyung nas cal thon pa dang / 'gong che bas dza wAr mnye bar gnas pa la nas 'gong pa dang /
157a7(dkon brtsegs): cha 'gro bzhin du 'gong po chen po 'gong bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa la'ang brku bar bya'o// dzi nar mi pa rol gyi dam ga tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas mnon te 'bros pa 'o/
157b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa 'di thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas yongs su zin cing / lha dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa mthong nas/ shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len te/
157b2(dkon brtsegs): sman chen gzhan yang dang po shi 'phos nas da dung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis spras pa de ni/ dper ma mi'i thob ma chu'i steng du bab pa gzun
157b3(dkon brtsegs): su'ang sdang mod kyi/ de gzugs su gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o// sman chen dper na gang lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba 'am/ grang ba 'am ka
157b4(dkon brtsegs): ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing / lus de la ni sha'i dum bu lta bu'ang med do// grib ma de la ni khams kyis glags pa'ang med do// mi'i gzugs brnyam chu'i nang du byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i
157b5(dkon brtsegs): sla'am/ bde ba'i sgra 'byung ba'ang med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas/ lus kyi log pa bor te/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro// sman chen de ltar na
157b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/
157b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar skye ba yongs su len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sma ma chen bsod nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro ba'i
158a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnam su skye ba yongs su len pa de nyon cig/ sman chen 'di la sems can las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa de ni sems can gyi ris
158a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chi 'pho ste/ shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te/ sems can dmyal ba 'di nas shi 'phos so// 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no snyam du dran pa skye'o// shi 'phos pa
158a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus de ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yan lag skyes pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo // dang po shi 'phos pa de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nas sems
158a4(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos pa de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ phyogs kha cig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa gzhi phrag gis gtor ba
158a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ de der chags pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de chags par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i rnam par shes pa de las rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): rul zhing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te/ dper na mi gtsang ba dang ldan ljin mnam po'i rkyen gyis srin bu skye ba dang / dper ma no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chang mnam
158a7(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de bzhin du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bzang skyor gyis thal/
158b1(dkon brtsegs): mo gyur te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags lus kyi rnam pa ni jis bur 'grub/
158b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang myong der khrag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu klung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du rgyu
158b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de dag ni sprin sngon po'i kha dog lhar 'gyur ro// ba tshwa can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi gur 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu bde dgur rim
158b4(dkon brtsegs): gro byas pa ltar gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur te/ mgo bo gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro// sen mo ring zhing la spu yod la srun por 'gyur zhing / rkang lag mi
158b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug par 'gyur te/ gal te 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i mil lhar 'gro ma/ mthong ma thag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i
158b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi/ de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
158b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sman chen sems can dmyal ba de na de dag yongs su 'khyams la/ shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar por snang
159a1(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig rjod par byed de/ kha zas 'dod pa khyed tshur shog ces zer ro// de dag kun nas 'phungs te snyim pa bzeng nas zangs
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dngar gan bskol ba ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas snyim pa bzed cing / zangs dang ra gan bskol ba'i kha zas de dag 'dod pas la gdangs te zangs dpar gan za bar byed do// de dag zangs dang
159a3(dkon brtsegs): ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des su ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing log pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de dag la zas 'dra bas bslus nas sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro// sman chen sems can
159a4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rus pa'i lus ngag la gnas par 'gyur zhing / rus pa'i tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam
159a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de dag bru ba tsha bas gzir bzhin du/ de ma la zas kyi bya ba'ang med do// de na lha'i skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa brgya phrag mang
159a6(dkon brtsegs): po me tog shin tu rgyas pa dag dang / gsing ma sngon po yang ba'i sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo // de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad du grogs po dag skyed
159a7(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i ser bu ldang ba yod kyis tshur shog ces zer te/ de dag 'dus nas myur ba myur bar skyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o// de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde
159b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes skyed do// de dag gi shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dang lo ma de dag ral grir 'gyur te// ral gri de dag gis de dag gi yan lag gcod cing gshog par byed de/ de dag
159b2(dkon brtsegs): ral gris bcad nas nyam thag pa'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed cing / phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro// de dag 'byer na yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshin rje'i mi lag na sog ke dang thob thogs shing
159b3(dkon brtsegs): so dang bzhin bsgyur ba/ sgyu 'bar zhing lus 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yogs la/ mtshon cha gzas pa dag phyi bzhin du skra 'byin cing 'di skad du khyed cag sdod cig dgar 'bros/ khyed rang gi las kyis bsrub
159b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshal 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces zer te/ sman chen de lta na sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas sems can
159b5(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis las nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ bung ba me tog la 'pho ba bzhin du dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs
159b6(dkon brtsegs): su len to// de'ang dang po shi 'phos nas dbang med par khrid de/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas/ mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te/ mi rgod kyis khrid pa bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud da ni bdag
159b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu gling rnam par bkra ba bor te/ gnyen sdug pa yongs su spangs nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon du gnas par gyur cing 'dug cig gu/ nga ni mtho ris kyi lam mi mthong ngo snyam mo// de yang dar gyi srin
160a1(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyud gcig gis dkris pa bzhin du shin su myur bar skye ba yongs su len te/ de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul nas nags pas btags par shes so// bzang skyong de sngar na sems
160a2(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing / de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang skyong spu zing zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su
160a3(dkon brtsegs): song ngo // rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen gyis kyang 'di skad du/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 'dis na bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe log par srung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig bdag sems can dmyal
160a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu ba
160a5(dkon brtsegs): zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa dris shig/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsags pa ni gang lags/ spungs pa ni gang
160a6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ 'pho ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la khams phrad pa'i phyir/ khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par
160a7(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ shes rab dang / lta ba dang / yid dang / ma rig pa dang / khams dang / spyod yul dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni bsags pa zhes bya'o// de la spungs pa ni khams drug po nyid
160b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyi spyod yul drug dang / khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang / skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang / skra dang / la spu dang / sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa dang sha rang
160b2(dkon brtsegs): rnag dang / mchis pa dang bad kan dang / stabs dang / tshol dang / chu ser dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan lag dang / nying lag tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o// dper
160b3(dkon brtsegs): na 'bru spungs pa bzhin te/ nas dang / hil dang / gro dang / mon sran sde'u mang po la srungs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes
160b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khams drug po de dag gang zhe na/ de la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// skye mched
160b5(dkon brtsegs): drug gang zhe na/ 'di la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / rtse dang / lus dang / yid ces bya'o// skye mched kyi spyor yul drug gang zhe na/ 'di la gzugs dang / snga dang / dri dang
160b6(dkon brtsegs): ro dang // reg bya dang / chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba ste/ de dag ni spyod yul drug yin no// de la khams kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na/ 'di la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
160b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug ces bya ba'o// de la de dag nyid kyi kun nas sdang ba gsum gang zhe na/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bar kan rnams so// de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul
161a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / dad pa dang / gtong ba dang / nor dang / rtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba zhes bya'o// de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang ni/
161a2(dkon brtsegs): na'adi la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so// de la tshor ba ni myong ba'o// /
161a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ni shes pa'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so// lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya rnams rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste/ dngos po thams
161a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi khongs su gtogs pas na/ lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang / len pa dang 'thun pa yin no// de la 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang ngag gis
161a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi 'bras bu thob pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yongs su btang nas/ yang srid par mi skye zhing phyir mi ldog pas na/ shin su bde bar 'phen/
161a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro gro/ 'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'phob can ma yin pa de la bu ni de'i 'pho bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bzang skyong dang spyan chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom pa
161a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can rnams tshim par bgyid pa gang lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
161b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' bral pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te// 'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas/ rig pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni dka' ba
161b2(dkon brtsegs): kyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa skye/ 'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin no// chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldang bar byed pa/ yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
161b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar byed pa/ 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/ de ston par 'gyur ba der ni mi ma yin pa rnams srungs par byed de/ lha dang /
161b4(dkon brtsegs): na ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang
161b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chu dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa
161b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phan chad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o// klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu pa rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu ma'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin/
161b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o// ma dris par yang bshad par mi bya'o// de bas na gal he la la 'khrul par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa byas par 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam/
162a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa gang la las 'di rtogs pa de ni phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa bskyed par bya zhing / 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin
162a2(dkon brtsegs): no snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/
162a3(dkon brtsegs): lkog shig/ shod cig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
162a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa 'pho ba zhes bya bar zung
162a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde rnam
162a6(dkon brtsegs): gnom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod par// chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin par 'gyur/ bcom lda
162a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen dang // tshong dpon bzang skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
162b1(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsong ngo // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gis
162b2(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi dra dang / su ren rnga bo d+hi dang / lo tsa ba zhang ye shes rjes bsgyur cing zhus
162b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan la phab pa// bam po gnyis pa// bod skad du/ bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam pa
162b4(dkon brtsegs): dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
162b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brkyang stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te thams cad
162b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang shes par bya ba rnams rab tu shes pa/ gzugs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyes
162b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' lam 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub
163a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sa 'dzin chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mdzes bkod
163a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byu
163a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / gzhan yang bskul pa bzang po'i byang chub
163a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang thabs cig go// gzhan yang sems dpa' zla med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu po de dag dang /
163a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs cig go// gzhan yang skyes bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa bcu drug dang yang thabs cig go// gzhan yang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi sgra'i bu nyi khri
163a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa dag dang yang thabs cig go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su
163a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas bzhugs pas/ nyi zla lta bu'i 'od zer gyis ni kun tu snang bar mdzad/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal po lhar gzi byin gyis khyad par du 'phags/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bur shin tu mtho zhing la
163b1(dkon brtsegs): las ni mngon par 'phags par gyur/ sngon ma chen po lta bur 'od zer dag ni rab tu 'bar/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar phan tshun du ni gzigs par mdzad/ seng ge snga spogs pa lngar bzhengs pa mi mnga'
163b2(dkon brtsegs): bar ni chos brtson par mdzad/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sgra gcan zin mar 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dag gis ni sku rab tu brgyan// gzi byin dang mthu stobs dag ni
163b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad ni nges pa'i don mchog la dgod cing khong du chud par mdzad pa'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du
163b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags nas/ 'khor mang po'i dbus na chos ston par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rnam dag dang ba zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma byang bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis
163b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mos pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// theg pa chen po bsgoms pa zhig yod pa de bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ so so nas gser gyi 'phreng ba thogs nas/ grong khyer mnyan
163b6(dkon brtsegs): yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ phyag byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyog
163b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ yun ring bsod nams rnam dag 'phrin las bsags// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing // mang po dang mos
164a1(dkon brtsegs): su sman lug+sa sa smra sa smra
164a2(dkon brtsegs): sa sa
164a3(dkon brtsegs): nga sas sa / gas sa sa
164a4(dkon brtsegs): mapa gis slong rnams pas tham sarnamam na su ma pa sa ya // snas na mam thus pam shAm 'gyu / rgyas rgyu
164a5(dkon brtsegs): mam pas/ rgyang nu bsams sa myong pa gang lags kyu/ ban ga shesapa pa'i gas ni ba grangs sa// de sta pas na m-i na ba d+ha sa//
164a6(dkon brtsegs): dasrung bam bcing lags/ dI y-i mnyam pa'i tshus ni ba 'gyur cing // hrIs mams can yangs sa sbyin cad lags/ dag kyis na narnamama' dang /
164a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang chu med rtsa bzhin du 'gyur// ji sar yid ches thob nas chos gnas shing // ri rab seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du 'gyur// ji gar byams sngang sems ni mongs spangs nas// sems
164b1(dkon brtsegs): gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis 'gyur// ji sbyar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus pasam gtan rnam rmol ste gyur zhing // shes rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom zhing /
164b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par thabs chen la ni gnas pa dang // cing 'dzin gzungs la thogs pa ma mchis shing // ched med pa ni dang mngon shes lnga la gnas// dgar sangs rgyas rgyan sngar gnas gyur nas/
164b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzus te skye zhing tshe rabs dran// sbyangs pas rtsod pa ma mchis dgon gnas nas// sems ni rab brtul nyon mongs zhi bgyid dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing byang chub lam skom dang // bdud rtsi
164b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog thob bdud dpung 'joms pa dang / bde rtsol chos kyi 'khor lo skor 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i yang dag lam ni bkas bshad gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rnam dag
164b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ba la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na// 'khor ba gnas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur zhing // yongs su ngal ba med par
164b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems kyi 'dun pa'i stobs te ga g.yo rgyu med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te// sdig pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni
164b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'i stobs te ka las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi/
165a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs te/ theg pa dma' ba rnams yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro// drug pa ni byams pa chen po'i stobs te/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni snying rje
165a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i stobs te/ gnod par byas pa rnams dang du len pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spobs te/ dus dus su sad par byed pa'i phyir ro// bu mo 'di stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/
165a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par zhen cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro//
165a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can 'dun pa gang yin pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni spong byed cing // rtag par drang por spyod pas na// yang dag byang chub gzhol
165a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ mos pa'i spobs ni gang yin pa// nyes pa mang po spong byed cing // dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pas ni// yang dag brtson la gnas par 'gyur// byor ba phun sum tshogs gyur pa/
165a6(dkon brtsegs): cag tu legs par rab btsun nas// brtson 'grus bcan par gyur pas na// sems can rnams ni bde bar byed// mngon par yid ches spobs dbang gis// las kyi rnam smin rig pas na// sangs
165a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes yid ches shing // 'jig rten yongs su sdud par 'gyur// byang chub sems stobs gang yin des// theg pa dma' ba spong byed cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas/
165b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur// byams chen stobs kyi dbang gis ni// sems can snyoms par sa byed cing / khyams sdang dag ni med pas na// ne rdzang gnod pa skyed mi 'gyur/
165b2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sems can dang du len byed cing // 'khor ba dag la zhen med cing // yongs su myong zhing ngam pa med// dge ba'i bshegs gnyen rdzobs kyis ni/
165b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag par phan tshun bde byed cing // sems ni bying bar mi 'gyur bas// byang chub la ni gnas par 'gyur// dpa' bo gang yin de dag gis// stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur nas// byang chub
165b4(dkon brtsegs): snying por 'dug nas ni/ bdud dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ro brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni chos thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ chos thams cad rab tu dben
165b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni shes pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir
165b7(dkon brtsegs): ro// lnga pa ni spyod pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni theg pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ 'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa
166a1(dkon brtsegs): ni sems mnyam par gyur pa ste/ sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// brgyang pa ni bdud rnams mnyam par gyur pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i thibs po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
166a2(dkon brtsegs): 'din chos rnam pa brgyad kyis mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can rang bzhin bdag med pas// skang
166a3(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam yang dmigs mi 'gyur// mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa// de lta bur ni bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad mnyam pas na// rang bzhin cag par spong zhing dben// yi shes tha dad bya
166a4(dkon brtsegs): bar zad// chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kun// mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas// de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra// sangs rgyas zhing ni rtag tu
166a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun// chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na// ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no// sems can rang bzhin nu rkyen
166a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams// thams cad kun kyang mnyam pa dang // de yi sbyor pa rab shes pas// ci rigs par ni go bar byed// sems can ji snyed tha dad pa// sgyu 'phrul lta bur rab tu rtogs// phyi nang gnyis ka len med/
166a7(dkon brtsegs): pas// rang bzhin rtag tu rnam par dag/ theg pa sna tshogs rab bshad kyang // 'dus ma byas su rab tu mnyam// 'dren pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas// rnam par phye ste theg gsum bshad// nyon mongs/
166b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud la rab gnas kyang // non mongs dngos po ci yang med// sa dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud// spyod yul thams cad spong ba yin/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
166b2(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byams sdang rnams yongs su spong bar byed do// brgyad gang zhe na ka byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rtag par ban 'dogs par byed pa dang / 'jig can
166b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos la ma chags pa dang / rang gi lus la chags pa med pa dang / rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems sgom pa dang / lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa sde
166b4(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par sgrub par nus na/ byams sdang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byams sems go cha
166b5(dkon brtsegs): rab bgos nas// thams cad kun la snying brtse zhing // mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa// byams sdang sems ni skye mi 'gyur// blo ldan phan 'dogs spyod pas na// rtag par gzhan la bde/
166b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gtong // rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mthong // brnyas shing smad kyang khon 'dzin med// rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyod pas// byams sdang dag ni mi skye zhing // bdag gam gal te gzhan yang rung //
166b7(dkon brtsegs): byams sdang 'du shes yongs mi skye// 'du shes dag ni rab spangs nas// spyod yul dag la zhen pa med// rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas// lus srog dag la 'phangs pa med// mkhas rnams
167a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bde ba yis// g.yos par mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// nan mongs legs par rtogs byed na// bdag dang bdag gi gnyis kA thong // khyod 'dzim
167a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par sa 'dra bas// byams sdang dag ni yongs mi skye/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na// 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// brgyad
167a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang / sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing mchod par byed pa'i phyir dang / sangs
167a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir dang / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dang / chos khyad par can dag la
167a5(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa med pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka'
167a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rnal 'byor lam ni gang sgom pa// dge sbyong skyon 'dun dri ma med// bar snang rnam dag zla ba bzhin// sdug bsngal sems can sgrol bar byed// yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir//
167a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// sems can rang bzhin rtog med cing // rab brtan brtson 'grus spyod par byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas//
167b1(dkon brtsegs): de phyir spobs bcu gang ldan pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'jig cen tshad med dpag tu med// bsam gyi mi khyab chos ston cing // dkon mchog gsum gdung mi gcod pas/
167b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rgyal nyid du mngon 'tshang rgya// tshul khrims dam por gang srung ba// 'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa// rmi lam sprin dang klog lhar shes// chos las gang zhig
167b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol ba// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// byang chub la ni rab gnas shing // dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde// thabs kyi pha rol gang yin pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// rtag par
167b4(dkon brtsegs): dam chos sgrub pa yang // bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan gang mos pas// 'khor ba yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'khor ba mu mtha' med gyur kyang // rtag par yang dag
167b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la gnas// yud tsam shes rab rjes 'thun pa// 'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan na/ sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/
167b6(dkon brtsegs): sems sa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems chu dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems me dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems rlung dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems nam mkha'
167b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par gyur
168a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems ni
168a2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang mtshungs pas na// thams cad khur du khyer bar byed// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung // 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa'ang med// sems ni chu dang mtshungs pas na// dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed cing //
168a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams ni gso ba dang // nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed// sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na// nyon mongs dag ni sreg byed cing // sgron ma chen po snang ba yis// gsal bar mi byed gang yang
168a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na// gnas pa med cing rten med par// tshul khrims thos pa'i dri yis ni// dus gsum kun tu khyad par byed// sems ni mkha' dang mtshungs pas na//
168a5(dkon brtsegs): ba spong zhing rnam par dag/ thams cad kun tu 'jug byed cing // bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed// sem ni chos dbyings mtshungs pas na// bde banyid du rab gnas shing // 'phel ba med cing 'grib/
168a6(dkon brtsegs): med par// rtag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug/ nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// rnam par grol ba thob gyur kyang // 'chi ba dag kyang yod min la// grol ba dag kyang yod pa min// 'khor ba dang ni mya
168a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med ces// rab dbe ma nyer zhi gnas nas ni// dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed/ gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brkyang dang ldan pa'i byang chub
168b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa
168b2(dkon brtsegs): ni tshul khrims 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni bzod pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung
168b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas su gyur pa yin te/ le lo med cing nur ba med pa'i phyir ro// rdza pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni shes rab 'byung gnas su gyur
168b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rnam par grol bas nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// brgyad
168b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mngon par shes pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka'
168b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong ba// 'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na// 'bras bu rnam smin mi re bar// sangs rgyas byang chub sngo bar byed// khrims ldan theg pa chen po'i phyir// bcad
168b7(dkon brtsegs): cing gsubs kyang khong khro med// rtse gcig se chen gnyer byed cing // bag chags spangs nas 'gog mngon byed// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// bgal mang sems can ched du ni/
169a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rtem nu// brtson 'grus stobs ni 'phel bar byed// bsam gtan dag ni gang sgom pa// spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing // bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur/
169a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang // bsam gtan rjes su yongs mi skye// shes rab chen po tshungs med pas// mthar lha rnams ni spong byed cing // 'jig rten stong dben rig pas na// gti mug mun pa ma lus sel// gnyer zhi tshad
169a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas gang sgom pa// ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na// rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur// don gyis phan pa nan tan bsgoms// mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba// sangs rgyas brten bkur chos kyang nyan//
169a4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin mos pa rab shes pas// chos bshad sems cad zlos par byed/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs
169a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par 'gyur ro// brgyang gang zhe na/ chos la bu mar byed pa'i phyir dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la rim gro byed pa'i b+hir dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji sang thos pa bzhin du/
169a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir dang / chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la mtshan po bzhin du gus pas srinu byed pa'i phyir dang / na/
169a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa thang bar skul bar byed pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i rdzobs pa sun su mtshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba zhes
169b1(dkon brtsegs): 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig tug tu chos gnyer ba// mkhan po rig pa shes ris po byung // sdig pa'i grogs po thong bas na/
169b2(dkon brtsegs): mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur// mang thos yongs su rgyo med pa// rab brtson chos ni gcer bar byed// ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pas// rnyed pa dag la chol med// thabs pa rnam dag gang thob pa//
169b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na// chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing // ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed// chos skyong mngon par zhen med cing // gzugs ni gang zhig thob gyur pa// khrims srung rang
169b4(dkon brtsegs): lus lta bas na// gzhan gyi nyes skyon yongs mi tshol// byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing // dus min tshig ni mi smra bas// thogs med spobs pa thob gyur nas// spo tshig pha rol phyin pa ston// chos
169b5(dkon brtsegs): ni legs par smra ba la// mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed// skyon 'chab nyes pa spong bskul bas// mi zad kun 'dzin rgya mtsho 'thob/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
169b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ srog la bab par gyur na'ang gzhan gyi nyes pa mi rjod pa dang / sems can rnams
169b7(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar skul ba dang / thams cad byang chub kyi sems la 'god pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas
170a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang / sems can mya ngan byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang / khengs shing nga rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag nyid dman par byed pa dang /
170a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur kyang // nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi sba/
170a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyer bskul nas// rtag tu tshangs par gang spyod pa// sangs rgyas
170a4(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar rdzus te skye// gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs brgyan te// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan la bzhag/ sems can mya ngan gang sel ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus he skye// nga rgyal byed pa de dag la//
170a5(dkon brtsegs): slob ma bzhin du bdag dman zhing // gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na sbyangs pa'i
170a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rtag par dgon pa na gnas par mos par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs
170a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dang / dge bas bdag nyid gso bar byed pa dang / rtag par 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par skyo ba dang / rtag
170b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par sgrub dang / dad pa shin su bcan zhing gzhan dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o// de nas
170b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pas// chos dga' dge mang bdag nyid gso// rtag par 'phags rigs sgrub la mos/
170b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag/ sbyangs pa dag la rtug mos pas// bse ru gcig lhar grogs kyang med/ 'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces// blo yis rab dang brtson 'grus
170b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas// chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'bral// rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags// sbyangs pas thag bsrings gdung ba med// rtsod smras nyes dmigs mang po med// nye ba shes yongs spangs
170b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa rjod// des na dgon par gnas la mos/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed de/ brgyad gang
170b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang /
170b7(dkon brtsegs): 'the tshom dang som nyi mong pa dang / skye ba med pa rab su bzod pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor cig cing / de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi
171a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa// rnam thar gsum thob
171a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud dpung rab tu 'joms// 'dus byas 'dus min mtshan nyid gnyis su med// skye med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur// chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa// de dag bdud dpung rab tu
171a3(dkon brtsegs): pham par byed// skye ba med dang 'gag med 'di dag dang // phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra// chos la ngo bo nyid med nges rtogs shing // de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs thabs mkhas pas// chos rnams
171a4(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las zhes gang byed pa// rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka rab sbyor cing // yod dang stong la gnas pa med par ni// de ltar chos mchog gang zhig sgom
171a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// thabs mkhas gzugs lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ byang chub dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/
171a6(dkon brtsegs): ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta bas log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i
171a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su sdud pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba yongs su zlog pa dang /
171b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log pas 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag bslang nas/ gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yang dag lha dang
171b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ldan pa// log lha de dag smin par byed// rtag par yang dag dran sgom pa// log sems dag la brtse bar byed// rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni// log sgra rnams la brtse bar byed// yang dag las
171b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gnas pa yis// log pa'i las can sdud par byed// rtag par yang dag rtsol bsgoms nas// log brtson dag ni spyod mi byed// yang dag 'tsho bas rjes mthun pas// log 'tsho gang yin sdud par
171b5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ blo ldan yang dag cog pa yis// log par yid byed brtse bar sems// yang dag cing 'dzin rtag gnas nas// log pa'i ting 'dzin srung bar byed// bla med yang dag lam brgyad kyis// nu bo dag las de/
171b6(dkon brtsegs): bar sgrol// rgyan phyogs ded pa zlog byed pas// de ni byang chub lam chen yin// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams// rtswa yi gzing bzhin bdag nyid zlos// byang chub sems dpa' kun zlos pas// dper na glu chen 'dren
171b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'dra/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi'i lam mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ rtsod pa med pa'i chos sa
