198b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ga shung dang gsod pa dang // 'ching bar byed dang go rar bcug pa la// bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi byed// las ni bdag gir bya bas khon mi 'dzin// de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub
198b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dad la gnas shing bsam pa dag ldan pa// 'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs rgyas gsungs// sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsnyen par bya// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
198b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dmu rgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/ rjes su bstan pa la
199a1(dkon brtsegs): gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / slob dpon dang mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas pa la nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun lhod de/ dad pas byin pa log par srung /
199a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do// de la 'di skad ces
199a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ thos pas rgod par gnas par byed pa yin// rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba ste// 'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med// dam bcas nyams kyang dad
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pas byin pa yi// kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za// byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag/ mthong bar gyur na gug par mi byed cing // dmu rgod de ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'
199a5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal bcag mi sten// 'di dag dam rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang
199a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par thos par nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de/ don la con gyi/ tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ gdams pa rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin
199a7(dkon brtsegs): cing / bka' thob de ba legs par byed pa'i las byed cing bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las mnyams te cang shes pas zas za ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul pa/
199b1(dkon brtsegs): cang shes rnams mthong na gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par de la gzhol/ de la 'bab/ de la bab cing / de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes
199b2(dkon brtsegs): so de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang mnyan de ni legs par thos par byed// chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas// rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed cing // chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar
199b3(dkon brtsegs): bla ma zhe na// tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la cag gnas shing // tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za// gus dang bcas shing zhesar bcas pa yin// de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod/
199b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob 'gyur ba// de dag la ni rtag tu dga' bas lha// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni// bde gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin/
199b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can
199b6(dkon brtsegs): snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang // rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas shing / tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can kun tu sdud pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa
200a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs sprin ma byas rnams la yid mi non// sdod min rnams la rgya chen
200a2(dkon brtsegs): chos mi bshad// rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman// byang chub sems dpa'i mchog gis bshad mi bya// yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan// dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya/
200a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu// sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya// 'khrul pa'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' rgyang bsring rnam par spang /
200a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bsten na byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spang / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
200a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad
200a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya// sangs rgyas theg mchog
200a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/ rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya// sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya// yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas// sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bya/
200b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te/ rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag cag tu bsten/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ba shes gnyen ngan pa grogs ngan pa ste/ de dag
200b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang /
200b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi/ chos kun mi sdung ba ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang
200b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyan thos gang dag bdag pa na brtson pa dang // gang
200b5(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod// rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing // bdag gi don tu 'du 'dzin rnam par spong // byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang 'phen klog/ ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag
200b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dir rtsod byed// gang la brtan na zang zing kun sdud kyi// chos 'di nam yang sdud par mi byed pa// chos bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas// dge ba'i gshes gnyen bzhi la btsun par
200b7(dkon brtsegs): bya/ 'di dag gshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du// rgyal bas gsungs te thag bsring yongs su spang / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/
201a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab ston pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub
201a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
201a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub yongs su
201a4(dkon brtsegs): ston phyir len pa po// sbyin byed rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin// chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par bde gshegs gsungs// gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa// de dag dge rtsa yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni ston pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes// rgyal bas bsngags pa bzhi po 'di dag ni//
201a6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te// 'di dag sten cing rtag tu bag yod na// bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
201a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer gyi/ chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sna tshogs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyi
201b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan don du gcer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi/ dben pa don du gce
201b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lhar bcos pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'dod min// brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min//
201b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer// 'khor tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod// bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa// bzhi po de dag
201b4(dkon brtsegs): bcos par gsungs pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan
201b5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhi ga pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la'ang mos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang yid ches pa dang / de bdag med par yang bzod la/ sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje che ba dang
201b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba na'ang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa gtor yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la'ang mi re ba ste/
201b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang / las kyi
202a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches so// bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang // sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// de'i bus ma rtag tu mya ngan 'das la
202a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas// de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yi// yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang // las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
202a3(dkon brtsegs): gter chen po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos sba ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang /
202a4(dkon brtsegs): bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes
202a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan// chos sgru ba la sems ni rab tu dang // mthong na cag tu gus pa skyed par byed// rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas// de ni de nyid la yang cag
202a6(dkon brtsegs): tu dga'// bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// gcer chen yin zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las
202a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtogs pa dang /
202b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems ni
202b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong mi byed// sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong // lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed// sems can tshogs la brnyas par yong mi byed// bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di
202b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni// bdud las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs// 'di dag bsnyen na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa// gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di
202b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i
202b5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhi po dag dang / sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson
202b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus te/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong //
202b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed// dam chos yongs su btsal ba brtsams byas nas// lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed// dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba// yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu
203a1(dkon brtsegs): ngoms mi myong // dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs 'od srungs bani po 'di dag ni bya
203a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lha ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /
203a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang / nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pas sten pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o// de la 'di
203a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis su// chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che// gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems skyed 'jug/ nyam chung rnams
203a5(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pas dang du len// 'di ni dge chos sdung bar gsungs pa ste// de dag bkren na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na// byang chub sems dpas de dag cag tu bskyen/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag
203a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos sa
203a7(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / tha na 'dris pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa ste/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o/
203b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed dang // dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin pa dang // de bzhin thun 'dris la sbyin byed cing // mkhas pa ma rigs las rnam par 'byed/
203b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dri lta sgo/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
203b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag
203b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa// sdig pa'i bzhi pa bcu po rnam spangs nas// mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan sten na// 'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di//
203b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tam klog gam rab tu ston byed pa// de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsungs// de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnams brjod do// gang gis zhing ni gad+hA'i bye ma snyed// rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul
203b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bas// gang gis 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog/ bsod nams 'di yi grangs su mi phod do// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'
203b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes mi bya'i/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'od srungs/
204a1(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum cu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba
204a2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang / bdag ci ri zhes yongs su 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / bcos
204a3(dkon brtsegs): ma ma yin par byams pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang / tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang / khur
204a4(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongs su ma gcad pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi
204a5(dkon brtsegs): myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du rtsa zhing / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re
204a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtong ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
204a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par bsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thabs mkhas pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang ga/ tshul
204b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams sa gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par byas te chos nyan ma dang / gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
204b2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod cing / theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po
204b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spong zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / thub pa dang / log par sgrub
204b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad par smra ba dang / bden pa ces su byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu
204b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can kun la phan dang bde bya ba'i// lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa yin// kun mkhyen ye shes
204b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems sgrol zhing // ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog/ smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med// bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams// mdza' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyom//
204b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug bar du// sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por smra bar byed// khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med// sems can dag la snying
205a1(dkon brtsegs): rje yongs ma bcad// dam chos yongs su tshol la skyo ba med// thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon wa// gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med// spyod lam rnams su
205a2(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rab tu sbyong // gtong ba rnam par sprin la re ba med// tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin// sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spang // dge pa yang dag sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus
205a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs med khams spungs pa yi bsam gtan dang // thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang // bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin thabs dang // khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa/
205a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang // gus par byas te dgon zhir gnas pa dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang // theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed cing // theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed
205a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu bsten pa dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang // mngon shes rnam sngas rtag tu rtsen pa dang // ye shes
205a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang // sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang // sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang // gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang // bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang // byang
205a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis chos// 'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bsnyen par bya// byang chub sems
205b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang yin pa dag ni// chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ 'od srungs dpe nye bar dgod pa bskrun pa gang dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
205b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe zhes par dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan
205b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa la re ba med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'ang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du ngan
205b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par re ba med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper nas 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho// lan la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa// rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas
205b5(dkon brtsegs): su/ ma gyur bar du skye bo kun gyi 'tsho// lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med// bu dang dgra la yid kyis mtshungs par sems// byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su tshol/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/
205b6(dkon brtsegs): dper na chu'i khams ni rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa sems can thams cad la byams pas/
205b7(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byas te gnas pa'ang sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu ni rtswa dang gel ba dang // nags tshal sman dang 'bru ni rnam par skyed// de bzhin byang
206a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa// sems can mtha' yas byams pas khyab par byed// sna tshogs chos la khyab byas rim gyis su// dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par rgyas 'gyur zhing /
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dpung bcas ste dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// rim gyis rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na me'i khams ni lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do//
206a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams cad kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na me ni rtswa dang sman rnams dang // lo
206a4(dkon brtsegs): tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed// de bzhin de gshegs sras kyi shes rab kyang // skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na rlung gi khams ni sangs
206a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// de la 'di skad
206a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa bzhin// rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par sgrub// de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par
206a7(dkon brtsegs): sbub/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan pa 'am/ yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so//
206b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'ang bdud thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan pa 'am/ yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la
206b2(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'ang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
206b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang ngo la// skye zhing yongs su gang 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // dkar po'i chos kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur/
206b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las lan cig byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad la snang bar byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan cig dru
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la shes pa'i snang ba byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nyi las lan cig byung ba yi// 'od zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed// de
206b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgyal sras ye shes 'od zer gyis// sems can rnams la shes rab snang ba byed/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jig
206b7(dkon brtsegs): mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
207a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag/ ye shes la gnas pa'ang g.yas par 'gro ba thams car du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'phrog/ de la 'di skad ces partse// ri dgas rgyam po yang gi rab can/ 'dzum
207a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par gang du 'dod par 'gro// de bzhin byang chub sems dang 'a tshul rnams dang // chos dang ye shes gnas padag 'dagyur 'alo/ 'od drug 'dzin no/ pe na dul ma
207a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe shin tu dul pa ni khal thams cad khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin su dul ba'ang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phung po lnga'i khur khyer byas
207a4(dkon brtsegs): chos su ma // des 'din ces d+ha ne/ dpe na yung la thobs can thang pos// kha rnams kyi mang yongasasu kyob mes/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems rang dus// mas nam byu gyi rdzo
207a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa rdzas rgyas sa na sa su 'ag gru
207a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// ngas 'di skad ces byartse// dper na na rgyalas skyes gyur kyang // chu'am rdza ba kyis de la gos pa med// sa kyin byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyis// 'jog rten chos kyi rnam ma dgos pa med/
207a7(dkon brtsegs): 'o sum 'dis kyi/ dab ma shing ldan pa lalags cad pa cing mdzang mapang sangs las byo'o// 'a bya sa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mangs pa ma pa'i lamags
207b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun tu sbyor ba ma nyams na slar yang khams gsum du skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing ljon yal ga bcad ba ni// rtsa ba brtan pa ma snad slar yang skye/
207b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rtsa bgu sbyor ma spangs na// thabs kyis bsal kyang slar yang skye bar 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po chu'i phung po rgya mtsho chen
207b3(dkon brtsegs): por bab pa ni/ 'di lha sde/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mo tha dad pa nas bsags pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa thams cad kyang
207b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams// rgya mtsho cher bab ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin// tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsags
207b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa// byang chub bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta rtse/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ros dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri ba la gnas so// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang
207b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal chen bani yi ris rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas// de ba'i
207b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dgar gnas te// thams cad mkhyen nyid thob nas chos rnams ston/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper mthon pos yongs su zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad
208a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya
208a2(dkon brtsegs): skye/ dper na blon por ldan pa'i rgyal po rnams// bya ba thams cad rtag tu byed pa ltar// thabs ldan byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang // sangs rgyas don rnams rtag tu byed pa yin/
208a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lha ste// dper na sprin med cing na mthang ba'i nam mkha' la ni char 'bab pa'i rgyu med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba la' dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bab pa'i rgyu med do//
208a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sprin med nam thang nam mkha' la// char 'bab rgyu ni nams kyang mi dmigs so// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thos nyung la// chos ston nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//
208a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo tog thams cad la mngon par 'bab bo// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / mang du thos pa'i chos kyi sprin las byung
208a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi char yang sems can thams cad la mngon par 'bab po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sprin chen glog dang bcas pa las// char pa 'bab pas lo tog ngoms par byed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dam
208a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi// sprin byung chos rgyun sems can tshim par byed/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'byung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
208b1(dkon brtsegs): gang du byung ba der byang chub kyis phyogs kyi chos sum rgya rtsa bdun po dag kyang 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor los byur ba'i rgyal po gar byung ba// der ni de yi rin chen rdza bdun 'byung // byang chub sems dngapa 'ag
208b2(dkon brtsegs): du byung gyur pa// der de'i byang chub yan lag bdun po 'byung / 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na gang na nor bu rin po che bai DUrar+ya 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na/ kar sha pa Na brgya sdong mang po 'byung ba'i sgo
208b3(dkon brtsegs): yod do// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na gang du nor bu rin chen
208b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // der ni kar sha pa Na mang 'byung ltar// gang du rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 'byung ba// der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i
208b5(dkon brtsegs): tshal du zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rnams ni mtshungs par gnas so// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'i sbyor ba'ang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad la mtshungs par 'gyur
208b6(dkon brtsegs): ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'dres pa'i tshal gnas lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pa yin// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // sems can rnams la rtag tu legs
208b7(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so// 'od srungs de bzhin du ye shes dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i
209a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par lhung bar byed mi nus so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i dug/ skye bo rnams la zhes
209a2(dkon brtsegs): pabyed mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can// nyon mongs rnams kyis log lhung byad mi nus/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na grong khyer chen po rnams kyi lung gang yin pa de ni
209a3(dkon brtsegs): bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang / rgun gyi zhing dag la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin
209a4(dkon brtsegs): no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lung // de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs lud// de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan pa byed//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na 'bong rtsal ma bslabs pa las mtshon thabs slob pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba las dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / dpyod pa dang /
209a6(dkon brtsegs): don 'dzin pa'i shes par blta'o// 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na som btang ba'i snod rnams la ni rdza mkhan gyis me chen po gtang dgos so// 'od srungs de bzhin du shes rab ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la'ang
209a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me chen po gtang dgos par blta'o// 'od srungs de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas tshul
209b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// 'od srungs de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa'o// 'od
209b2(dkon brtsegs): srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'od srungs gang la bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / skyes bu med pa
209b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes med pa dang / shed bu med par so sor rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang
209b4(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang gzugs la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / 'od srungs de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
209b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gang rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs
209b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang sa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang //
209b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag
210a1(dkon brtsegs): par so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang dbu ma'i las chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang mig gis skye mched la rtag par yang so sor mi chog
210a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / b+hU dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste
210a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// mi rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi
210a4(dkon brtsegs): dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog
210a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs bdag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// bdag med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni/ dpyad du med pa/ brgyan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ rnang ba med pa/
210a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs sems yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// sems yang dag pa
210a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// 'od srungs gang na sems med pa dang / sems pa med pa dang / yid med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so/
210b1(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas
210b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// 'od srungs kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha'
210b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis las mi len cing / mi rjod mi smra ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs yod ces bya ba de ni mtha'
210b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig go// med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni/ dbyang du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/
210b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes pa'o// 'od srungs 'khor ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis
210b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor
210b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs gang yang ngas khyed rnams la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs// ming dang gzug
211a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ bye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/
211a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
211a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang
211a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa/
211a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
211a6(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa de la/ 'od srungs rig pa dang ma rig pa de dag gnyis
211a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'od srungs 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / 'dus ma//
211b1(dkon brtsegs): byas dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs 'gag pa dang / skye mched drug dang / kye mched drug 'gag pa dang / reg pa dang
211b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa 'gag pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba 'gag pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa 'gag pa dang / len pa dang / len pa 'gag pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa 'gag pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba 'gag
211b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rga shi dang / rga shi 'gag pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing / rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med dag / 'od srungs 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes
211b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid stong pa dang / gang mtshan ma med
211b5(dkon brtsegs): pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ston pa med pa dang / gang mngon par 'du byed
211b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma skyes pa dang / gang ma
211b7(dkon brtsegs): byung bas chos rnams ma byung bar mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma byung ba dang / gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ngo bo nyid med par gang dag de ltar so sor cog
212a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// yang 'od srungs gang zag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid
212a2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'o// 'od srungs sngon gyi mtha' stong pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' spong ba/ da ltar byung ba stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la ma yin no// 'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas/
212a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ ngas gsungs rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams shes bshad do// 'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa bla'i// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni/
212a4(dkon brtsegs): de lha ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do//
212a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na mi nad pa zhig yod la/ sman pas de la sman btang nas/ sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de/ sman lhon 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi nas
212a6(dkon brtsegs): de las thar bar 'gyur ram gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te/ gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas/ sman lhor mchis pa nyid ma byung na/ me de'i blo nad shin tu tshabs che bar
212a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi
212b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pas nad ni brasal ba'i phyir// mi zhig la ni bkru wAn btang ba las// nad rnams brjod nas 'grus par mgyur na// de yi gzhi las nang
212b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sos mi 'gyur// de bzhin lta ba thibs por gnas pa las// 'byung ba'i mchog ni stong pa nyid yin na// gang zhig spong pa kho nar sgrar gyur pa// de ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs/
212b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di sa ste/ dper na mi la la zhig nam mkhas 'jigs skra ga nas brang rdung zhing du ste/ nam mkha' 'di sol nam mkha' 'di sol ces de skad ces zer na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/
212b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' de bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mo thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag thong pa nyid
212b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis skrag/ rab tu skrag na/ de dag ni sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs de dag ni stong pa nyid la spyod la/ de nyid kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro//
212b6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nam mkhas 'jigs pas nyen pa'i mi// blun po nam mkha' 'di ni sol zhes zer// nam mkha' bsal bar nus pa ma yin yang // rmongs pas byis pa dag gi de skad
212b7(dkon brtsegs): lnga/ de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig/ stong pa nyid kyis smad cing sems 'khrugs pa// byis pa de dag stong pa nyid spyod pa// stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang gzhig mi nus/ 'od
213a1(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri mo mkhan zhig bdag nyid kyis gnod sbyin gyis gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lnga zhig bris nas/ des 'jigs skrag ste khas bub tu 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa de
213a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ 'od srungs byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba na 'khor yang chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so//
213a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis// gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs byas nas// de yis 'jigs te las bub hu// 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa sbyar// byis pa so so'i skye bo kun/
213a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa yi// gzugs sgra la sogs rmongs gyur nas// 'gro ba drug tu 'khyams par 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu ma sprul nas/ sprul
213a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des sgyu ma mkhan nyid zod pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang gang dang gang yid la byed pa de thams cad de la gsog tu snang ngo // gsob dang / spong ba dang / snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo //
213a6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis mngon sprul pa// sgyu ma byas pa de yis de zos spar// rnal 'byor pas ni yid la gang byed pa// de ni de la gsob dang gsog tu snang / 'od srungs
213a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drul ba de las me byung ste/ byung nas shing de gnyis sreg pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs yang dag par so sor rtog pa yod na 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/ de skyes
213b1(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag par so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis rdul ba las// me byung nas ni de nyid sreg par byed// de bzhin gshes rab dbang po
213b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas kyang // so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mar mi bus na mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang / mun pa mun nag de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'a
213b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su'ang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srungs mar me de 'di snyam du bdag gis mun pa mun nag bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/
213b4(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang mar me la brten nas/ mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de la mar me gang yin pa dang / mun pa mun nag gang yin pa de gnyis ka stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// 'od srung
213b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi shes pa med par 'gyur yang / mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ shar rdzogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byung phyogs su'ang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do//
213b6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'od srungs ye shes kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes pa bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang ye shes la brten nas mi shes pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de la ye shes gang yin pa dang /
213b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sgron mas mun pa mun nag kun// med par gyur kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med// de bzhin
214a1(dkon brtsegs): shes byung mi shes med gyur kyang // de ni gang nas 'ong 'am 'gro ba med// sgron mas mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang // snang ba byung nas mun pa med par 'gyur// stong pa gzung
214a2(dkon brtsegs): med nam mkha'i me tog 'dra// de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ka thong / 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper ma khyim mam/ khang pa 'am/ khang bran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ag
214a3(dkon brtsegs): yang mar me ma bus pa der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ mun pa mun nag de 'di snyam du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsags pa yin te/ bdag 'di nas mi 'gro
214a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te/ mar me bus na mun pa mun nag la mi 'chi ba'i mthu ma mchis kyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar ma mchis par 'gyur lags
214a5(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'ang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro//
214a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od sras mar me zhes bya ba de mi 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srungs sun pa ma dag ces bya ba de ni phags bla ma yin pa'i las dang na tshangs pa'i tshig sa dgas so//
214a7(dkon brtsegs): des 'dzin pas // sa tsu dum ga' las mos// ring gyig sems sa ma lus byas na// des su gnas yin kyis// 'a sa mi 'gro byas nu mas pa ma
214b1(dkon brtsegs): byung nas mun pa mun nag la// med par mi 'gyur ba yi nus med de// mar me brten nas mun pa med par 'gyur// gnyis ka stong pa rlom sems ci yang med// de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes
214b2(dkon brtsegs): brtan// mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur// ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang // de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs po med// ye shes mi shes med bya mi sems kyang // ye shes
214b3(dkon brtsegs): brten nas mi shes med par 'gyur// gnyis ka gzung med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin// de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ka skyong / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni sa bon rnams
214b4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung / mi byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mkha' las sa bon skye ba ni// 'das
214b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar med// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las sangs rgyas chos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lud kyis gang ba'i sa la ni sa bon
214b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud kyis gang ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na lung bcas
214b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang bcas pa la// sa bon skye yi dgon dung rnams na min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper
215a1(dkon brtsegs): na 'brog dgon pa dgon dung rnams ni pad+ma mi skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung / mi 'byung ngo //
215a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad+ma chu rdzing rnams na skye// dgon rung dag na nams kyang skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin 'dus ma byas la sangs rgyas chos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur//
215a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lung yod pa'i 'dam rdzab nas pad+ma skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lung yod pa'i 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub
215a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lung bcas 'dam rdzab chu las ni// pad+ma skye yi thang las nam yang min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras
215a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar gsar gyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus
215a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa la bsdu bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgya mtsho bzhi po mar gsar gyis// yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas yid du 'ong // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs zas// dge
215a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i klung gis rtag tu gang bar blta/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis phra tshal pa brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu thigs pa gcig blangs
215b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu yi phung po de las ni// grwatshul brgya yi rtse mos thigs blangs pa/
215b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyan thos rnams kyis dge byas pa'i// dge ba dag dang ldan par brda bar bya/ 'od srungs 'di lnga ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi nam mkha' bzhin du nyan thos kyi
215b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa yi// nang gi nam mkha' de ni chung ba yin// nyan thos 'dus ma byas pa shes pa yang // de bzhin chung zhing
215b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu chung bar blta/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na
215b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na// nam mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa med par 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas// 'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar bsku/ 'od srungs
215b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i btsun mo dam pa skyes pa dbul po dang nyal nas/ byis de las bu byung bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ de rgyal po'i bu zhes bya
215b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos kyi dbyings las skyes mos kyi
216a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur ba'i 'os shes mi bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo yid 'ong ma// skyes pa dbul po dang ni nyal
216a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min// de bzhin nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa// de dag da bu dbang bskur 'os ma yin// 'di ltar de
216a3(dkon brtsegs): dag bdag la phan phyir brtson// bdag bzhan gnyis ka'i don byed sangs rgyas sras/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zan mo ngan
216a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/ 'od srungs de bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang / de la rgyal po'i sras zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'khor ba na 'khor/
216a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob tu zin kyang / de ni de bzhin gshes pa'i sras zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba zan mo dang // nyal bar gyur pa de las bu
216a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba// bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de// rgyal po'i sras shes 'jig rten zer ba ltar// byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa// sring ba gsum na 'khor zhing mthu
216a7(dkon brtsegs): chung skye// sbyin dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul yang // sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sras shes bya// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//
216b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon nu spobs che zhing mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ mthu rnyed pa skyong yod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i
216b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang mi ldan na/ de dag la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos bye ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub
216b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpar ma gyur na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi bskyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi bdag rgyal po'i sras stong po// 'ga' yang bu yi mtshan dang mi ldan na/
216b4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir de dag gces byed mi nus pas// de la mi mchog pu yi 'du shes med// de bzhin sangs rgyas zham 'bring bye ba mang // 'ga' yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin na// de na byang chub sems dpa'
216b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' med phyir// de la ba gshegs sras su dgongs mi mdzad/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i
216b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon te/ 'byung ba chen po mer mer por 'dug kyang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la lha rnams re bskyed kyi/ gzhon nu stobs che la mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing
216b7(dkon brtsegs): mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dbang po yongs su ma
217a1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa'ang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la sngon
217a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams re ba skyed kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de la
217a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo mchog/ de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags// stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re ba skyed// gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin
217a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas shing // 'khor bar gnas he byang chub tshol byed pa// de la lha dang klu rnams re ba skyed// rnam thar brgyad po bsam gtan byed la min//
217a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUn+da gcig gis mching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rab tsam zil gyis gnon to// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po
217a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'od gsal rin chen bai DUr+yas// mching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon
217a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas/ nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na bya ka la bing ka'i zug gu sgo nga'i sbubs na
217b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa mig mabye ba'ang 'di lta ste/ zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i
217b2(dkon brtsegs): zho nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rang rib kyi ming tog gis mig legs pa'ang 'di rtsa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzo ba'i sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
217b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gnon to// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu/ tshong dpon dang / grong rdal gyi
217b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad dang / rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed pa la'ang sgra dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal
217b5(dkon brtsegs): lo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa bdag chen po rgyal po la// mtshan gyis lus spras bu zhig yod gyur na// gzhon nu de ni btsas par mthong ma thag/ grong khyer mi dang rgya la phran thams cad 'dud//
217b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag/ mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal zhing // dang ba'i sems kyis shin tu gces par 'dzin/ 'od srungs
217b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la sman gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med/ ris su bcad pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ nad gang la btang yang nad de rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin
218a1(dkon brtsegs): / du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par mi rtog par grub cing / sems can thams cad la rnams pa'i sems kyis gso par rab tu sbyor ro/
218a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya rtse/ dper na rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la// sngan gyis de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med// gang la btang ba de kun zhi bar byed// kha cig nad dang na ba'ang sel bar byed// de bzhin rgyal ba'i rdzas
218a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ldan// yang dag sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas// sems can pan phyir thams cad yang dag sdug/ snyoms pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed/ 'od srungs 'di /
218a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na zlab chos pal phyag 'tshal bcar/ nyal ba la ni ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang dag ngal rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa phyag phyi'i// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ldan
218a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir nen// byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni can thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo // de la 'di meskad ces bya
218a6(dkon brtsegs): thathamasas rnangs pa gyu te// thab nas nang byag mi sa// gang dag nga dag gis mas kyang chu sems sa thun la / 'ad zungs
218a7(dkon brtsegs): me mna'i phyim sa ni btsun gyis thams cad 'dzin pashes pa'i dzin du ga/ 'dasus ba meng byang chum thams pa' mas da sa myed 'angasas rgyas kyim par
218b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gro'o// 'od srungs 'di sa ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ sums kyang sar ma'i gzugs
218b2(dkon brtsegs): la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas so// 'od srungs de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste/
218b3(dkon brtsegs): thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshal lo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sus kyang zla ba rnam par spangs nas su// skar ma'i tshogs la nam yang phyag ma byas// de bzhin bslab la zhugs pa nam du yang // dasras btang ste/
218b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos phyag mi 'tshal/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na sgra dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang / mching bu'i nor bu nam yang nor bu rin po che bai nuR+Ya mi 'gyur ro//
218b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste bla na med
218b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis// mching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ mching bur dag ste bai nurlur mi 'gyur// 'di 'dra de nyid de yi rang bzhin yin// de bzhin can thos khrims dang thos pa dang / bsam gtan ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun sngan yang / byang chub rnying
219a1(dkon brtsegs): por 'dug sde bdud btul nas/ byang chub reg skye bde gshegs 'gyur ba med/ 'od srungs 'di sa ste dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya byi dor byas na/
219a2(dkon brtsegs): de kar shra pa Na brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi byi dor byas na/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//
219a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rin chen bai DUR+Ya ni sbyangs byas na/ kar sha pa Na mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas sras kyi sbyangs byas na// nyan thos mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//
219a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs yul gang du srin bu rnga mo dud ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan rgyal du nyal ba byung na/
219a5(dkon brtsegs): sus de 'jig pad cas 'tshe ba cus/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'od kyis pal te sus der byang chub sems dpa 'a byung na sum de 'jigs
219a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / 'tsha ba med pa dang / zhi ba'i nyo mongs pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srus des pas na byang chub thams dpa' sems can kyi drin pa brtson par byeste sas
219a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas// sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o// ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs
219b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhir song ste/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya'o// yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od grangs de la yang dag pa'i gsob gang nan/ 'dis
219b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / lba bar gyur pa thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan mang
219b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad la gnas pa spang ba'i phyir/ smon pa med pa dang /
219b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ phyin ci ma log pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa la
219b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad la bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bas gso ba dang /
219b6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / lus kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung
219b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / tshor ba'i rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / sems kyi rjes
220a1(dkon brtsegs): su skabs bdag tu rtsa bar mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su ltab can du gnas kyang / chos kyi rjes su ltabs bdag tu rtsa bar mi rung bas gsob dang / yang dag par spong babazhi
220a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis ni lus dang sems la ril por 'dzin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang / dang
220a3(dkon brtsegs): po lnga dang / stobs lngas ni ma dang ba dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos la shin tu rmongs
220a4(dkon brtsegs): shing mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pas ni 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan pa zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste// 'od srungs 'di ni yang dag pa'i
220a5(dkon brtsegs): gso ba zhes bya'o// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpas gso ba 'di la bslab par brtson par bya'o// 'od srungs 'dzam bu'i gling na sman pa dang / sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'tsho byed ni mchog
220a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// 'od srungs gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang / de dag la la la zhig gis
220a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang 'gyod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag gis shes pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ bsgo bar mi nus so// 'od srungs de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag ni 'jig rten gyi sman tsam
220b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis chog par mi bya'i// bdag gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi stan yongs su btsal bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/ ma du cug par bya'o//
220b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bcags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang chol pa des phyogs pa zhir song la/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gsob bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gsobs sems can rnams gso par bya'o// 'od
220b3(dkon brtsegs): srungs de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di lha skye/ rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang
220b4(dkon brtsegs): zag med pa'i chos rnams la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang / sems yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus so// de 'di ltar yongs su tshol te/ 'dod chags
220b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ ci 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de/
220b6(dkon brtsegs): ni zad pa'o// ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo// 'od srungs sems ni nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
220b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs sems ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs
221a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs
221a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba ci 'dra bar blta zhe na/ 'od srungs sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin to//
221a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs sems ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te/ mi gnas pa skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju ba'o// 'od srungs sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te/ ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o// 'od srungs
221a4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'o// 'od srungs sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o// 'od
221a5(dkon brtsegs): srungs sems ni glog dang mtshungs te/ skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te/ yul thams cad 'dod pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs
221a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir/ ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung ba'i phyir/ mi gnas pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med
221a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i phyir/ gcig pu cu ste gnyis su med pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad byed
221b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ mi mdza' ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir/ bye ma'i 'ang pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni mi rtag pa lartaH/
221b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa'i phyir/ zil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir/ nya'i mchil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni bdag med pa la
221b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir/ rmi lam dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i phyir/ spang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni gnod pa rnam pa
221b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po byed pas/ phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni rtag tu klan ka tshol ba'i phyir/ gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni rtag tu glags rdza bas/ dgra dang mtshung
221b5(dkon brtsegs): so// 'od srungs sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas/ rtag par mthon dman can no// 'od srungs sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chubs/ chom rkun dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni gzugs
221b6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bas/ phyi byi zho la'i mig dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni sba la dga' bas/ g.yul gyi rnga dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni phag mi gtsang ba'i dril dga' ba bzhin du dril dga' 'o//
221b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs sems ni ro la dga' bas/ zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni reg pa la dga' bas/ spang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems
222a1(dkon brtsegs): ni kun tu btsal na mi rnyed do// gang mi rnyed pa de nI mi dmigs pa'o// gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// gang
222a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/
222a3(dkon brtsegs): no// gang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de la ngo bo nyid med do// gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do// gang 'byung ba med pa de la 'gags pa med do// gang
222a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa med pa de la 'bral ba med do// gang 'bral ba med pa de la 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'chi 'pho'ang med/ skye ba'ang med do// gang la 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'chi 'pho'ang med//
222a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'ang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do// gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la
222a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa'ang med do// gang la bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa'ang med pa de la rgyu ba'ang med/ mi rgyu ba'ang med/ rab tu rgyu ba'ang med do// gang la rgyu ba'ang med/ mi rtsu ba
222a7(dkon brtsegs): bang med/ rab tu rgyu ba'ang med pa de la sems kyang me/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do// gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par
222b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'ang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med pa de la bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med do// gang la bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa de ni/ 'phags pa rnams/
222b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la nI/ las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med pa'i rigs de la ni/ lus kyi
222b3(dkon brtsegs): las byed pa'ang med do// ngag gis ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin// rigs de las mtha' ma dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par bzhag pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de ni nam mkha' dung
222b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o// rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa'o//
222b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pas nga'i ba med pa'o// rigs de ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa mnyam pa
222b6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba ste/ mi mnyam pa med pa'o// rigs de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin pas bdon pa'o// rigs de ni gtan du mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o// rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag
222b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o// rigs de ni rnam pa thams cad du dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o// rigs de ni bdag yongs su gtsal te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o// rigs da ni/
223a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// 'od srungs nang du yongs su chol la phyi rol du ma d+h+yag cig/ 'od drungs ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dge slong kyi rdos sgeg padus du
223a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od srungs ji ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la sgeg pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lha ste/ dper na khyi ni rdos 'jigs la/ rdo de nyid kyi phyir sgeg gi/ rdod sus 'phangs pa de la nam
223a3(dkon brtsegs): sgeg go// 'od srungs de bzhin du 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gzugs dang / spa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas/ dgon nga'i gnas rnams na gnas shing / de dag de na gcig pu gnyis su
223a4(dkon brtsegs): med par lus rab tu dben par 'jug ste// chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na/ de dag de la btang snyoms su 'jog cing bsod nyams su sbyor pa
223a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gnas kyi/ nang du so sor rtog pa la mngon par mi brtson te/ de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams las cis 'byung ba mi shes shing khong du mi chud do// de dag
223a6(dkon brtsegs): gis de ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor dag tu song na'ang gzugs dang /
223a7(dkon brtsegs): spa dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te de dag dgon pa la gnas pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag
223b1(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bye bar 'gyur te/ der yang de dag rtswa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis gnod par 'gyur ro// de dag de nas shi 'byos nas ngan song ba ni lus yongs su ma grol
223b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od m+bu ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin no// 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong kyi rdol sdig pa dang
223b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa dag yin no// 'od srungs ji gyur na khyi rdo la snyeg pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srungs gang gshe'ang slar mi gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro/ mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'drug brdegs
223b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang slar mi rdeg/ bsdigs kyang slar mi sdig/ smad kyang slar mi smod cing / nang du sems la so sor rtog sde/ 'di la gshe ba 'am/ khros pa 'am/ brdegs pa 'am/ bajigs pa 'am/
223b5(dkon brtsegs): smad pa 'am/ mtshang brus pa de dag gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol steg pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper ma byi ni rdobs
223b6(dkon brtsegs): skrag gyur kyang // sus 'phangs mi sgeg rdol sgeg par byed// de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag/ gzugs la sogs pas skrag nas dgon par gnas// de dag dgon pa de la gnas gyur kyang // gzugs pa/
223b7(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa sdug pa mthong gyur na// btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gi tshul mi shes// de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa// mi shes pas na slar yang grong du gnas// gzugs la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur/
224a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang lha yi longs spyod sbyang gyur te// lha dang mi las kha cig shing phos nas// de dag ngan song sar ni lhung bar 'gyur// blun po de dag shi 'phos sdug bsngal
224a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de ltar sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni// khyi rdo snyeg pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs// spyod kyang mi gshe brdeg kyang mi rdeg dang // su zhig smad kyang smod par mi byed dang // de bzhin mtshad
224a3(dkon brtsegs): brus mtshang 'dru mi byed dang // khros kyang nges pa khro bar mi byed cing // nang gi sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag/ tshol zhing yid zhi dran dang ldan gyur pa// de 'dra'i tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa ni/
224a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo snyeg khyi mi 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rta'i 'dul sbyong la mkhas pas rta de gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang de rab tu sbyong ngo // 'od srungs
224a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang gang dang gang du sems 'gyur bar mthong ba de dang der rab tu sbyong ba la 'jug ste/ de ci nas phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems rab tu 'chos so// de la 'di skad
224a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na rta yi 'dul skyong mkhas pa zhig/ byang zhing g.yo med tshul du rab tu 'dul// rnal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong nas// ji ltar phyis 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chos/
224a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lkog nad lha gor gyis ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa/
224b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha gor srog gi dbang po la// gnod cing de la bde ba sbyin pa min// de bzhin ltar gyur nang na bdag lta ba// don chos srog rnam pa 'jig par byed/ 'od srungs 'di
224b2(dkon brtsegs): lA ste/ dper na mi ni gang dang gang du bcings pa de dang de nyid las 'grol bar bya ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems gang dang gang la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// de la
224b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa// de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin// de bzhin sems rmongs gang dang gang chags pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol/ 'od
224b4(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nam mkha' la yongs su chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig yongs su tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste/ 'di gnyis
224b5(dkon brtsegs): so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang 'ben goms byed brtson pa dang // lhung bzed chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa/ 'di gnyis nam mkha' la ni chags pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas
224b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po skye/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste/ 'di gnyis
224b7(dkon brtsegs): so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang // grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yin/ 'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs// de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spang
225a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ khyim pa'i phyogs la rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i phyogs la gnod par sems pa ste/ 'di gnyis
