225a2(dkon brtsegs): so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyim pa'i phyogs la rten par byed pa dang // 'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par spyod byed pa// 'di gnyis rab byung bar chad bgegs byed yin// byang chub sems
225a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas de dag rnam par spang / 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa la mi marjed pa dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yongs su badzin
225a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs mi mjed dang // mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster khyim rten pa// de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs// byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam
225a5(dkon brtsegs): par sda / 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i ser ba 'bab pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / tshul khrims las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yongs su sbyong ba ste/
225a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang // tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste// ser ba 'bab pa 'di gnyis ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya
225a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i rma yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang / bdag gi nyes pa 'chas pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la
225b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang / pha rol nyes la rtog byed pa// 'di gnyis dug gi me dang 'dra // rtogs pa rnams kyis rma 'di spang / 'od srungs 'di
225b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i yongs su gdung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis dur smrig 'chang ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa las bsnyen bkur dang rim
225b3(dkon brtsegs): go bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste/ 'dri gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang // bsnyen pa kun rim gro byed dang gus par smra ba dag/ tshul khrims ldan
225b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams las sten par byed pa ste// chos gnyis 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ba yin// 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bslab pa'i gzhi las
225b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba dang / snying po ma blangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bslob pa'i gzhi las gal bar gyur pa dang // snying po ma spangs par ni dus byed pa/ 'di
225b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu zhes// lha mi'i ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa gsungs/ 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nang gsor mi rung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i
225b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis sems nges par sems pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi 'dun bzlog pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal sem la des sems dang / sangs rgyas
226a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa las ni 'dun pa zlog/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nang yin zhes// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs/ 'od srungs dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam gyis dge sbyong zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang / cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong dang / brjod pa'i sgra
226a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo // 'od srungs de la kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang
226a4(dkon brtsegs): rtags kyi dbyibs dang ldan par gyur te/ chos gos snam sbyar gyon cing mge bregs te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi/ de lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par sbyong/ ngag gi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ 'a
226a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod cing / ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ ma bsrungs pa/ ma byang ba/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos can yin te/ 'od srungs
226a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod
226a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs shing spyod lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/ zas skom ngan pa za 'thung / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag gis chog par 'dzin/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga'/ khyim
226b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'drel tshig nyung ning smra ba nyung mod kyi/ de'i spyod lam de dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsug gis yongs su brtags pa yin te/ sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma
226b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang ngar 'dzin pa la gnas shing / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la ga yang
226b3(dkon brtsegs): sar 'du shes pa yin/ stong pa nyid smra ba'i dge slong rnams la'ang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/ 'od srungs de ni cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la brjod pa'i
226b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srungs/ ji ltar mang du
226b5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin/ ji ltar bdag dgon pa par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas/ dgon pa la gnas shing so sor brtags nas/
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa nyung la chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben par gyur te/ 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyi/ skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i
226b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te
227a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshogs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs gang lus dang srog la'ang
227a2(dkon brtsegs): mi lta ba yin na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos na dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/
227a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod na khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang
227a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba lta ci smos/ don la rton gyi/ tshigs 'bru la rton pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshol gyi/ phyi rol du rgyu ga pa
227a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongs su dag cing rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas/ bdag nyid skyabs yin te/ gzhan skyabs ma yin/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du'ang
227a6(dkon brtsegs): mi lha na/ gzugs kyi skur lta ci smos/ chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na/ smra ba'i tshig gi lam nas brjod par lta ci smos/ 'phags pa 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la'ang rnam par mi rtog
227a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ mang po 'dus par lta ci smos/ chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'khor bar yang mi skye/ mya ngan las 'das nga la'ang
227b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba ma yin/ thar pa'ang yi dmigs/ bcings pa'ang ma yin la/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/ kun tu mi 'khor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin
227b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'od srungs de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i/ ming gis gnod par ni mi bya ste/ 'od srungs dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di dag go
227b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ ma rul ma bsrungs ma byang 'dod chen can// mgo bregs chos gos lhung bzed lag na thogs// de ni dbyings rtags dge sbyong yin zhes bstan/
227b4(dkon brtsegs): cho ga spyod pa la sogs ldan gyur cing // kha zas ngan za tshul 'chos la sogs sten// 'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongs su sbyong byed cing // spyod lam 'phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang // de yi de kun dul bar
227b5(dkon brtsegs): bya phyir min// zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// stong pa mtshan med ga yang sar 'du shes pa// cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos gnyis pa yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i yon tan thos// gzhan
227b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag ngo mtshar 'dzin du gzhug phyir byed// zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum pa yin// gang zhig lus srog don du mi gnyer zhing // rnyed dang bkur sti la
227b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyab kyis phyogs// rnam par thar pa bskyed pa'i sgo thos nas// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer// chos rnams shin tu stong par yongs brtags nas/ mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong
228a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// chos la 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu rtog/ ma bya sa chos rtogs mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dbul po zhig la mdzod
228a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa zhes ming btags na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dang ming de mthun pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
228a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni gsung rab 'di las mi dbul po zhes ngas bshad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na dngul por
228a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i mi zhig la// mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin// dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes// dbul la phyag ces btags pa'i dpe dang mtshungs/ 'od srung
228a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la/ chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po blangs te kun chub par byas kyang /
228a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel/ zhe sdang la sred pa mi sel/ gti mug la sred pa mi sel ba de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos khyer la/ nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur
228a7(dkon brtsegs): ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chus khyer la// de ni skom zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur// de bzhin chos mang sred pas bag med pa// chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro/
228b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa sman sgo thogs te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nas/ nang de gso mi nus na/ de'i sman de ni don med pa yin no// 'od srungs
228b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta ste/ gang mang du thos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nang las gso mi nus na/ de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na/
228b3(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i sman sgor bcug pa'i sman// 'jig rten kun tu yongs su rgyu byed kyang // nad kyis btab pa zlog par mi nus na// de yi sman de don med gyur pa yin// de bzhin dge sbyong tshul khrim yon tan ldan/
228b4(dkon brtsegs): thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs byung ba'i nang na mi sel na// de yi thos la brtson pa don med yin// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nad pa zhig la rgyal
228b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'os pa'i sman btang ba/ cho ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs gang mi sdom pa des 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'ang mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta'o// de la 'di
228b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal por 'os pa'i sman btang nas// chog ma byas mi de shi bar gyur// de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir shi ba// de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs nad//
228b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na smad par 'gyur zhing / 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i mi gtsang ba'i
229a1(dkon brtsegs): nang du lhung bar blta ste/ ci'ang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi gtsang rin chen lhung ba smad// ji ltar sngon bzhin du ni byis ma
229a2(dkon brtsegs): yin// dge sbyong mang du thos par gyur pa yang // bkur sti'i mi gtsang ltung ba de 'drang bshad/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser gyi 'phreng ba brtags pa de bzhin du
229a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa ngur smrig gyon par blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser 'breng ngam// yang na me tog 'phreng ba gdags byas pa// de bzhin khrims med dur smrig
229a4(dkon brtsegs): gyon pa yang / mthong nas de la yid ni dang mi 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig legs par khrus byas te/ legs par rngub par byugs la/ skra dang sen mo bregs nas/
229a5(dkon brtsegs): gos dkar po bgos te/ tsan dan mchog gis bskus pa'i mgo la tsam pa ka'i me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos pa ngur smrig gyon par blta'o//
229a6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ legs bkrus legs par byugs pa yi// tshong dpon bu yi mgo bo la// tsam pa ka yaM me tog 'breng // dri zhim yid 'ong btags pa mdzes// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan
229a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing // mang thos tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// rgyal ba'i sras po yon tan ldan// de la ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'amal pa tshul khrims
229b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi ga zhan/ 'od srungs 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ sa sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas/ chog dang srung phul phun sum
229b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs/ kha na ma thob za ba rnams la'ang 'jigs par lha/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i gci rnams la slob cing / lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang
229b3(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pas/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag kyang de bdag tu smra ba yin te/ 'od srungs de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa dang po'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong bcog
229b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba 'dzin cing / 'dul ba la zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang / 'jigs tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyod pa yin te/ 'od srungs de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa
229b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcos pa gnyis pa'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa yin te/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa yin yang / 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med pa
229b6(dkon brtsegs): thos na skrag ste kun tu dang bar 'gyur zhing / kun tu rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba de ni/ 'od srungs tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon
229b7(dkon brtsegs): tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs kyang / dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni/ 'od srungs tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrim dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa bzhi pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag
230a1(dkon brtsegs): ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srungs tshul khrims tshul khrims shes bya ba ni gang la bdag med pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / bya ba
230a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag mi bya ba'ang med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / byed pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / mi rgyu babang ma yin pa dang / rab tu spyod pa mod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
230a3(dkon brtsegs): ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'ang ma yin pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang /
230a4(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa dang / tshig tu 'dogs pa med pa dang / sems med pa dang /
230a5(dkon brtsegs): sems su 'dogs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang / rten med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan gyi
230a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la mi smod pa dang / tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims la mi rtog pa yin te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa/ rtog pa ma yin pa
230a7(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa dang bral ba rten thams cad med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshul khrims ldan la dri ma med cing ci yang med// tshul khrims ldan la
230b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa med re rton pa med// tshul khrims ldan la mun pa med cing 'ching ba med// tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med// zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'i yid// rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral
230b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing nyon mongs med// g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral ba// de nas 'od srungs sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// lus la mi lha srog la 'phangs par 'dzin mi byed// srid pa rnams su skye bkun la
230b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa med// yang dag zhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa// de ni 'od srungs sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// 'jig rten mgos 'jig rten dag la gnas pa med// snang ba thob cing bdag gi med deci
230b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med// bdag tu 'du shes med cing gzhan du 'du shes med// 'du shes yongs su shes pas tshul khrims rnam par dag/ gang la tshu rol med cing pha rol dbus kyang med// pha rol tshu rol dag la rnams kyang mi
230b5(dkon brtsegs): chags shing // bcings dang chags med tshul 'chos med cing zag pa med// de ni 'od srungs sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa'i yid// de ni mnyam par
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag cing shin tu dul ba'i sems// gang la bdag med bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni// de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas shes brjod pa yin// so sor thar pa slob pas rlom sems byed pa med// des ni 'di na de
230b7(dkon brtsegs): la chags par mi 'gyur te// de yi gong du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa// de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims gtso bor ma yin ting 'dzin der chags med// de yi gong du
231a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bsgom pa yongs su tshol// dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te// tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags// 'jigs pa'i chog
231a2(dkon brtsegs): la lha las rnam par grol ba'i yid// de 'dir nga dang nga yi snyam du 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// de yi tshul khrims de ni mnyam pa med pa'o// tshul khrims la ni gnas
231a3(dkon brtsegs): nas ting nge 'dzin kyang thob// ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes rab shin tu sgom// shes rab kyis ni ye shes rnam par dag pa 'thob// ye shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// tshigs
231a4(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs pa'i tshe// dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi tshig
231a5(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas bstan las langs te dong ngo // de nas
231a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas
231a7(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs te mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'od srungs 'di ltar dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'di dag ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zag pa med pa 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi to/ mi mos shing skrag te/
231b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs so// 'od srungs tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa zab pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs
231b2(dkon brtsegs): su zin pa dang / mos pa mi mang ba dag gis mos par mi nus so// 'od srungs dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la bu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te/ de dag de bzhin
231b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od srungs la brgal ba'i bsam pas chos bstan pa gcig thos so// thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed de/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
231b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'jam zhir snyan par gsung ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir
231b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srungs dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba 'di dag ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtog mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs
231b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu dngangs so// yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongs su sbyang bas byas te/ phyis ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// de nas
231b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di dag la
232a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad na'ang mthun par mi bgyid na/ bdag la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'dod pa'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul
232a2(dkon brtsegs): kha sprul to// de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis la ma gang nas 'dod pa'i lam deng dong ste/ phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'dong / de gnyis kyis
232a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang yin pa'i chos
232a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur nas/ kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa
232a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos
232a6(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnam kyis gnas par bya'o// sprul pa dag gis
232a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o// rtsod par mi bya'o// rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su mya ngan
232b1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang lus 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nas/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ skyes du 'am/ gang zag gam/ shes la
232b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes sam/ shed du'am/ gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'dar/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zed/ zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas yongs su
232b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' 'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod pa yin nam/ cin de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni nang na
232b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med pa la'ang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na ma rtog rnam
232b5(dkon brtsegs): par ma rtog cig/ tshe dang ldan pa nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de na chags par yang mi 'gyur/ chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'ang med pa gang yin pa de
232b6(dkon brtsegs): ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dab 'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang mi 'khor
232b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag chos de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na/ chos de dag kyang stong pa/ dben pa/ bzung du med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/
233a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dus shes spongs shig/ 'du shes la'ang 'du shes su ma byed cig/ 'du shes la'ang 'du shes kyis yongs su shes par ma byed cig/ gang 'du shes labar dudu/
233a2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis yongs su shes pa de ni/ de'i 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes rang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog
233a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems rnam
233a4(dkon brtsegs): par grol nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
233a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong dong / gang nas lhags/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med
233a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyi ston pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o// smras pa/ khyed kyis ji
233a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos thos/ smras pa/ bcing ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa/ khyed sus btul/ smras pa/ su la lus med cing sems med pas so// smras pa khyed ji ltar
233b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson/ smras pa/ ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa/ khyed ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa/ sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no//
233b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyed su'i nyan thos/ smras pa/ gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'i'o// smras pa/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang / smras pa/ yang dag khams
233b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum na mi rgyu ba rnams so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o// smras pa/ khyed kyis
233b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas sam/ smras pa/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas so// smras pa/ khyed kyi nyon mongs pa zad ngam/ smras pa/ chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro// smras
233b5(dkon brtsegs): pa khyed kyis bdud btul tam/ smras pa/ phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam/ smras pa/ lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas/
233b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis kyang ma byas so// smras pa/ khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas kyis sbyangs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so// smras pa/ khyed 'khor ba las rgal tam/ smras ga chad pa med
233b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sar zhugs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro
234a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du brdud bar ro// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te/ dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas/ 'khor de'i dge slong
234a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyad ra ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par tshul lo// srog chags sus tshwanyis na chos rnams la nos kyi mig rdul me da nis dang bral nam par
234a3(dkon brtsegs): de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
234a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'tshal
234a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi ru tshar bcad cing tshar bcad nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bslab pa bstan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skyes
234a6(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa nan tan snying por byed pa rnams kyi don chen por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig khams pa'i grur zhugs te ga d+hA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji
234a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ mi des ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gru de gsar bar bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni chu
234b1(dkon brtsegs): po chen po'i nang du zhugs kyis/ bdag 'bram du ma byin par bar ma dor gru zhig tu 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i slangad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun tu snang nga de ltar byang chub sems
234b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de bas kyang ches stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
234b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ bdag gis snying po ma zangs par ba ma ngor 'chi ba'i dus byas su 'ong ngo zhes yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyis/ chu bo bzhir zhugs pa'i
234b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi gru gang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi bu chen po sbyar bar bya'o//
234b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang ba de la byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya ba de ci 'dra zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha'
234b6(dkon brtsegs): yas pa bas gA pa/ tshul khrims kyi snam gyis sbyar ba/ sbyin pa'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bcing ba sra bas dam por sbrel ba/ bzod pa dang / nges pa dang
234b7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i sbyor ba khas legs par sbyar ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bsam gtan gyi sems kyis las
235a1(dkon brtsegs): su rung bar byas pa/ dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / cang shes kyi dge ba'i bzos legs par zin par byas pa/ shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa
235a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brub das pa / dpa' nga bas gas nas dang lams pas sunas gas pa 'phru gzu papas / gas pa sa
235a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis legs par yongs su sbyangs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi legs par rnam par bsam pa'i lus kyis bsten pa/ yang dag par spong bas 'gro ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
235a4(dkon brtsegs): pA'i 'gyogs pa'i shug dang ldan pa/ dbang pos legs par brtags pas lta ba ngan pa'i shing yon po med pa/ stobs kyi shugs yang dag par byung bas par shag shig med pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag
235a5(dkon brtsegs): gis 'gro ba rnam par dag pa/ bcugs can dgra nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa lam du 'jug par byed pa/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par byed pa/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i
235a6(dkon brtsegs): stegs 'dor bar byed pa/ zhi gnas kyis nges par sems pa bstan pa/ lhag mthong gis sbyor ba/ mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jug pa/ rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa// sgra grags pa yang
235a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rgya che la mi zad cing tshad med pa tshur shog/ dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba/ bde bar 'gro ba/ 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba/ lam du 'gro ga 'jigs
235b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lbu ba 'dor bar zhugs la/ tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol tu lba ba thams cad sel ba/ gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par myur du song zhig ces phyogs bcur skas go bar byed ba ste/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongs su mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpas dpa pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar
235b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can tham cad bsgral bar bya'o// kun tu snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di sems can tham cad
235b4(dkon brtsegs): la bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa
235b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la
235b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhol pa dang ka lus dang sems dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / skye bo mi bsrun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / don dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang / shin tu mi 'khrugs pas
235b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi don dang / ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang / mi 'khrugs pas dben pa'i don dang / yang dag par sbyor bar bya bas stong pa nyid kyi don dang / shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i don yin pas
236a1(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos
236a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs
236a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam
236a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
236a5(dkon brtsegs): to// 'od srungs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ring po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
236a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pang+ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bad+ma'i klung
236a7(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gadz+nyA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs par ro'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag la bskal pagad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde pa'i
236b1(dkon brtsegs): yo byang thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun la byas pa pas/ rigs kyi sa pa/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gzhanag
236b2(dkon brtsegs): gis/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshogs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung mnos te/ lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du spyad do// bud med gang zhig
236b3(dkon brtsegs): lung 'bog na/ de nam yang log par lhung bar mi 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no// sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger
236b4(dkon brtsegs): bris nas glegs ram du byas te bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ yi ger dri ba de
236b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o// 'od srungs rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la bkur sti byed pa dang / btsun par
236b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de la/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
236b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas kyang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshor bas sems kun tu ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / de'i mig 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ba dang
237a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa g.yob par mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang / gcin mi stor ba dang / phyis mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying kar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang //
237a2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la mi rlobs pa dang / ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// ngag gi las
237a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gdangs snyan pa'i tshig dang / mnyen pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga' ba'i tshig dang / snum pa'i tshig dang / slar
237a4(dkon brtsegs): zlog pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / lha dang mis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig ste/ ngag gi las
237a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang
237a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chab par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang / nyes pa la mi dga' ba dang / kho na gcugs la mi dga' ba dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang / spong bas bag yod par 'gyur ba
237a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma zhum pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba
237b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshor bas nyan cing 'chi ba'i dus mi byed // de yi mig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba med
237b2(dkon brtsegs): lag pa mi g.yo ba rkang pa 'phra mi 'gyur// de ni bshang gci stor bar yong mi 'gyur// de yi snying kar rdul yang 'byung mi 'gyur// khur tshur mi 'chang nam mkha' rlobs mi 'gyur// 'dug bzhin
237b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ lus las yongs su dag pa 'di bcu thob// gdang dus spyan phun sum tshogs shing 'jam mnyen tshig/ snum zhing yid 'ong de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// gzhan
237b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis slar mi zlog ci bzung 'os tshig/ skye bos btsun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur// de yi tshig ni lha dang klu dag dang // mi 'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal bas bsngags// des bshad pa yi don yang
237b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin byed de// des ni ngag las dag po de dag 'thob// khro ba med cing khon du 'dzin pa med// brtan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med// nyes la mi dga' kho na gcugs dga' ba med// de yi 'du
237b6(dkon brtsegs): shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur// bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi zhum// spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur te// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing sbyong byed// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas/
237b7(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams cad mngon bsgrubs dang // yid kyi mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams 'thob// chos rnams 'di dag ldan par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro//
238a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur sti byed par 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos tu
238a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya/ bcang bar bya'o// 'od srungs de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
238a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
238a4(dkon brtsegs): po sangs rgyas kyi ning sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
238a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// 'phags dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa 'od srungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//
238a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+hi ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gzha la phab pa'o// shrI kA truH
238a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya/ bam po gnyis/ @rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya rat+na rA shI na ma me hA lA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba theg pa
238b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
238b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong brgya stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong yang thabs gcig tu
238b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i zod pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
238b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba ji tsam gyis na dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen
238b5(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge badzin la 'jug pa shes pas
238b6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong zhes bya ste/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rnam par grol ba snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la som nye med cing / the tshom mi za ba dang / 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa dang /
238b7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa bsgoms pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas
239a1(dkon brtsegs): la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / chos la dad pa mi byed pa dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang
239a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin 'amangs
239a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / shes rab kyis lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam
239a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa dang / chos rnams kyi brten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong sgom
239a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang /
239a6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi grang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / bdud bzhi'i lam las shin tu 'das pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa
239a7(dkon brtsegs): srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang / tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal yang dag par yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba
239b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba dang / gzhan gyi zing la mi
239b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa dang / zag pa zang pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / bAcu byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig
239b3(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong bas bsu ba dang / sngon gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i
239b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan la gnas pa dang / blo gya gyu med pa dang / rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang / bse ru ltar gcig pu rgyu ba dang / 'du 'dzis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams gsum las
239b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang / thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po snyed pa dang /
239b6(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems
239b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems
240a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la de'i sems mi chags mi 'ching ste/ dper na nam mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags mi 'ching ba yin te/
240a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang ldan na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
240a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon tan 'di dag yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
240a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyid pa/ dge sbyong ma lags la dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che zhing /
240a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par mchid kyis 'che ba'i dge slong la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs du dang / khyod dang / nyan thos
240a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dor nas/ bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba ni tshig gis bstan par mi nus
240a7(dkon brtsegs): so// 'od srungs de la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms ga/ sems ma bsgom pa/ shes pha ma bsgom pa/ byis pa/ dman pa/ glen pa/ rmongs pa/ rab tu ma zhig ma dul ba kha cig 'byung bar
240b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag gi ga yo dag sgyu dang / mi nang ba da / rba gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong ni skyon rnams brjod par bya'o// bod sbyangs de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnam gang khyen 'od
240b2(dkon brtsegs): srungs sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gis dri ma ste/ de dag spangs nas dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod/
240b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la bstod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i
240b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa kun tu tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pa rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rang bas byin pa chung gzon pa dge sbyong gi rim dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khyim pa la rtan pa
240b5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu byung ba dang sten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'du 'jil mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed po yongs su ma grub par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chod
240b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa
240b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnan gyi la rdul pa yongs su tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / so sor bar ba dang 'dul ba mi srung bdage skyong gi dri ma dang / ma ltar bu cong sla ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mgus pa dang / nor pa dang /
241a1(dkon brtsegs): khyengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong
241a2(dkon brtsegs): gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / spri dngas
241a3(dkon brtsegs): kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo spong ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos
241a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ 'od srungs sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong zhes bya'o//
241a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams la mo gus pa dang / chos rnams la rim gro med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i
241a6(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba dang / bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi 'jug
241a7(dkon brtsegs): gi/ 'dus byas nyid kyi rjes su snyeg pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa zhes thos na skrag pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes thos na ga yang sa chen por lhung ba bzhin du ltung ba ste/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'od srungs dge sbyong ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyis dge sbyong nas mi 'chad kyisayon
241b2(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi chos la nan tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ngo zhes ngas bshad do// 'od srungs dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs rnyog pa
241b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa la ngas ngur smrig gnang gi/ 'od srungs gang rnyog pa dang bcas pas lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba de dag thams cad ni ngur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/ bsam pas mos pa rnams ni ma gtogs
241b4(dkon brtsegs): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyi gos 'di dag ni nye bar bzhi pa'i rjes su mthun pa byams pa'i
241b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su zhugs pa'o// 'od srungs de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srungs bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
241b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba 'phags
241b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bden pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rten cing 'brel
242a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan bani 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tshad med pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal
242a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / zag pa zad pa 'phags pa
242a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ 'od srungs bcu gnyis po de dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no// 'od srungs gang la la rgyal mtshan 'di dag dang mi ldan par 'phags pa'i rigs gos ngur
242a4(dkon brtsegs): smig dag 'chang ba de ni nor pa'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do// chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa zhes bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes bshad do// mya ngan lnga 'das
242a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyogs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa zhes bshad do// 'khor ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bshad do// nga rgyal gyi mchil pas zin pa zhes bshad do// snying po ma blang ba zhes bshad do// chos lnga nyams pa
242a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bshad do// nyam nga ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bshad do// 'od srungs de lta bas na dge sbyong gis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang ba lha na rnyog pa med pa'i sems su bya'o// gal te nges 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na/
242a7(dkon brtsegs): des gus pa brgyad kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa'i 'du shes dang
242b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la gus pa'i 'du shes dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i 'du shes dang / khrel yod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnyog pa med par bya'o snyam pa ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gus pa brgyang po dang
242b2(dkon brtsegs): gis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// 'od srungs gang dag lhod cing yang dag par mi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba rnams ni gus pa 'di
242b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag mi skyed do// 'od srungs dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba yod do// 'od srungs nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba dang dge sbyong gi gzugs su gyur bzhin
242b4(dkon brtsegs): du gos 'bar ba dag dang / mgo 'bar ba dag dang / lhung bzed 'bar ba dag dang / stan 'bar ba dag dang / mal cha 'bar ba dag gnod pa byed de/ de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa gang ci yod pa
242b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar te/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar la/ re mer gyur te/ dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs kyis gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang /
242b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa de dag gi 'gro ba'ang yongs su ma dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'od srungs dge sbyong
242b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa bdag
243a1(dkon brtsegs): #bir byed na/ de mi dge ba'i chos des brnyas pa brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ khams po lta bur 'gyur ba dang / go dka' zhing le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang pos pa gang pa'i bud med
243a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba dang / rang dbang med cing bran du 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan cing mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan cing dang chung bar grags par 'gyur ba dang / de la su'ang ngasu pa me 'gyung ba dang / sbyin gnas rnamal
243a3(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar mi byed pa ste/ brnyes pa brgyad po de dag 'thob bo// 'od srungs de lta bas na bzang po ma yin pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ dge slong sdig pa can gyis gzhan gyis phyag byas pa bdag gir mi bya'o//
243a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs gang dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba ni/ tha na sa chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal ba tsam 'dor ba de'ang
243a5(dkon brtsegs): des rnyed par mi 'gyur na/ gom pa 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs sa chen po 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon
243a6(dkon brtsegs): tan dang ldan pa rnams dang / sbyin gnas dang ldan pa rnams la kun tu spyad pa'i don du phul ba'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de la mi blun po de ni gom pa 'jog pa dang 'dor ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyang dang bas
243a7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du gom pa 'dor zhing 'jom pa yin na/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi khri 'am/ khri'u 'am/ 'chag sa 'am/ gding ba 'am/ gnas khang ngam/ gtsug
243b1(dkon brtsegs): lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi 'am/ yongs su spyang pa 'am/ lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ mal mngam/ na ba gsos na
243b2(dkon brtsegs): nam/ yo byad kyang rung ste/ thams cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bar spyod pa yin pa lu tsaM smos/ 'od srungs khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// 'od srungs dge sbyong ma yin la/
243b3(dkon brtsegs): skyong du khas 'chi ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas ni dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang yongs su dag par bya mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs
243b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni ngas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu dang / bsod nams kyi zhing dang / sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dad pa gang dag de la yon
243b5(dkon brtsegs): dbul ba de dag tshad med pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la/ 'od srungs mi blun po tshul khrims 'chal pas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyang na 'ang / sbyin pa
243b6(dkon brtsegs): bo dang sbyin bdag de yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam ji snyed la spyad pa de snyed kyi las kyi rgya mtsho chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de lta bas na tshul khrims yongs su dag
243b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dad pas sbyin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o zhes khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong nyis brgyas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag
244a1(dkon brtsegs): cing tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni gum yang rung ste/ 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du dad pas stsal ba'i bsod snyoms gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi bgyi'o zhes smras so//
244a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// ngo tsha shes pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu
244a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis gsung rab 'di mdzes so// 'od srungs ngas dge slong gnyis la dad pas byin pa gnang ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ldan pa dang grol ba'o// yang gnyis te/ gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par
244a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / gang yang sems rnam par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// dge slong dag de la dge slong ldan pa rnal 'byor spyod pa nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin
244a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag las chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / rna ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas 'khor ba'i skyon mthong / 'du byed tham cad mi rtag par mthong /
244a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rig chos thams cad la bdag med par mos/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rtogs pas ni rI rab tsam gyi kham dag kyis dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad
244a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i yon shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gang dag las dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa de las de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'byor pa chen po dang pon yon
244b1(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams pas/ gang byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir ro//
244b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas/ sems rnam par grol ba tshad med pa la snyoms
244b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug na sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de'i rnam par smin pa'ang tshad med par shes par bya'o// 'od srungs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams ni yongs su
244b4(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ni yongs su zad par gang yang mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad nas/ 'chal
244b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims kyis logs par ltung bar byed na/ mi gti mug pa de gnod pa ji tsam gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos/ 'od srungs de lta bas na dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon dang / dge sbyong gi
244b6(dkon brtsegs): mi drang ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang / dge sbyong gi sgyu dang / dge sbyong gi gya gyu dang / rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni dge sbyong bsam pas yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'od srungs dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes
244b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang mi nus mi zag cing / rna ba nas ma yin/ sna nas ma yin/ lce nas ma yin/ lus nas ma yin la/ yid nas kyang mi zag pa ste de'i phyir ge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o//
245a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang ldan pa dang / dam pa rnams la gus par gnas pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas
245a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// dge sbyong gi le'u ste dang po'o// / 'od srungs dge slong dge slong zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o//
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'du shes pa bcom pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / skyes par 'du shes pa dang
245a4(dkon brtsegs): bud med du 'du shes pa dang / khye'ur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa bcom pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// lus bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrim bsgom pa dang / sems
245a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo las rgal ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la lta ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'jigs
245a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la/ bdag ni dge slong dge slong ngo snyam du khas 'chen bsam pas mos pa ma to//
245a7(dkon brtsegs): par/ da'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de'ang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no// 'od srungs sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te/ 'od srungs ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa
245b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang pal gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed mi nus so// gnan du nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa gang dag 'byung bar dag gis nga'i bstan pa nu
245b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ba'i sha la gcan gzan nam/ bya gang gis kyang za bar mi nus kyi/ seng ge'i re de nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung
245b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las mi blun po brkam pa/ chags pa'i thal gyis non pa/ chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ nges par mi sems
245b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lhod pa khardzun du smra ba gang dag 'byung ba de dag nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa can gyi dge slong rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags
245b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / de'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa dang / mu zor smra ba dang / bya khwa lta bu dang / tshig 'chal pa ste khazhi
245b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgod pa dang / po theg can dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
245b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yon can dang / sgyu can dang / mi mthun pas 'tshe ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la smod pa
246a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon byas pa mi dran pa dang / mdza' bo la 'khu ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pas byin pa log par lhung bar byed pa dang
246a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims mi srung ba dang / so sor thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag tu smra ba yin/ sems can du smra ba yin
246a3(dkon brtsegs): srog tu smra ba yin/ gang zag tu smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin/ chos la me gus pa yin/ dge 'dun la mi gus pa
246a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ bslab pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge 'dun mthun pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gtsug lag khang la dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin
246a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba yin/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/
246a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen bshes 'dod pa yin/ chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te/ ba'i po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdud kyis zin pa yin/ bdud kyis nor pa yin/ rdugs pa
246a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyid mang ba yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la mi gnas pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go / gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus rul cing brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pas snang
246b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs
246b2(dkon brtsegs): su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs
246b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste ga bzhi gang zhe na/ lam ngan pa la gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong ba yin/ ser sna can du gyur te kun mi 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ thams cad yongs
246b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'dod cing cho ga mi shes pa yin/ ngoms mi myong zhing thos pa'i nan tan dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mun par gzhol bas mun par gyur
246b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ rmongs pa la gzhol bas rmongs par gyur pa yin/ log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa yin te/ bzhi
246b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngag gi tshul chos pa yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos pa
246b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi po de dag go de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni ral gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin pa mgo smad par tshul 'chos pa yin/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bar tshul 'chos
247a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ gos tshags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ gong bur 'du
247a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mi sel bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag darang khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar
247a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung du gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ chos bdud rtsi'i sman mi tshol bar bkus te bor ba'i sman tshol ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa
247a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// de la ngag gi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo shes shing / che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bos mgron du bos te/ kho bos gang 'dod pa rnyed cing bsti stang du byas nas rnyed/
247a5(dkon brtsegs): kho bos bzang po rnyed/ kho bos lan mang du rnyed/ kho bos mang du thos/ kho bos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin/ kho bos ni bod par 'os pa yin/ kho bo ni sur lan gdag pa'i 'os yin/
247a6(dkon brtsegs): kho bos ni nus pa dang ldan zhing skal ba yong la mthu yod pa yin// kho bo ni don rnam par nges pa bstan pa la mkhas pa yin/ gang che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos de la 'di skad
247a7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par byas/ kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas/ kho bos legs so zhes bya ba thob/ kho bos de las bgo ba thob/ yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mthon du gnyen
247b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba ste/ 'od srungs nges par mi sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa las/ tshig 'chal ba de lta bu gang ci 'byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste/ mi rigs pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ rigs pa rnam
247b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma yin te/ 'di ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la sems kyi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ gang sems kyis chos gos dang bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongs su rtog la mtshig gis
247b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la ci'ang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang / gang sems kyis rnyed par 'dod la/ 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di na sems kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems kyis rnyed kyang
247b4(dkon brtsegs): ci ma rung skams sems// tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgos med smra// med pa'i ngo bo'i yid kyis de smras te/ nam yang bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// sems kyi tshul 'chos bsam pas lha rnams
247b5(dkon brtsegs): dang // klu dang lha mig can rnams slu bar byed// smras pa'i sems kyis nams kyang dag mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis de ma khyen to// 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa
247b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can rnams kyi chog ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur
247b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lto ste/ dper na gdol pa ni rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul pa
248a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ shi ba la re ba dang byams pa med pa'i mig gis 'gro ba la lta ba dang / shi ba la dga' ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bung bcug tu mdza
248a2(dkon brtsegs): bshes kyi khyim dang slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba yin te/ de nas rnyed pa dang bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing khyim pa de dag chos sam// 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang / de rnyed pa'i ched du 'dris
248a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi/ don gyi ched du ma yin pa dang / mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol
248a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dag dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis rtag tu yongs su spang
248a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i 'os yin te/ gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'ang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
248a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod cing tshul khrim 'chal par rig nas/ thag
248a7(dkon brtsegs): ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa'i kha phyis sam/ gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa de dag thams cad la ni skye bo la rabs rnams mi reg cing yongs su
248b1(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod do// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tshabs yongs su btsal galus dang sems
248b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pas yongs su btsal ba yin pas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi rig mi mi spyod do// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa ni kha phyis thob te/ zhum num por byas
248b3(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'ang zhum zhum por byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo// zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor
248b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas nas 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do//
248b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de ltar na zhum zhum por byas pa sdig pa 'chab pa de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rung ba ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa'i
248b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni bde 'gro'i ste ba' mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang gi las kyi nyes pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas
248b7(dkon brtsegs): shing / de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhigs la/ de ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par rig par sgrib pa med de/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na
249a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog dang ldan pa las/ gang snying khu mchog bcus pa de'i lhag ma ni rul zhing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste/ myang bar bya ba
249a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul ba'ang chos kyi mchog gi snying khu'i ro bro ba dang bral ba yin te dri nga ba dang / yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ nyon mongs pa dang / g.yo sgyu 'dzin pa dang /
249a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin/ nyon mongs pa'i dris bsgos pa yin te/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du'ang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs
249a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rul pa zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang
249a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa gzags pa de ni rul zhing dring ba yin te/ skye bo ya rabs thams cad kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul ba'ang gzags pa dang mtshungs te/
249a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pas 'phags pa'i skye bos yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te/ 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na
249a7(dkon brtsegs): sa bon rul ba gang yin pa de ni sa chen po las skyer mi rung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul ba'ang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mi skye zhing 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus
249b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin la// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong zam tog rtsa bu ga ba nan/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na za ma tog gi rgya
249b2(dkon brtsegs): rol shin tu byi dor byas la nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bzhig yod pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs dge sbyong tha ma tog lta bu'ang dge sbyong ltar bcos shing phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod par gyur la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe
249b3(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gang ba yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong kuran da ka lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na kun
249b4(dkon brtsegs): da zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha rog blta na sdug la reg na rtsub pa/ lci ba'i sbrang ma'i dri mnam zhing / shi la bar ka'i rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste/ mkhas po mdzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la me reg mi len mi snam gyi/
249b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog de lta bu len cing snom mo// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong ku ra na da ka lta bu'ang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang mi
249b6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa yin/ tshig brlang ba yin/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin te/ mdzangs pa mkhas pa rnams ni ku ran
249b7(dkon brtsegs): da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten pa 'am/ snyen pa 'am/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ de'i tshul rig pas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can
250a1(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da ka lta bu dge sbyong de lta bu la snyen cing snyen la bsnyen bkur byed de/ ku ran da ka'i me tog byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa bzhin du de dang mthun pa nyid du 'gyur te/
250a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brnam
250a3(dkon brtsegs): ga chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa/ gzhan gyi nor la re ba drag shul canadabyug pa dang / mtshon cha dang / dgra cha thogs pa/ ngo tsha med pa/ snying rje med pa
250a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gdug cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe de 'di snyam du gzhan dag gi
250a5(dkon brtsegs): nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur na re ste sa snyam du sems shing / de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyun du mkhyun bur rgyu ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag tu brkam pa/
250a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gis rnyed pas chog mi shes pa gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la ma yul du
250a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de'i tshe/ de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug gi chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang chom kum lta bur ston pa yin/ 'chab tsang sbed pa yin te bdag dge slong
250b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/ shes par gyur na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas rtag tu skrag cing / rtag tu 'jigs te/ spyod lam thams cad
250b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang g.yos spyod pas/ lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag gis chom rkun 'ong ngo // chom rkun 'gro'o// chom rkun 'greng ngo // chom rkun 'chag go/ chom rkun 'dug go
250b3(dkon brtsegs): nyal lo// chos gos len to// chom rkun grong du 'gro'o// grong nas 'byung ngo // chom rkun za'o// chom rkun 'thung ngo // chom rkun skra 'dreg go zhes rig par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de ltar na lha dang /
250b4(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de thams cad rung ba ma yin la/ yongs su brtags pa ma yin par rig par 'gyur te/ rigs nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed
250b5(dkon brtsegs): cing / kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ro// tshul khrims dang ldan
250b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyang 'di dag ni bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher skyed do// 'od srungs chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong
250b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed na/ 'bras bu 'thob pa lta ci smos kyi/ de ni gnas med do// 'od srungs 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes
251a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong shin tem gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru'i nang na gang dag ma smin pa dang / mi grung pa dang / 'od srungs med cing
251a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru 'dra ba de dag ni shin te ma zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma'ang yang ning mthu chung la/ bdud kyis zin pa/ bdud kyis non pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'phrog ga zung
