251a3(dkon brtsegs): gi g.yengs pa lta bu ste/ 'od srungs dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni dge sbyong tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas te/ de dag ni ngas dge sbyong shin te ma zhes btags so// 'od
251a4(dkon brtsegs): srungs de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nas kyi ljang bu phun sum tshogs pa'i nang na/ nas la gnod pa zhig skyes nas/ de ljang bu'i kha dog 'dra zhing rtags dang dbyin
251a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dra bas/ de la nas kyi bdag po de dag 'di snyam du 'di dag thams cad ni nas yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed skyed pa las/ gang gi tshe nas kyi ldong bu las snyem byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nas la gnod pa
251a6(dkon brtsegs): de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong sun par byed pa'i dge slong dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas su
251a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams dang / kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas/ de la sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag dge sbyong ngo snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing / sbyin gnas su 'du shes skyed pa las/ de nas gal te mig tu
251b1(dkon brtsegs): mug pa dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par skyong ba ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod pa khas 'che ba/ nang rul zhing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung sten shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas
251b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis de sems can dmyal bar skyes par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang mi ga
251b3(dkon brtsegs): mug pa 'di ni/ sngon dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas/ de sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ nas la gnod pa la nas kyi yon tan med pa ltar/ 'di la'ang dge sbyong gi
251b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi 'bras bu med do zhes snying rje chen po skyed de/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong sun par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/
251b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i lcag shig yod de/ shin tu yongs su dag par byas na gser 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gser gyi rin thang dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / ba dar 'phrog dang /
251b6(dkon brtsegs): srang la gzhal ba'i lding 'dra ba ni ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong ltar bcos pa dge sbyong yang lus shin tu bkrus shing gos bzang po mdzes pa gyon la dge sbyong gi phyi rol
251b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi skyong ba thams cad yongs su dag ste/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / mdun du lta ba dang / g.ya' g.yor lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang
252a1(dkon brtsegs): srung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa shes bzhin du srod kyang / de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa dang / zhe sdang gis bcom pa dang / gti mug gis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pa
252a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis bcom pa dang / nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal
252a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khol ba dang / bsnyen bkur lhur len gyi/ chos lhur mi len pa dang / lus chu bar sbyor ba la brtson gyi/ tshul khrims kyis chu bar
252a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba la mi brtson pa dang / zas dang gos lhur len gyi 'phags pa'i chos lhur mi len pa dang 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma thobs 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe gyi
252a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lhur mi len pa dang / lus gso ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa la rten gyi/ chos la rim gror bya ba la mi rten pa dang / skrag pa sna tshogs kyis spags pa dang / sdig pas bsgos
252a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la mngon par brtson pa dang / khyim pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa sa/ bde ba dag gis kyang bde zhing / sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / rjes su
252a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang khong khro bas bcom pa yin te/ de'i dge slong gi chos dang / spyod lam thams cad dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
252b1(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten du gzhol ba yin zhing / de dge sbyong gi rin thang dang / ri ba dang / dge sbyong gi srang kha dang mi mnyam pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs
252b2(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na dge sbyong gzi thogs pa yin zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig mi ma yin pas gzi phrogs par gyur na/ de bang chung
252b3(dkon brtsegs): bar grags shing / mdog ngan la mi sdug par 'gyur te/ de ltar mdangs phrogs pa rnams la ni sman tam/ gsang sngags sam/ rigs sngags rnams kyis mi smon te/ de 'chi bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par
252b4(dkon brtsegs): tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge slong gang la la tshul khrims kyi gzi med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang / shes rab kyi gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzi med pa dang /
252b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang / byams pa'i gzi med pa dang / snying rje'i gzi med pa dang / dga' ba'i gzi med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi gzi med pa dang / sbyin pa dang /
252b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i gzi med pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i gzi med pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad
252b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa'i gzi med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'i gzi med pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dge slong gzi phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'od srungs gzi phrogs pa de lta bu rnam la ni
253a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa'i sman dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
253a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dben par dga' ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang / gsum bsdams pa'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang
253a3(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su dag pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i sman de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas sems can dmyal
253a4(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta ste/ phung po shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel
253a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta bu 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/ de shi
253a6(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lnga brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas
253a7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa spyad par gyur na mi rung zhes nyams par byas te slar khyim du dong ngo // de la dge slong gzhan dag cig 'di skad du/ dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di dag bstan pa las nyams pa ni
253b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ma legs so zhes 'bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'di skad du dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bstan pa las shin tu lnga
253b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni shin tu ma legs so zhes ma smra zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag mngon par mi dga' nas khyim na gnas pa 'di ni dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin te/ dge slong dad pa dang mos pa mang ba 'byor pa
253b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na mi rung ngo zhes nyams par gyur to// 'od srungs nga lung ston te/ dge slong 'di
253b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mor 'dus pa'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i le'u stesasum
253b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ji lta
253b6(dkon brtsegs): bu sa zhal ta bgyi ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs ngas zhal ta bya bar gnang ba'i dge slong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa 'jig rten pha rol tu kha
253b7(dkon brtsegs): na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gang yang zag pa zad pa dgra bcom par gyur pa ste/ 'od srungs
254a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba
254a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa/ kha cig ni dgon pa pa zhi ba'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/ kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa/ kha cig ni grong 'dab
254a3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/ kha cig ni chos smra ba/ kha cig ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni ma mo 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni grong dang
254a4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnams bsrung dka' ba'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de la dge
254a5(dkon brtsegs): slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong dgon pa pabs mtha'i mal snyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong zhal ta byed pas yongs su bsgo bar mi
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// zhal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/ rus ma yin par gsol bar mi bya/ dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong dgon pa ba la dge 'dun gyi bya bar
254a7(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa slob pa'i las res bab na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las de bdag nyid kyis bya'o// yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las re byed du gzhug ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa la gnod
254b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa ras kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong rdul 'byor spyod
254b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas mthun pa'i tshogs chas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge sbyong rnal 'byor spyod pa des phyogs ga
254b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i sa phyogs der dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang skad drag po mi dbyung zhing byed du'ang mi gzhug go// dge slob la to byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de bsrung zhing mal cha'ang sbyar bar bya'o//
254b4(dkon brtsegs): kha zas bsod pa dang / yi gar 'ong ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ston
254b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te/ de la bdag gis rjes su mthun pa'i yo byad thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o snyam du shin tu 'phangs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon
254b6(dkon brtsegs): par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas lung ros shig/ lhogs shig/ kha ton gyis shig/ kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/ khyod ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta bur dge
254b7(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shig/ 'dug la brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig/ bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs
255a1(dkon brtsegs): de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya/ las su bsko bar mi bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o// 'od
255a2(dkon brtsegs): srungs de la chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su mi bsko bar bya'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu
255a3(dkon brtsegs): bcug la/ chos 'chang du gzhug go ka chos nyan pa dag bsko bar bya'o// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o// 'phel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// chos smra ba'i dge
255a4(dkon brtsegs): slong la dge slong gang dag gnod pa byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya'o// legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o// 'od
255a5(dkon brtsegs): srungs de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gi gan du dge slong zhal ta byed pa de sor la/ ji ltar na bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dang / ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyis
255a6(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o// de nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhal 'byed pa de'i bsam pa rig nas/ de'i bya ba dang / 'byung ba gang yin pa dang khyed pa gang yin
255a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de bstan par bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la 'bangs par bya ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o// dge 'dun
255b1(dkon brtsegs): byi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dge slong zhal ta byed pas dus dus su dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o// dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsags shing sba bar mi bya ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ ma bskul
255b2(dkon brtsegs): bar sbyin par bya gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o// des 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro bar mi bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'i
255b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa'i phyogs la rton par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/ bdag dgar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o// dngos po gang la'ang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'i/ bya ba ji tsam du chung
255b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin du bya zhing / rang dgar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi yo byad ga ci'ang rung ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par
255b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'ang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa
255b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// mchod rten gyi rnyed pa'ang dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la brel 'phongs su gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi
255b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par bgyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par bya'o// gal te de
256a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams
256a2(dkon brtsegs): cad bsdus la gros mthun par bgyis te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar gyur na/ gal
256a3(dkon brtsegs): te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing ngang pa dang ldan la/ bzod cing gnang na/ bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te/ de bzhin
256a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin du bya'o// ji ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta
256a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa des sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar mang du gyur tu zin kyang / dge slong zhal
256a6(dkon brtsegs): ta byed pas dge 'dun dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par mi bya'o// re ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis mchod rten la phul ba ni tha na ras kyi kha tshar gcig tsam gang yin pa de'ang lha dang
256a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin na/ rin po che 'am/ rin po cher smos pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rte/ de nyid du rlung dang /
256b1(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang / char pas drangs kyang ba'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gam/ dbyig gan du bsgyur bar mi bya'o// tsa' byed nan/ mthong rten gyi rin thang chung ba kyang med pa/ mchod tan na myos
256b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang brel ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pas de ltar yongs su dag par bya ste/ des dkon mchog gsum gyi dang ma sngags par bya'o// bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes par bya'o//
256b3(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gyor byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong zhal byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrim dang
256b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros sam/ dbang byed cing bsgo zag byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi'i 'jig rten du
256b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs na'ang zan dang / gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcag dang / lag cha snyems pas rdeg pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs gzhan yang dge slong zhal ta byed
256b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/ rang dgang dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing sgo ba dang / chang pa gcod pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / sdigs pa dang / dus ma yin par mngag pa dang / dus
256b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par sgo bar byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lus la lcag pur brgya stong gzug de dag 'a bar
257a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bar lakun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar bar 'gyur ro// des tshul khrim dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la bsdogs shing / ngag gi las
257a2(dkon brtsegs): gdug pa smras par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de sa der skyes nas/ lce'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing / de'i lce'i dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing / de dag kyang 'bar
257a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mchad cing 'bar te med 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir ldan/ 'di ltar des bsdigs shing dag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs
257a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus pa bzhag ste/ dus dus su mi sbyin zhing mtho btsams la gtses nas sbyin pa dang / kha cig byin/ kha cig ma byin/ kha cig la byin/
257a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig la ma byin na/ de mi dge ba'i las des yi rigs kyi skye gnas rgyag 'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro// de der skyes nas yi dgas gzhan gyis kha zas blangs te/ de la bstan na/
257a6(dkon brtsegs): de bstan pa'i tshe mig gnyis ka mi 'dzums par zas de la lta zhing bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi/ lo brgya stong du rang kha zas de thob par mi gyur ro// ji ste brgya la brgya
257a7(dkon brtsegs): lam na zas de thob kyang ngan skyugs dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa sbyin gnas rnams mgu bar ma byas
257b1(dkon brtsegs): shing / rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs ba ni'i dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi tshol bar byas na
257b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par smin pa ni ras bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo // 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu dag thos nas/ khro 'am
257b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi 'am/ gnod par sems sam/ khong khro ba skyed na de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// 'od srungs de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas dge slong zhal ta byed
257b4(dkon brtsegs): pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang gi sha la za'ang tha/ dkon mchog gsum
257b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam bsod snyoms sam/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad yongs su spyad pa ni mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
257b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhong pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnam bka' stsal to//
257b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das dge slong dgon pa pa gang dag bdag dgon pa pa zhes mchid kyis 'che na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong dgon
258a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa ba lags/ ji tsam gyis na dge slong bsod snyoms pa lags/ ji tsam gyis na dge slong phyag dang khrod pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
258a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di la dge slong dgon pa pas dgon pa dang / nags tshal gyi gnas dang bas mthar gnas
258a3(dkon brtsegs): mal bca' bar bya'o// chom rkun dang / gnag rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi med pa/ sdig sbrul med pa/ ri dgas dang bya mang po med pa/ sbrang bu dang sha sbrang nyung ba/ sbrang nyung ba/ ca co nyung ba de lta bu'i
258a4(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa bas mtha' dag tu gnas par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ yid la byed pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brkyang gang zhe na lus la mi blta bar bya ba dang / srog la mi blta bar bya
258a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta bar bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad la mi blta bar bya ba dang / dgon pa dag tu ri dgas 'chi ba ltar khas blang bar bya ba dang / dgon par dgon pa'i yon tan yang dag
258a6(dkon brtsegs): par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba ma yin par bya ba dang / zang zing dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar bya ba ste/ yid la bya ba brgyad po de dag
258a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o// dgon pa'i gnas de la gnas pa na/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i rnam pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phan pa'i byams pa dang
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i byams pa dang / gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang / yang dag pa'i byams pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang / zhi gnas kyi byams pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i byams bdangag /
258b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i byams pa ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa brgyad po de dag bskyed par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pan/ 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ltar dag
258b3(dkon brtsegs): ni lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs la gcig pu gnyis su med pa ste/ legs par byas pa 'am/ nyes par byas pa skul ba'i grogs ni gang yang med kyi/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
258b4(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag gi sems kyi bsam pa shes pa dag ni yod de/ bdag dkon pa'i gnas na gnas la/ mi dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song ni/ de dag dbang du
258b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs shing gcig pu gnyis su med de sten pa med/ bdag gi med/ yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ gal te 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ gnod
258b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ mi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par gyur na// bdag 'du 'dzi dang / 'du ba la mngon par
258b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems can rnams dang bye brag med par 'gyur te/ bdag gis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams la bsdus par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyang mi ma
259a1(dkon brtsegs): par byas par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed
259a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdam par bya/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu kun bsrung bar bya/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa
259a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha bsag med pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sems mngon du bya ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la rten pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la
259a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / yid byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa dang / phung po ni gsher
259a5(dkon brtsegs): ma ste/ phyir rgol bar rig pa dang / khams bzhi la myur du gdug pa'i dug tu 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug la grong stong ltar mos pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par mkhas pa dang /
259a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma
259a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i spyod yul ba dang / smon pa med pa'i sems spel ba dang / khams gsum la rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
259b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lus kyi skyon la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang 'dzag pa la lta ba dang / sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la mngon par 'dzin pa dang /
259b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba la thams cad kyi sred pa spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / byams pa'i spyod yul dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
259b3(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mngon du phyogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba la shin tu gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon du gyur pa dang / dbang po lnga
259b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / stobs lnga'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / zhig nas la gnas pa dang
259b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong gis blta bar bya ste/ 'od srungs de lta bu'i go cha 'di dag bgos nas nam gyi cha stong dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / rtag tu khyad par du 'gro bar dgon pa'i gnas
259b6(dkon brtsegs): de na gnas par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na lus brgyan par sbyor ba la brtson par mi bya'o// mal cha brgyan pa la brtson par mi bya'o// chos gos kyis brgyan pa la brtson par mi bya'o//
259b7(dkon brtsegs): des rtswa rnying pa bskams pa blangs la 'chags dang 'dug sar legs par bting ste/ bdag 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang ma spags pa dang / bdag gi gos kyis chog
260a1(dkon brtsegs): shes par dgon pa'i gnas der gnas par bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong dgon pa pa gang gi tshe lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam nye bar brtan pa'i phyir/ grong ngam grong
260a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na/ des sems 'di lta bus dgon pa'i gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ma rnyed kyang yongs su yi 'chad par mi bya/ rnyed kyang dga' ba bskyod par mi bya/
260a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa yid la bya/ bsod nams nye bar brtan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ba bsam zhing / des grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod nams kyi phyir 'jug
260a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ chos kyi go cha bgos la bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// de la chos kyi go cha gang zhe na/ mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs
260a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong na rjes su chags par mi bya'o// yid mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na'ang khong khro bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bar mi bya'o// dbang po shin tu bsdams pa dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes kyi
260a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / sngon yid la byed pa'i chos mi 'dor ba dang / zang zing gis ma sbags pa'i rgyud kyis bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// mthar chags su bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o// sa
260b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bsod snyoms rnyed pa der rjes su chags par mi bya'o// gang nas ma rnyed pa der yang khong khro bar mi bya'o// khyim bcur bslangs pa las/ khyim bcu gcig pa las bsod snyoms ma rnyed na'ang yongs
260b2(dkon brtsegs): su yi chad par mi bya'i/ de 'di snyam du bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni bya ba mang ba dag yin pas/ de dag gis bdag la sbyin par nges pa med de/ de dag bdag la sems pa'ang ngo mtshar che na/ bsod
260b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ des de ltar yongs su yi tshad pa med par bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// sems can gang dag de'i mig lam du snang bar gyur pa skyes
260b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag la'ang byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed par bya'o// ci nas kyang sems can gang dag bdag gi mig lam
260b5(dkon brtsegs): du snang bar gyur pa 'am/ bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar brtson par bya'o// des bsod snyoms ngan nam/ bzang yang rung blangs te grong ngam/
260b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal 'di na bdag gi bsod snyoms 'di las bgo bsha' bya dgos pa'i sems can dbul po su yod snyam du phyogs bzhir kun tu blta bar bya'o// gal te sems can dbul
260b7(dkon brtsegs): bo zhig mthong na/ des bsod snyoms de las bgo bsha' bya'o// gal te sems can dbul po ma mthong na/ des 'di ltar gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar ma gyur te/ mi snang ba'i sems
261a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag la bsod snyoms kyi thob pa'i cha skul sbyin gyi/ byin nas len pa dag yongs su spyod cig snyam du sems skyed la/ des bsod snyoms de khyer te/ dgon pa'i gnas de
261a2(dkon brtsegs): song la/ lhung zed dang lag pa bkrus te/ dge sbyong gi spyod pa dang / cho ga dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bzang pos byin gyis brlabs la des skyil mo krung bcas te bsod snyoms de bza' bar bya'o// ma
261a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / mi brkam pa dang / mi zhen pas zas zos nas/ 'di snyam du lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri yod pa dag 'di'i mthus bde bar gnas par gyur
261a4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ da ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te yang de'i bsod snyoms ngan par gyur na/ des 'di snyam du sems bskyed
261a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ kha zas ngan pas ni bdag gi lus yang bar 'gyur/ spong ba bzod par 'gyur/ bdag gi bshang ga ci 'byung ba nyung bar 'gyur/ bdag la dad pas byin pa chung bar 'gyur/ bdag gi lus yang ba
261a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems yang bar 'gyur/ bdag rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ bdag la 'dod chags kyi sems kyis kun nas dkris par mi 'gyur ro snyam du yid la bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag bskyed par bya'o//
261a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te des bsod snyoms mang zhig rnyed na/ de la'ang ran par bza' bar bya'o// dor ba'i chos nyid du'ang bya ste/ bsod snyoms de las rdo leb gang yang rung ba'i steng du gtor la/ 'di snyam du gcan gzan dang bya'i tshogs
261b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zang zing gi zas 'dod pa byin nas/ len pa de dag 'di la zo zhig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// des zas bos nas ltung ba zed dang lag pa bkrus te dgon pa la brtan nas gnas par bya'o// rlon
261b2(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi 'dor bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong dgon pa pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye bo'i drung du sbrul dang gcan gzan gtum po dag 'ongs na/ des de la 'jigs pa dang lda
261b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya'i/ des 'di snyam du bdag thog ma nyid nas lus dang srog bor te dgon pa'i gan su 'ongs kyi/ 'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya/ skrag par mi bya'o// byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya/ zhe sdang rnam par
261b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya/ 'jigs pa spang bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de ltar byas nas sbrul dang gcan gzan de dag gis srog gcod cing zan 'ang des 'di snyam du gcan gzan 'di dag la bdag
261b5(dkon brtsegs): gis zar zing tsam gyis tshim par byed mi nus kyi/ de dag gis bdag gi sha zos nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur la/ bdag gis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur ba ni
261b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// da ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'od srungs dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong gis de
261b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar lus dang srog la mi lta bar dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// gal te de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na mi ma yin pa 'ongs na/ mdog sdug kyang rung / mdog mi sdug kyang rung / de la chags par mi bya
262a1(dkon brtsegs): khong khro bar mi bya'o// gal te sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha dag dge slong dgon pa pa'i gan du 'ongs te dri ba yongs su 'dri na/ de la dge slong dgon pa pa des ji ltar
262a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa bzhin du lha de dag la chos bshad par bya'o// ji ste lha de dag zab mo'i 'dri ba yongs su 'dri ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa des lan mi thebs pa ldan/ des nga rgyal med par byas la/ 'di skad ces
262a3(dkon brtsegs): ma bslabs pa la brnyas par mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lung mnos nas 'bad de khong du ma chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na dris pa thams cad kyi lan gdab par
262a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// bdag ni chos nyan pa yin gyi/ khyed spobs par gyis shig ces brjod par bya ste/ 'od srungs dge slong dgon pa bas de ltar lha de dag la go bar bya'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa
262a5(dkon brtsegs): laganas pas/ dgon pa'i 'du shes shin tu bsgom par bya ste/ des lus 'di ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa'o// lus 'di la ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag med kyi/ chos 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung zhing / byed rgyu tshogs pa
262a7(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba ste/ ci nas kyang bdag gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gi tshul bzhin so sor brtag par bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
262b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyang rgyud mi 'chad par yid la bya'o snyam du de ltar bslab par bya'o// dgon pa'i gnas den gnas pa des rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshul de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang
262b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de ltar g.yo ba med cing byed pa po med do// stong bzhin du skye zhing 'jig
262b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ su'ang de dag skye bar mi byed/ 'gog par mi byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung la/ de bzhin du lus 'di'ang rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag
262b4(dkon brtsegs): gri med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'byung gi/ rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa'i
262b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang med do snyam du mtshan ma gzung bar bya'o// 'od srungs de ltar dge sbyong dgon pa pas chos kyi yi dam gyi spyod pa 'di lta bus dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa de
262b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa zhig tu myur du khyad par du 'gyur ro// gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur du 'bras bu
262b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs te 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na'ang de zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol gyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis sam gsum las
263a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'da' 'o// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur ba nyid du rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bar gyur na nini de tshe
263a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
263a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// dgon pa pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dgon pa pa'i le'u ste lnga
263a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// // 'od srungs de la ji ltar na dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa yin zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas 'di ltar bdag bsod snyoms gyi kha zas la
263a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam dang dam bcas pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du bsam par bya'o// ge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
263a6(dkon brtsegs): bdas mi brkam pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / khagasan med pa dang / mgron du bod pa thams cad kyi sems med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang ma 'bags pa dang / yo ngas la brtan par bya'o// das
263a7(dkon brtsegs): zas bzang po rnams la ro bro ba'i 'du shes thams cad du bskyed par mi bya'o// des 'di ltar bdag gis gdol pa lta bu dang / lus dang sems gtsang mar bya'i/ kha zas kyis lus gtsang mar ni mi bya'o//
263b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zas bzang po ji snyed cig zos kyang de thams cad ni tha mar rtag tu zag go// tha mar mi mthun no// bla mar dring ba'o// de lta bas na bdag gis dbang po 'dod par ma bya'o snyam
263b2(dkon brtsegs): du bslab par bya'o// de de ltar shin tu nges par sems pa'i sems kyis grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na mthar chags su bslang bar bya'o// des 'di ltar sems
263b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya ste/ bdag la skyes pa bsod snyoms ster gyi/ bud med ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la bud med bsod snyoms ster gyi/ skyes pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag la khye'u bsod snyoms ster gyi/
263b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la bu mo bsod snyoms ster gyi/ khye'u ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis bzang po rnyed kyi/ ngan po ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis bsti stang du byas nas
263b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed kyi/ bsti stang du ma byas par ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis bde zag tu rnyed kyi/ sha thar bar ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag la skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bsu bar
263b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhe 'am/ byin ma thag tu sems par 'gyur ram/ bdag sdod dgos par 'gyur ram/ shin tu bsdogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ram/ bdag gis kha zas bzang po ro sna tshogs dang
263b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi/ dbul po'i zas lta bu ngan pa ni rnyed pa ma yin no snyam du des mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad bskyed par mi bya'o// 'di lta bu'i go cha bgo bar yang bya ste/ rnyed pa
264a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed kyang yongs su yi chad par mi bya ba dang / ngan pa dang bzang po'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ba 'di ni dge slong bsod snyoms bdag gi chos nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ se
264a2(dkon brtsegs): can phal cher ni ro la brkam ste/ zas kyi phyir sdig pa'i las rnams byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o// gang dag cho ga shes par mi brkam pa/ ma zhen pa ro la mi gdug lce'i
264a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po chog shes pa/ zas ngan ngon ji tsam gyis 'tshe ba de dag ni shi ba phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ lhar skyes nas bdud rtsi
264a4(dkon brtsegs): za bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de ltar na bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis ro la sred pa bzlog ste/ sems nges par sems pas lhad zan zhag bdun lon bza'ang yi chang par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
264a5(dkon brtsegs): lus gas ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs bsags pa'i don du bdag gis zas bza' 'o snyam pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed du 'ongs pa/ lhung bzed du/
264a6(dkon brtsegs): chung ga chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i dge slong dag dang thun mong du byas la bza' bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pan par gyur te/
264a7(dkon brtsegs): nad g.yog med la/ bsod snyoms la 'jug kyang mi nus na/ des 'di snyam du bdag ni grogs med pa/ bdag ni gcig pu/ gnyis su med pa/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba/ bdag gi grogs ni chos yin te/ bdag ni/
264b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la rton pa yin la/ bdag ni mi bde zhing sdug bsngal te/ rab tu na pas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sman gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar thos pa bzhin du/ chos de dag bdag gis tshul bzhin
264b2(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs de la gang lus 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa 'di ni tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o// de lus 'di la skyon du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
264b3(dkon brtsegs): du so sor rtog pa na/ tshul bzhin la zhugs pa de sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur zhing dran pa dang ldan la/ shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod par 'gyur te/ des
264b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan thob nas/ bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'dod pa na/ nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma gsum na/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i zas kyis gnas so// gal te 'di
264b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar rnal 'byor la zhugs la/ bsam gtan bskyed par mi nus na/ de ltar brtson zhing rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong chos la gnas pa de la mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i lha dang / klu dang /
264b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dag kha zas 'bul bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ des lhas yongs su gzung ba rnyed pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs gal te sprin 'dus shing
264b7(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab ste/ bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms la 'jug mi nus pa'i dus kyi tshe/ byams pa'i zas kyi go bgos te/ chos sems pa yid la byed pa la gnas nas/ zhag gnyis sam/
265a1(dkon brtsegs): zhag gsum zhig zan chad na/ 'di ltar yi dgas gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa nyes par byed pa'i las byas pa gang dag lo brgyar yang mchil ma thal ba 'ga' bzar mi rnyed pa dag
265a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yod de/ de lta bas na bdag tshul bzhin du chos sems pa la gnas pas/ lus nyam chung ba 'am/ sems nyam chung ba bskyed par mi bya ste/ bkres pa dang snyoms pas ji mi snyam par bya'o//
265a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa la brtson 'grus rgyun mi chad par bya'o snyam du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas khyim 'dris pa dang / skyes pa 'dris pa dang / bud med
265a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dris pa dang / khye'u 'dris pa dang / bu mo 'dris par mi bya'o// khyim gang na bsod snyoms gtsang mo byed pa'i khyim der stan la 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms gtsang ma byed pa zin gyi bar du chos kyi gtam brjod par
265a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas bsod snyoms de blangs la stan las langs te 'gro bar bya'o// 'od srungs bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis mkhong par mi bya/ kha gsag mi bya/ tshul 'chos par mi bya'o// de la mkhong ba gang zhe/
265a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gzhan dag la tshig 'di skad smra ba ste/ bdag gi bsod snyoms ni ngan pa'o// bdag gi bsod snyoms ni rtsub pa'o// bdag gis sngon 'di lta bu dang ma 'grangs par ma zos so// bdag
265a7(dkon brtsegs): gi bsod snyoms ni skye bo mang po dang thun mong du byas so// bdag gis nyung zhig zos te bdag ma 'grangs pas bdag gi lus nyam chung ngo zhes bya ba ste 'di ltar mkhong ba'i
265b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma gang ci'ang rung ba 'dis bu 'di mi sems kyi tshul bachos pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong bsod soms spong bas de dag thams cad ba'o// gang srung babad du 'angs pa pa kyang rug ba dang 'ang chu/
265b2(dkon brtsegs): nyungs yang rung / mang yang rung / gtsang yang rung / mi gtsang yang rung ste/ de bza' bar bya'o// yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos nges par sa
265b3(dkon brtsegs): bamang ba dang / lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ res bsod snyoms bza' bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas grong ngam
265b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms bslangs te ma rnyed la/ ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir byung na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
265b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas mchod pa/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa
265b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba de nyid grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs na'ang / ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du slar gshegs na kha dag lta bu
265b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir byung bas ci'i phyir yi chad par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pas kha zas bzang po dag mi rnyed pa'i phyi'o//
266a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdud kyi las sam/ bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag bdag la bsod snyoms mi ster na/ ci nas bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'on mong/
266a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du bsam mo// de ltar nga'i nan tan la gnas pa de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srungs dge slong bsod
266a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyod pas de ltar 'phags pa'i rigs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// bsod snyoms spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / 'od srungs de la dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas
266a4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu'i sems kyis phyag dar khrod pa bsdu bar bya zhe na/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas g.yog pa'i sems su bya'i/ chos gos kyis tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa'i sems kyi ni ma yin no// rlung dang /
266a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba yongs su bskyabs pa'i phyir yin gyi/ lus brgyad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan gyi
266a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas/ gos gtsang ma la mngon par dga' ba med de/ des phyag dar gyi phung po las phyag dar khrod pa blangs la 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chog shes pa'i 'du shes dang / mgu
266a7(dkon brtsegs): sla ba'i 'du shes so// gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i 'du shes so// gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis
266b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgred par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lus brgyan pa dang / sems gtsang ba'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas phyag dar gyi phung po las phyag dar khrod pa len ngan/ sa phyogs den sngon pa/
266b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs su gyur pa 'am/ sngon gtam 'dres pa'am/ phebs par smra ba de dag gis mthong na bdag la smod par 'gyur gyis dogs te phyag dar khrod pa de ma blangs na/ 'od srungs dge slong phyag da khrod pa
266b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyag dar khrod pa de lta bu ni yongs su dag pa ma yin no zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas rdo lta bu'i sems dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems kyis dogs pa med par byag
266b4(dkon brtsegs): dar khrod pa blang bar bya ba'i phyir ro// des phyag dar khrod pa de blangs nas legs par bkrus te/ shin tu gtsang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ tshon btsal te kha legs par bsgyur la chos gos snum
266b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar la glan par bya'o// de phyis 'jig par mi 'gyur ba legs par glan/ legs par sbyar/ legs par btsems te bgo bar bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong phyag dar khrod pa bas 'dod
266b6(dkon brtsegs): chags nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi sdug pa yid la bya ba la gnas na/ phyag dar khrod pa dge lus la bgo bar bya'o// zhe sdangar nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byams pa'i sems kyis phyag dar khrod pa
266b7(dkon brtsegs): dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// gti mug nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnas te/ phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la dgo bar bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ tshul
267a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa la zhugs pas/ phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// skye mched drug yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dbang po legs par bsdams te/ phyag dar
267a2(dkon brtsegs): khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir/ tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med par phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// 'od srungs ci'i
267a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir phyag dar khrod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srungs dper na phyag dar de la ni su'ang 'dod pa mi skyed/ su'ang chags pa mi skyed cing / yongs su mi len te/ phyag dar ni dor ba'i cha'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du
267a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag dar dang mtshungs par bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ rnyed sla ba/ mod pa/ gzhan la gsol mi dgos pa/ gzhan gyi ror lha mi dgos pa/ gzhan la rab ma las pa/
267a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag dar lta bur bor bste// / de'i phyir phyag dar khrod pa phyag dar khrod pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rigs so// 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gtsang ma'o// 'di ni 'phags pa'i rig
267a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas so// 'di ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi rton pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun srung ba'o// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i sgo'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi phung po'i rten no//
267a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang mthun pa ste/ 'od srungs de ltar phyag dar khrod pa ni yon tan mang ba/ skabs med pa/ go skas
267b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bla gab med pa ste/ dri ma med par 'gyur zhing / khur khyer bar 'gyur ba'o// 'od srungs dge slong phyag dar khrod pa ni gang / phyag dar khrod pa'i gos kyis chog par 'dzin pa de la lha rnams kyang
267b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs 'di lta bu'i dus dang 'di lta bu'i gnas yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pa chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba/ bsam gtan gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa de la brgya
267b3(dkon brtsegs): byin dang / 'tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang thal mo sbyor zhing rkang pa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ lha gzhan phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ 'od srungs dge slong dag
267b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gos kyis cha ba la mngon par brtson gyi/ rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa/ lus kyi rgyan lhur len pa/ phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gau dri mas yongs
267b5(dkon brtsegs): su gang ba dag ni gos bzang po ji tsam gyon yang / 'od srungs de dag lha rnams dga' ba'i gzugs ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis lus cha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa de dag gi sems dang sam
267b6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba rnams shes te/ shes nas kyang de dag rgyang bsrings te yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs dge tshul skul byed mi gtsang bas spags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa thogs nas/ bsod snyoms blangs
267b7(dkon brtsegs): te mtsho ma dros par song ba dang de der song ba'i tshe/ mtsho mchog de na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis rgyang ring por bsu ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gtsang sbra sbyor ba'i lha de dag gis mi
268a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsang bas sbags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de bdag nyid kyis bkrus te dri ma med par byas nas/ bkrus pa'i chu dri ma can des rang gi lus la skud de/ skul byed kyi tshul khrims kyi
268a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yang dag par blangs pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa shes nas mtsho de'i lha rnams yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu rgyu rab tu bzang po zhes bya ba de gos gtsang ma bgos na bsod snyoms
268a3(dkon brtsegs): blangs te mtsho ma dros par song ba dang / mtsho de na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis de mtsho mchog 'dir kha zas zos nas lhag ma bor na mtsho mchog mi gtsang bar byas su 'ong zhes/ rgyang grags gcig khor khor
268a4(dkon brtsegs): yu ga tsam gyi bar du nang du 'dar ma ster ba la ltos/ 'od srungs 'phags pa'i chos kyi yon tan bsgrub pa'i khyad par dang / skul byed kyi phyag dar khrod pa bkrus pa'i chu'i dri ma can lha dag rang gi lus la skud pa dang /
268a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu rab tu bzang po ni 'gror yang ma ster ba la ltos/ 'od srungs de lta bas na dge slong phyag dor khrod pa pa yon tan gyi chos 'di dag 'dod ba zhum zhum por ma gyur pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas
268a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi bag med ci yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis lus la phyag dar khrod pa dag bgo bar bya'o// 'di ltar yang sems kyis lus dag par
268a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ lus kyis sems dag par ni mi 'gyur ro// de bas na sems dag par 'gyur bar bya'i/ lus cha bas dag pa ni ma yin te/ sems dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
268b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la tshangs par spyod pa zhes gsungs so snyam du sems nges par bsam par bya'o// 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas khyod dang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta
268b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dus dang / 'di lta bu'i dman yod de/ 'od srungs chos gos ngan pa gyon pa/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa khyod gang du chos gos snam sbyar khri'u 'am khri'i steng du gzhag ste/ khyod bla gos
268b3(dkon brtsegs): gyon nas 'chags sar 'chag pa'i tshe lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag der lhags nas/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i lus la bgo bgo ba'i chos gos so//
268b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes khyod kyi chos gos snam sbyar de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs ltos/ chos gos la'ang phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur na lus la lha ci smos/ 'od srungs ji ltar na dge slong nga'i rjes su slob pa dag de
268b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur snyam ste/ ngas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste/ ka shi ba phra mo dang / du gu la'i ras dang / ko tam pa'i ras dang / dang ris can gyi chos gos rnams
268b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i ris la dga' ba'i phyir sha ni'i ras kyi gos rnams lus la bgos so// 'od srungs khyod las ngas dar gos ngan pa blangs te/ ngas khyod la sha na'i ras byin pa gang yin pa de thams
268b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang / khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir yin gyi/ chags pa'i phyir ma yin/ lus brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin no// 'od srungs 'di la mi gti mug pa kha cig khyod dang nga'i rjes su mi slob
269a1(dkon brtsegs): cing / brkang pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ chos gos sogs par byed pa/ lhung bzed sogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sogs par byed pa/ mgron
269a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / gser dang / nor dang / 'bru sogs par byed pa/ ba lang dang / lug dang / bya gag dang / phag dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / thong gshol dang / shing rta 'dren pa dag nye bar 'jog par
269a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa dag pas ni 'od srungs khyim pa dag la khyad par du 'gyur ba yod kyis/ mi blun po rab tu byung ba'i mtshams las 'das pa de dag la ni khyad par 'gyur/
269a4(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yang med do// 'od srungs khyim pa rnams khyad par 'gyur ba ni/ dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che gagos
269a5(dkon brtsegs): ngur smrig bgos shing bya ba mang ba/ sbag pa sna tshogs kyis spags pa/ zas dang gos lhur len pa de dag khyim pa dag gis gos ngur smrig gyon par rig nas/ zhes dang gus pa bskyed pa dang / chos
269a6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang bsod snyoms kyis sdud par byed pa dang / gus par smra zhing phyag 'tshal la ldang bar byed pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni khyim pa de dag gi khyad par du 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag rab tu byung ba de dag
269a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yongs su len pa la brtson pa ma yin zhing / ci'ang mo sogs pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong phal cher lhung bzed dang chos gos mas
269b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / snod spyad mang ba dang / rnyed pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de sbyin
269b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / phyir sbyin pa dus sus su byed cing bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams zad par byed la na nga nag
269b3(dkon brtsegs): yid byung ba/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa/ don nyung ba/ byed pa nyung ba/ rang gi don la brtson pa/ 'dris par byed pa yongs su spangs pa dag 'byung ba de dag gi gan du ni/ de'i tshe de'i
269b4(dkon brtsegs): dus na su'ang mi 'gro/ mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe rabs phyi ma lhur len pa ma yinas
269b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'di snyam du dge slong de dag la ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba med na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsten/ ci'i phyir phyag bya/ ci'i phyir mchod/ ci'i phyir bsnyen bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i
269b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la sten par byed/ bsnyen par byed cing
269b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo // 'od srungs chos 'di lta bu tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bden pa mthong zhing
270a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o//
270a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/ 'jig rten pha rol tu khan ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba/ tshe 'di lhur len ga tshe rabs phyis
270a3(dkon brtsegs): lhur mi len pa thams cad kyi sgo ngas bshad par bya'o// 'od srungs gang dag tha na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems cig tsam yang mi skyed pa'i mi gti mug pa de dag la ni/ ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs
270a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byed kyi steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos na/ bdag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas smad par bya bar sems te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni rang bzor
270a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba 'am/ bdud kyis mtho btsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing / de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/ gzhan dag kyang phung
270a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug po de dag ni bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa'i
270a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhugs pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
270b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir nan tan snying por bgyir pa'i gang zag chos kyi dbang drug rnams la/ sangs rgyas bcom
270b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams thugs rje chen po gang lags pa de rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing / de
270b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
270b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas mos shing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
270b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ zhi ba 'dod pa/ grol bar 'dod pa de dag gi ched chos kyi le'u 'di zung zhig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba
270b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang chos 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung
270b7(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
271a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'phags pa'i rigs sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims
271a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa spa 'gong ba dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i bsags pa dang / rin po che'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig bcom ldan 'das
271a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te
271a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las rin po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya
271a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / bam po gnyis so// sh+lo ka drug brgya bdun cu/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de/
271a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a k+Sha ya ma ti pa ri prits+tshan ma ma hA ya na sU tra bod skad du
271a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
271b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
271b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po nyi ma'i rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' yas tog dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal la sogs pas sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
271b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par
271b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
271b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
272a1(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems shes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sam sems dpa' ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi/
272a3(dkon brtsegs): sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis/ stan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing / sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/
272a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos 'di dag gi don rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda 'am/ bdags pa'am/ tha snyad du mi dmigs shing / byang
272a5(dkon brtsegs): chub las gud na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med de/ sems ni sems dpa' yang mi
272a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no// sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems dpa'
272a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam kyang de zhin no// sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
272b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob bo// chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'ang
272b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// sems dpa' yang de bzhin no// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'di la ci'ang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa'ang med/
272b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang med/ sems can du gdags pa'ang med nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang
272b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa'ang/
272b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par mi 'gyur med kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper ri rab kyi tshal du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
272b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skye ste de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/
272b7(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can
273a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rtsal lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus
273a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtul ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur blta ste/
273a3(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
273a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded dpon mdzod chen pos phyug pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ legs par brgyan/
273a5(dkon brtsegs): bar blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par
273a6(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsam pa
273a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob
273b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/ de la chu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa
273b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang med do
273b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dang pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro
273b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po sngon du
273b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/
273b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha
273b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las
274a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mchi ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
274a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang // smon lam yongs su rdzogs
274a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
274a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / khong khro ba ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / lus la mi lta ba sngon du
274a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mo'i chos
274a6(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
274a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta//
274b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yong snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / ying sngon par sgrub pa la rjes su li rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
274b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsdub thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra gdul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos
274b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis dbyen pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
274b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
274b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang
274b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs sngon du 'gro ba dang /
274b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs sngon du 'gro ba ste
275a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
275a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khams la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang
275a3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bden pa la ma khas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
275a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
275a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems
275a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon du
275b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smon pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog par
275b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas
275b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/
275b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon
275b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
275b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang khams gsum thibs po nye bar rgyu ba
275b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes
276a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongs
276a2(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la
276a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas 'byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos
276a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos
276a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i/
276a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang // chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med
276a7(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam/
276b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dkar pos
276b2(dkon brtsegs): chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su gzung ba sngon du
276b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i
276b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs
276b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i sa 'thob pa sngon
276b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par
276b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i
277a1(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin/
277a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no// chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/
277a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs
277a4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs
277a5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la nges par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
