304b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i bar du ma thos pa na/ 'di snyam du bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nas
305a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i bar 'di lta bu 'di mthos so snyam du sems so// de dag gis rus gnanan thos par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid dga' bar 'gyur zhing
305a2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas dkris pa'i yid la byed pa med par 'gyur te/ tshig 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma byung ba 'di thos
305a3(dkon brtsegs): pas rnyeng bdag cag gis sangs rgyas mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur yang byas so zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
305a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni shing yongs 'dus brtol kha 'bus pa mthong nas/ kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di ring po mi thogs par me tog thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ yid dga' ba dang / rab tu dga'
305a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba na sa
305a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos na/ yid dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba nas
305a7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos na/ yid dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang nga'i 'khor 'di nyid na gnas par 'od srungs khyod kyis shes par gyis shig
305b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yid dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de dag yid dga' ba de dang / rab tu dga' ba des ring po ma thogs par sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi me
305b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par 'gyur bas/ me tog thams cad rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig/ 'od srungs 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba nas/ dngos po med pa'i
305b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i phyi na gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spyod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'ang / 'od srungs sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
305b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya'o// 'od srungs de bas na gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba nas/ dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos na dga'
305b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'od srungs de ni de dag ni thos pa'i dang po ma yin no// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu mkhan zhig gis nor bu rin po che mthong nas gang gi tshe dga' bar gyur pa den nor bu mkhan des
305b6(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de gdod mthong ba ma yin gyi/ de ni sngon nas rgyun du nor bu rin po che mthong ba'o zhes shes par bya'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes
305b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma byung ba nas/ dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos nas yid dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur cing / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes na
306a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di ni de dag gi thos pa'i dang po ma yin no// 'od srungs de dag ni 'di skad du smra bar 'gyur te/ gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ma skyes pa nas
306a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa dang / ma byung ba'i bar du bstan pa 'di nyid spros shig ces zer bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni sngon rgyun du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa'o// 'od srungs
306a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam grong gang yang rung ba zhig tu dgos pa la la'i phyir sen par gyur la yang dus gzhan zhig na de'i drung du mi
306a4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig song ste/ grong khyer de'i bsngags pa brjod cing / kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dang
306a5(dkon brtsegs): chu mig dang mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran nyams dga' ba dang / me tog dang 'bras bu nyams dga' ba de dag gi bsngags pa brjod nas/ des de thos pa dang dga' bar tshol te/ yid bde ba skyes nas/
306a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang 'di skad du kye skyes bu de nyid zlos te rjod cig ces 'tshol na/ mi des ni sngon yang grong khyer de dang / kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang yul nyams dga' ba dang / rdzing bu nyams dga'
306a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / skyed mo 'tshal nyams dga' ba dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran nyams dga' ba dang / me tog dang 'bras bu nyams dga' ba dag kyang myong ba yin par mi des de ltar rtogs par
306b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de zos nas yid cher dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du
306b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa dang / yang dang yang drung du 'gro zhing 'dri ba byas par gyur pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang /
306b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba na/ dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos na rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba cher skyed cing chog 'di skad du ma la 'di lta ste/ ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba nas
306b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i bar du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu 'di nyid rje mnyan to zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
306b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'byung ba de dag gi rnam pa dang / rtag pa dang
306b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag bka' stsal pa de dag nyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs ji skad du smra ba de de bzhin te sa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dang
306b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'byung ba de dag gi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma ni gang dag ngas da ltar bstan pa 'di dag nyid yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
307a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos de ni rnam pa ma mchis shing / rtags ma mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shes/
307a2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam pa ma mchis pa nas/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i bar du lags na/ rnam pa 'am/ rtags samamatshan ma ji lta bu zhig mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
307a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang lags pa de'ang rnam pa ma mchis rtags ma mchis mtshan ma mchis pa'i bar du lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma
307a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa ji ltar bstan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
307a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo shin tu ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i bar 'di bstan na/ gang dag mos pa nas/ kun chub par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag nyid rigs kyi bu dang
307a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rnam pa dang / rtags pa dang / mtshan ma yin no// 'jam dpal gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa der sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan par blta'o//
307a7(dkon brtsegs): der bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan par blta'o// 'jam dpal ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yang dag par bsgrubs te dge ba'i rtsa ba
307b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes
307b2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ mos par bya yi ger bri bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ron du bya/ tshig tu 'don par bya/
307b3(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ bsgom par bya ba nas/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang
307b4(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / mar me la sogs pas ci nus ci bong du mchod pa'i bar du bya'o// rim gror bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
307b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar phyir mi
307b6(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu nyan par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// 'jam
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ma skyes par mnyam pa nyid du mos par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba
308a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes
308a2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes shin tu bstan pa/
308a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mos par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim 'gro'i bar du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar byed pa 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang med de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
308a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar don 'di rtogs shing mos par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o//
308a6(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub ma yin pa'i chos de gang yang med do zhes de ltar mos par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim
308a7(dkon brtsegs): gro'i bar du bya'o// chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas rim gro'i bar du bya'o//
308b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi yongs su grub pa rnam par gzhog pa 'am/ skyed pa'am/ ston pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa
308b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin zhes bya bar 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o//
308b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin zhes bya bar mos par bya bar 'dod cing / 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
308b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin
308b5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa la rton pa'i phyir ro// de lta bu'i chos thams cad la the tsom med par rtogs
308b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// 'jam dpal lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su
308b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lor rdzi ltar 'gyur ba de nyid nyan par 'dod pa dang / de rtogs par 'dod pa dang / de la mos par 'dod pa dang / de la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
309a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par bya bar yang 'dod la/ sems can
309a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes pa la'ang mi gnas par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang rtsod pa med par yang 'dod cing / 'jig rten thams cad mi dmigs par rtogs par yang 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
309a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya ba nas/ rim gro'i bar du bya'o// chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i bar du rtogs par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
309a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/
309a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ma mchis pa'i yon tan gang lags/ phan yon gang lags bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rus pa ci'ang
309a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa/ rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa/ chos gang yang mi len pa/ mi 'dor ba/ g.yo ba ma mchis pa/ byed pa ma mchis pa lags te/ shes rab kyi
309a7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid shes pa ma lags pa/ ngo bo nyid mthong ba ma lags pa/ chos gang yang sbyin par mi bgyid pa/ chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba/ chos thams cad tha dad par mi bgyid pa
309b1(dkon brtsegs): lags na bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang lags/ pan yon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad gcig tung byed nga ma lags pa chos
309b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tha dad par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa/ bgyi ba ma mchis pa/ mi bas pa/ rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa/ so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnam dang /
309b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sbyin par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ 'grib par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ 'khor ba len par mi bgyid pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa
309b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bar mi bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ bsam par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa ma lags pa/
309b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ma lags pa/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa/ chos thams cad skyed pa ma lags pa/ 'gog pa ma lags pa/ chad par 'gyid pa ma lags pa/ rtag par bgyid pa ma lags pa
309b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pa ma lags pa/ 'gro bar bgyid pa ma lags pa dben par bgyid pa ma lags pa mi dben par bgyid pa ma lags pa gnyis su bgyid pa ma lags pa
309b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyis par bgyid pa ma lags pa'i yon tan gang lags phan yon gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
310a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal dngos po med pa nas/ byed pa med pa'i bar 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// 'jam
310a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang lag
310a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad snang ba dang / de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de dag gi ming yang shes par 'dod pa dang / de dag la mchod pa bla na med pa
310a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang byed par 'dod pa dang / de dag gi chos bstan pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang / mos par 'dod pas mi bslab pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
310a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
310a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ltar yang gzod ma nas zhi ba dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i bar
310a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// 'jam dpal de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom
310b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya'o// gang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'di la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems
310b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po spyod yul la zhugs pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ spyod yul la ma yin pa theg pa thams cad pa 'di nyid spyod yul yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod yul 'di ni ma byas pa ste/ de'i
310b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir spyod yul mo yin pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la spyad na byang chub sems dpa' sems
310b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po myur du tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
310b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
310b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de la spyad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
310b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge
311a1(dkon brtsegs): sa lta sas smra ga phyu
311a2(dkon brtsegs): sa gyu sa
311a3(dkon brtsegs): ma sa
311a4(dkon brtsegs): sam thos mi gyus pa/ bsam pa mi / sa kyis pa lab 'o// 'jam dpa' bad pa gtsug na pa 'a sa
311a5(dkon brtsegs): thams phyi pa mas ldamams brten pa / 'du sa pa sa / mas ca ba la byu gas 'gyus du rgya
311a6(dkon brtsegs): banan gshegs pa bcig me 'argya'o// rgyas thams cad kyang yang la bya'o// de ba shegs pa gang yi sa byed pa 'i maung yang gargyang bar bya'o// mang 'ang thos te darigs nas de bzhin
311a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa phyogs ga la bzhugs pa'i phyogs der mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o// yid la bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yod la rgyas na/ de yid la byas pas 'das par
311b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da sbyar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig para'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal ji ltar de
311b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa dang / spobs pa tshad med pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ skye ba med pa gcig gis chos kyi
311b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o// 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang dag gsungs pa dang /
311b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos ji snyed yongs su bzung ba de snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir snang bar 'gyur ro// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrubs pas de tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa de tsam du gnas shing
311b5(dkon brtsegs): gleng dag ni dang bcas pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kha cig 'di snyam du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyam du sems na
311b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag la 'di skad ces yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang dag par zung la 'dug cig dang / ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
311b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mthong bar 'gyur gyi/ ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis zhum pa med par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos por lta ba can dag nas/ yod
312a1(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba cam dag gi bar gyis bsgrubs par mi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che byi dor ma byas pa zhig bdog la/ mi
312a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig gis der mi de la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang ji tsam/ nor bu rin po che 'di la yon tan ci zhig yod ces zer la/ mi des kyang de la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che
312a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i yon tan tshad med kyi/ tshad med pa nyid du shes par gyis shes smras te/ de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de byi dor byas pa'i phyir mi de la bzhag nas/ kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che 'di re zhig byi dor gyis
312a4(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / de nas gdod shes par 'gyur ro zhes byas la/ de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de mi de las blangs te/ phyi bdar bya ba'i yod byad rnams kyis byi dor byas pa dang / de ltar byi dor byas pas nor bu rin po che
312a5(dkon brtsegs): rin thang med de/ des ji lta ji ltar nor bu rin po che de byi bdar byas pa de lta de ltar nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal gang dang gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am
312a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par 'jog pa dang 'jug pa de dang de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
312a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer dag gis sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' gang yang ma khyab pa med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ston pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston to// gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na/ des skye ba med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dperan rgyamamatshan
312b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bani nas skyes bu ba ni chu 'chu na/ de thams cad 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig pa nyid 'chu zhing len to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba med pa'i
312b3(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / dngos po myed pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
312b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de chos gang dang gang sdod kyang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol
312b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig par ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'dod na ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de 'chad pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang /
312b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci ston kyang de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang /
312b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba dang / dngos po med par ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du byang chub kyi byod kyi chos rnam yong su
313a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs nas myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
313a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos gang gi tshe bdag gi dbyings nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / gcig kho na dang / tha dad pa kho nar yang mi mthong na/ 'jam dpal de lta bu'i bzod pa can gyi byang chub sems
313a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems
313a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bzod pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o// gang yang sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir byang chub tu mi smon pa de lta
313a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bzod pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar bshad do// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes su de ltar mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba de bla na med pa
313a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad de/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ma bral bar brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos
313a7(dkon brtsegs): nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'bral bar brjod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
313b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
313b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rgyu ma yin zhing / rgyu las nges par byung ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa
313b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dngos po med pa ni rgyu'ang ma yin la/ rgyu las nges par byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu
313b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'ang thos nas nur bar mi 'gyur ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong ngam/
313b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la zhum par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nung ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni nga la skyabs
313b6(dkon brtsegs): su dong ba'o// de dag ni nga'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'o// de dag gi ston pa ni nga yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
313b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mi slob pa de byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang
314a1(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / nags tshal gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten nas skye'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
314a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
314a3(dkon brtsegs): tu slu bar mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi
314a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ yul lam/ ljongs dag tu gang la
314a5(dkon brtsegs): la ngag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba mchis sam de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
314a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thos nas/ bdag tshe 'di brjes nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di mnyan to zhes smon lam ta/
314a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni nyan pa nas/ rgya cher mi bsgom pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba
314b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mgu ba yangs pa thob pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do// 'jam dpal gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur na/ de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi
314b2(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod ra mnyan pas ci zhig bya thos nas ma dad cing phyir nur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la chos gang yang yongs su 'grub par ma bstan te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba 'am
314b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par yang ma bsdam slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa
314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'thob par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
314b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag la 'di skad du deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gtam mdzad pa de gang yin zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan
314b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gal ba'i
314b7(dkon brtsegs): chos de gang yang ma mchis te/ bka' mchid de ni sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar slab ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i
315a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis de la 'di skad du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur to zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
315a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni skye ba ma mchis par mnyan pa'i slad du'o// bka' mchid der ni ji ltar dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyis so so'i skye bo'i chos de dag rnam par bshig pam 'gra pa
315a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma bstan to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos bstan pa de las sems can gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba
315a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
315a5(dkon brtsegs): skad du 'drin ba dag gis de skad ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'tshal te/ deng khyod bcom ldan 'das dang
315a6(dkon brtsegs): gtam ci zhig byas shes 'drin de la bdag gis 'di skad du gal te khyod de nyan par 'dod na de mnyan to snyam du yid ma gtod cig/ mnyan to snyam du sems ma skyed
315a7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ kye skyes bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes rab skyed cig dang / de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di shes par nus so// kye skyes bu gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan
315b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod na/ de'i phyir 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes lta bur gnas par gyis shig dang / de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par nus so// kye skyes bu gal te khyod kyis chos
315b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na/ de'i phyir gnyis la ma dmigs shig/ mi gnyis pa la'ang ma dmigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la gnyis su brjod par bya ba yongs su brjod pa 'am/
315b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyis par brjod par bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// gal te chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams kyang ma gzhig cig/ lta bar gyur pa rnams las kyang ma 'da' zhig
315b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang lhag par ma dmigs shig/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma skyod cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig bdag las nyan par
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te 'dri na/ de la bdag gis de skad brjod par bgyi'o// de skad rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de ltar 'di la gzhag par bgyi'o// gal te 'dri ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am
315b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de ltar gnas shing de ltar zhugs na spobs pa'i phyag rgya 'di la gnas pa de la slad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ma byung ba'i
315b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'di bstan par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal legs so legs so//
316a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang phyis 'di skad kyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
316a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo kyang
316a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa'o zhes smra bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes
316a4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
316a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mkhas pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs
316a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
316a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
316b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par
316b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//
316b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste/ gang nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang med do zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes
316b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad ni nges par mi 'byung ba ste/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos de gang yang med do//
316b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// chos de dag ni ji ltar brjod pa de ltar yod pa ma yin te/ brjod du med pa ni yod pa'ang ma yin zhing dmigs su med do zhes de ltar shes par
316b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ gang
316b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir mi spyod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do zhe na/ yang de la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par/
317a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni byang chub dang mnyam pa'o// ji ltar chos thams cad byang chub dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang
317a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// sems can thams cad ci 'dra bar spyod pa de'ang de bzhin no// med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni spyod pa med pa'o// de'ang byang chub ste/ byang chub gang yin pa skye ba med pa'ang de yin
317a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med pa'ang de yin te/ de lta bu'i chos 'di la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar gyi
317a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes gyis shig 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
317a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bstan du med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi ston pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang
317a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa nas yang dag par stom pa'i bar
317a7(dkon brtsegs): du byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chad na/ gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub tu nges par rig par
317b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag/ ming dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur bdag ni sangs rgyas
317b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul la gnas pa'o// gong du'ang mos par byed na/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ngas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas
317b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mkhyen pa dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya 'di gzhag par bya ste/ rgya 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams la gzhag go// 'di ni sangs
317b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang chags pa med pa yongs su ston pa'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rgyu 'dis btab pa ni ngan song du
317b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i skal ba can ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba 'am/ 'jug pa'i skal ba can ma yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang sum
317b6(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra dang / man da ra chen po dang / lha'i spos rang
317b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das dang
318a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ 'di skad ces dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin
318a2(dkon brtsegs): po che 'di mchod pa dang / phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur cig ces smras so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes
318a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'dra ba de dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba nas de dag
318a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du brtson par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am
318a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du tshegs chung ngus grag la/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
318a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdag cag gi 'di ni lhas pasgrubs pa'o zhes the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
318a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o// de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
318b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang nges par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
318b2(dkon brtsegs): du dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis rab tu gsol bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ tshigs 'di smras ma thag tu
318b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthus su chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// sa chen po g.yos ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// bcom ldan
318b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang
318b5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
318b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i snga ltas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin
318b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa'i snga lhas rnams te ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang dag chos gang ya
319a1(dkon brtsegs): mi spong zhing mi zlog la/ bsngags par yang mi byed pa de dang de dag ni phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal dmigs pa yod na spong bar
319a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / bsngags pa byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na gang dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gi ched du ngas rgya 'di bzhag ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang la
319a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ston pa 'am/ rnam par rtog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
319a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
319a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i le'u shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319a6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar d+he ye shes sdes nus te gtan la pha
319a7(dkon brtsegs): ga sh+lo ka bdun brgya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na tsu Da pa ri pri ts+tsha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches
319b1(dkon brtsegs): nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
319b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgor phung po'i ri la/ dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
319b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu
319b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba/ cung shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi ba
319b6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dus pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs bya/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad+ma tha
319b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad+ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
320a1(dkon brtsegs): #rnam par rol pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa/ yon tan 'byung gnas bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gtan la phebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
320a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub kyi snying por rab tu gzhol ba/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa/ mi zad pa bstan pa'i gzungs
320a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i stabs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa/ tshim bstan pa la byad
320a4(dkon brtsegs): pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du lung ston pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyan pa 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'jom pa/ grags pa
320a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / brjod pa'i sgra mthon po phyogs bcur grags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bston cing bsngags te/ rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
320a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par shin tu sbyang ba byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
320a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang yongs su shes nas/ so so ci rigs par chos kyi sman gtong ba/ rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la 'jug cing / mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba yongs su spang ba/ dge ba dag cing dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa sems can thams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsrub dang / kun rigs
320b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan la/ rdo rje ltar mi byed pa/ dang pa ding / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
320b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / gzungs dang / smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
320b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la 'di lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par lta zhes bya ba dang / rtag tu rnam par lha dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mthu
320b5(dkon brtsegs): chen tho ba dang / seng ge dang / seng ge'i blo gros dang / seng ge'i skabs su 'gro dang / seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rjes rnam par
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gnon dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnor dang / 'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mig bzangs dang / pad+ma'i mig
320b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang / spobs pa chen po dang / mthu bo che dang / rin chen khar ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang // lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
321a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi rgyal po snang dang bkod pa'i rgyal po snang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / yid gnyis rnam par 'joms dang / glog ni snang bas brgyan dang / nam mkha' mdzod
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbyangs snyan dang / sprin dbyangs dang rnga sgra dang / dbyangs rnam par dag dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / 'jam dpal
321a3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / spos kyi glang po che la sogs pa dag pa'i sems can sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / byams pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang skal pa bzang po'i byang chub
321a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang / lha'i bu dge ba bkod dang / lha'i bu mtshams rab dang / bzang po'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba dang
321a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu legs par sems dpa' dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
321a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / de dag
321a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du ma dang
321b1(dkon brtsegs): yang thabs cig go de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i zil bzhugs te/ 'khor ba rgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bcas nas chos ston
321b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge ltar ni sgrogs/ nyi ma ltar ni ldan ne/ zla ba ltar ni lam me/ sngon ma ltar ni 'bar/ brgya byin mar ni lgang de/ tshangs pa ltar ni lhag / rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nas ri rab ltar ni ba pagra Ne/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor chen po'i dbus su mashegs nas chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs
321b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo las
321b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsams nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod par 'gyur ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// yang de'i shar phyogs
321b6(dkon brtsegs): logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
321b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes
322a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang lhan gcig tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lho
322a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byed chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi bam
322a3(dkon brtsegs): mi marjed 'dir gnas par gyur to// de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas te/ me tog kha dog du
322a4(dkon brtsegs): ma kha dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis
322a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal thams cad bzod byas shing // brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ drang srong chen po shA ka thub sus mthong ba// lha mi rnams kyis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed// gang+gA'i bye snyed
322a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mang / brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te/ stong phrag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab btul nas/ byang chub rdul thal mya ngan med pa thob// 'gro ba kun gyi gtso bor bsnyen
322a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bar// shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams/ legs par sprul nas spyad pa yongs dag pa'i// rgyal ba'i thad nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so// su dag chos kyi gtam
322b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams nyan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' lta ba dang / rkang gnyis gtso bo de la blta 'dod pa// de dag bya nong phung por myur du so// 'dren pa mthong ba shin tu rnyed par ga/ zhi ba'am
322b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang thos par shim tu dka'/ dal 'byor mer skye shin tu rnyed pa dka'// tshul khrims dang pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs bzhin du// bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na mya ngan
322b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas des ni ci bya zhesaka/ da ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'dong bar bya// gang dag ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// lha mi nang du bde ba 'thob pa dang // mya ngan 'das thob bde bar 'gyur 'dod pa// mtshungs med de
322b4(dkon brtsegs): yi gan du de dag deng // de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi sbyin// de ni ded dpon mchog gi lam mtshon pa// de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang// de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung byang
322b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches tshogs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag smras nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs
322b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis go bar gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te/ thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i don dang ldan pa
322b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das
323a1(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag pa rab tu gnas pa zhes
323a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang bcas te
323a3(dkon brtsegs): nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
323a4(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas rnga ni
323a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rdung / me tog gi char ni 'bebs 'od zer ni 'byin/ stong ma sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub
323a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
323a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che nges sems can bag med pa rnams yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shA ri'i bu
323b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems
323b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
323b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du dar nas/ rnga ni rab tu rdung / me tog gi char ni 'bebs 'od zer ni 'byin/
323b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
323b5(dkon brtsegs): ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang /
323b6(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang po de dag dang ldan
323b7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
324a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ngab chung ngam/ bskyod/
324a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su
324a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa nyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang la gnas na/ shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / shin tu grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / shin
324a4(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag pas sems
324a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod pas 'dod chags dang
324a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi spyod pa rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi spyod pas sems can mi mthun par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yang dag pa'i chos kyi nan tan la mos par bgyid par 'gyur
324a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag la bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par
324b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten da da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la sgribs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi spyod pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye she
324b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pas rigs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par rab tu bstan du
324b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par ra
324b4(dkon brtsegs): tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i dpe tsam cung zad cig bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legasaso zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems
324b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gtsug na rin po che bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa ni 'di bzhi ste/
324b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs
324b7(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni kun tu sngo ba'i
325a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni lam sla ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o//
325a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gtan la sems las su rung ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud bar bya'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs
325a3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ni snying rje chen pos lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba yongs su dag
325a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// drug po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
325a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na ga 'di
325a6(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ ser sna'i dri mas kun tu dkris pa'i sems sel ba dang / gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems 'phel bar byed pa dang / de ser sna'i dri ma bsal hUM btong ba'i sems la gnas nas/
325a7(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems la gnas so// de sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa bzhi mi byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can tha dad du mi byed pa dang / chos tha dad pa
325b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yongs su bsngo ba tha rad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad du mi byed do// de la ji ltar na sems can tha dad du mi byed ce na/ 'di la ni sbyim/ 'di la ni mi sbyin/ 'di la ni mang du sbyin/ 'di la ni nyung ngu
325b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin/ 'di la ni bzang po sbyin/ 'di la ngan pa sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/ 'di la nI bsti stang du byas te spyir/ 'di la ni bsti stad du byas te mi sbyin 'dra
325b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni thams cad sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad mo sbyin/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas/ 'di ni mi skyon pa'i gnas ma yin/ 'di
325b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni byin na sbyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/ 'di ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'di ni log par zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'di lta
325b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems 'phro ba spong zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / mi mtho mi dma' ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mtshungs par
325b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / mtshungs par byams pa dang / mtshungs par snying rje ba dang / bye brag med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba de ni sems can tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na chos
325b7(dkon brtsegs): tho dad du mi byed ce na/ gang chos smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni sbyin/ gang chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyin no snyam du de ltar sems mi skyed de/ de chos tham cad mnyam pa nyid thos nas sbyin dbyin/
326a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni dman pa'o snyam du sbyin pa mi sbyin/ 'phags pa rnams ni rgya chen po'o zhes sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis mnyam ste khye
326a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni chos tha dad pas ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de rgya byin thob par mi sngo/ tshangs pa
326a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par ma yin/ rgyal po'i srid dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'dod par ma yin/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho
326a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / skye bo'i skye gnas rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yong su mi sngo/ nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
326a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las gzhan du mi sngo ba tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa/ sbyor ba mnyam pa rnam
326a6(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa la mi re ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pas sems thag pa nas shin tu yongs su btang ba'i blo/ sems 'gyod pa med pa gnas gsum
326a7(dkon brtsegs): du dad pa thob ste sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin nas dad pa rab tu thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa na
326b1(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o// de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ brgyad po
326b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtog par lta
326b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de bag la nyal bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed
326b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la la nyal dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i rig la nyal te/
326b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag la nyal bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
326b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin nas sbyin par byed do// de rnam pa bzhi po yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na
326b7(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par
327a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang / 'gyod pa la chags pa
327a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / theg pa dman par sngo ba la chags pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de 'jigs pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum
327a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rloms sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rgya bzhis btabs
327a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btob pa dang / byang chub stong pa
327a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad
327a6(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byeng ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa
327a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de dran pa bzhi dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/
327b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong badran pa dang / byams pa chen po dran pa dang / sems can thams cad tu nyon mongs pa spong brnan pa ste/ dran pa bzhi por dag dab ma thal bar sbyin pargyan
327b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// de 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi 'khor
327b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// re shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhis yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/
327b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu na'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so
327b5(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la nugs
327b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag
327b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
328a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsu/
328a2(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos rang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i
328a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sbed pa dang
328a4(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gcig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/
328a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrim
328a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'dzud pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gsum te/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi gnod pa
328a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsal bas lus yongs su dag pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slongs dang / ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang
328b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
328b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yang dag par 'jim pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba ma nyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
328b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste
328b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslab pa la mi brnyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
328b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
328b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs
328b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su spong bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha
329a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe
329a2(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med
329a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar
329a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta/
329a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas khagasag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyi chog shes pas thob kyis 'jam par mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i
329a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi tong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
329a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyis dga' ba la mos pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa brgyad do// rigs kyi
329b1(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/ rnam pa dgug zhan/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas mar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang /
329b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi gnas dbu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su sbyong ba dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhing dang /
329b3(dkon brtsegs): sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu tshol ba dang / cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas
329b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la mi sru ba dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba las mkhas pas sems byang ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyis
329b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las
329b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang /
329b7(dkon brtsegs): phan par sbyong ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems dbu rgod ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur
330a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ ba di ni
330a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan
330a3(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'dral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgo mi 'dogs par slob pa ste
330a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang
330a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / byi rnam par dag pas yul thams cad spangs pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
330a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnam par dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam
330a7(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
330b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pagang pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pas 'di ltar gshe'ang slar migashe'o// lus yongs su dgapas brjes kyang sngar/
330b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rdeg go// sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshog par byas kyang slar mi 'chag go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
330b3(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba'i phyir gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mi gshe'o// 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang / bong bu dang / dbyig pas brdegs kyang slar
330b4(dkon brtsegs): kho khro bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kun tu srung ba'i phyir yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su
330b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i phyir/ slong ba la mi gshe'o// byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan pa'i phyir/ de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub bo// skyon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag
330b6(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje bskyed do// bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ gang slong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par
330b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do// stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi
331a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod // rus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod do// byams pa
331a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ phan par 'dod pa rjes su dram ring bzod do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do//
331a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// sems can thams cad la 'dud pa'i phyir/ spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do// 'jig rten
331a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su dran zhing bzod do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myong ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
331a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor rtogs pa'i stobs dang /
331a6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i stobs so// de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te bzod pa ni sor sor rtags pa'i stobs so// gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni sgom pa'i stobs so// rigs
331a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni/ gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos thams cad la dben par bzod pa/
331b1(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am/ mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad
331b2(dkon brtsegs): khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ zhum pa
331b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang la bdag med pa dang /
331b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa dang / chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag dang / sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
331b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba
331b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs
331b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa
332a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas mi ngal ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos thams
332a2(dkon brtsegs): cad ston par brtson pa/ chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing
332a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba/ sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa'i tshogs sogs pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams
332a4(dkon brtsegs): gsags pa chud mi gson pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gro bya'o cog byed pa ste/ de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus
