332a5(dkon brtsegs): la mig yor dang gzugs brnyan du shes pa/ tshig la brjod du med par shes pa/ sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa/ rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa
332a6(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba shes pa/ nges par rtogs pa'i// de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su
332a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i rtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi
332b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang / ro ngang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi
332b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa/ lus dang / reg pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o// ra 'dzin pa med cing dor ba med pa'i
332b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi 'dor/ tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi
332b4(dkon brtsegs): lenale lo mi 'dorabasam gtan mi len/ g.yeng ba mi 'dor/ shes rab mi len/ 'chal pa'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len/ mi dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas
332b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub mi len nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro// de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas/ gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la
332b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun tu ldang ga las dmigs pa kun tu ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'bral bar 'gyur ba de gnyis zhes bya'o// de la gnyis yongs su dag pa
332b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu de
333a1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
333a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag por sgrub cing / yang dag par sgrubs nas so so'i rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa
333a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas
333a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin
333a5(dkon brtsegs): lus la ma yin/ yid la gnas he bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sgra la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ reg bya la ma
333a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam btan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa ma
333a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du chu la ma yin/ me la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas te
333b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gzhan byed kyang zla ba la ma yin/ nyi ma la ma yin/ brgya byin la ma byin/ tshangs pa la ma yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do//
333b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ gzugs kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di
333b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan mi byed do// de
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/ srog la ma yin/ bso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin//
333b5(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes pa la ma yin/ shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba la khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan
333b6(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang rtag par lta ba la ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba la ma yin/ 'jig par lta ba la khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang zag par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do//
333b7(dkon brtsegs): de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do//
334a1(dkon brtsegs): de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de mtshan ma med pa'i
334a2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// re smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
334a3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de byams pa chen po'i go bgos/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong
334a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do// de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/ tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa
334a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa ma tshar ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs ma tshang ba med pa/ byams pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa
334a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i
334a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / snyad par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang don mthur pa ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
334b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag
334b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/
334b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdur pa dang ldan pa
334b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam
334b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pas/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
334b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bco brgyad dang rjes su mthun pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi mtshan sa sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral gsams
334b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/ rton pa bzhi thob pa/ 'jig rten rang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas ma smang ba/ drang ba
335a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyor ba/ chu bo las sgrol ga 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa rang bzhin gyis nye bar
335a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba las dang nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar zhig/ chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems so// byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir nam
335a3(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba med pa/ rang gi rang gis lung du ma bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste 'di
335a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod
335a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'dri ba la mi mkhas/ la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa
335a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/ kha cig ni rkang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang / mgo dang / rna ba 'dri ba la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam
335a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad du bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pa/ gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras
335b1(dkon brtsegs): shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyis ras 'dil nga'i gzugs zis te 'on cig/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo zas shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las
335b2(dkon brtsegs): ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji
335b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems ri mo mkhan gcig pu de'i lag tu ma blangs na/ ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
335b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cir blta zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig pu de med na/
335b5(dkon brtsegs): ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub par gyur
335b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa de dag las/ gal te rnam pa gcig ma bsnar na'ang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsgrubs
335b7(dkon brtsegs): shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa de'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa
336a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin no// bstan pa 'di nges par bshad ba nA/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob
336a2(dkon brtsegs): bo/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyo
336a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la'ang de'i shes
336a4(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar
336a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug
336a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dus ma byas la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la'ang
336a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par
336b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes
336b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la'ang ngo'o shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa bstan pa
336b3(dkon brtsegs): la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang
336b4(dkon brtsegs): po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thog pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de'ang 'phags pa/ zag
336b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong bar dka' zhing / zab la khong/
336b6(dkon brtsegs): du chud par dka' ba/ bye brag byed cing nges par rtogs pa/ lba ba dang bral ba/ bag chags bsal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa/
336b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi tshul shes pa/ don la nges par rtogs pa/ shin tu legs pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci'ang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med pa/ ma 'gags padus dang dus ma yin pa la rtogs/
337a1(dkon brtsegs): dus las mi 'da' ba/ skyon med pa/ legs par srung ba/ skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs gshin tu rnal
337a2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig pu spyod pa/ spyod pa med pa/ legs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir
337a3(dkon brtsegs): log kyang / gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/ yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sems can
337a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sems can
337a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ nye bar len pa la spyod kyang / nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang / 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med
337a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang shA sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// re'i shes rab de'ang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud pa/ dbang po smin par gyur pa/ yun ring por lta ba/ rtag tu
337a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa/ nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
337b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/ thangs
337b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// mtshan ma
337b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu song bas/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab yod
337b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis
337b5(dkon brtsegs): so gzhan yang yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag gi yongs su dag pa gnyis so// de'i shes rab da'ang thams
337b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su song ba/ sems can gyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi
337b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshams kyang sbyor ro// de'i shes rab de gnas pa'ang med la/ yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la'ang gnas so// de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang long bral la/ dbus la'ang
338a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa'o// de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par skabs sgrib pa mang ba'i stong yul lo// 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med par rnyed pa'o// de'i gas
338a2(dkon brtsegs): rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ ra'i shes rab de'i chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan pang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnal ba'ang ma yin te/
338a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba 'am/ mi sbyor ba 'am/ chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni/ ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bsod
338a4(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no// thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no// gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no//
338a5(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
338a6(dkon brtsegs): tu byin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag
338a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
338b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol la na sa tha sam ca kyi mig rngul dang bral zhing rna ma med par ram par gnas de gcig 'das nas mdzar sa bcom ldan 'das ga shes rabakyil par byin pa tshu
338b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo le'u 'di zhes par 'gyur ba'i sems cadan de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa
338b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas rang
338b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/
338b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/ lus la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go// rnam
338b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la mi sdug pa'i rnam
338b7(dkon brtsegs): par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ btsog pas yongs su gang ba yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni ni mi sdug pa'i
339a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis/ de bzhin
339a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i skuchos kyi sku/ bsod nams kyi sku/ ye shes kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag pa med pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs
339a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis
339a4(dkon brtsegs): su so sor rtog pa dang ldan par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni chos gnyis
339a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sbyong ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o// de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa
339a6(dkon brtsegs): ste ring por mi gnas pa/ tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas/ lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to// de snying po gsum len te/ gsum gang zhe na/
339a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi snying po dang / longs spyod kyi snying po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po'o// de la lus mi rtag go snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te ci bya'o cog la
339b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang / g.yo dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ srog la bag mi ston par 'gyur te/ srog ni
339b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma
339b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de la yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob bo// de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems
339b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi khams
339b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag yongs su skyabs pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o//
339b6(dkon brtsegs): gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus
339b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul
340a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma med pa nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nam mkha'
340a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu
340a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa bdag gi lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing / bdag gis sems can thams
340a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin du rtog go// de zag pa med pa'i chos la /
340a5(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so// de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs so// de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge
340a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo'o// de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do// zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa
340a7(dkon brtsegs): dang srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o// de la 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams
340b1(dkon brtsegs): su skye'o// srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsams pa'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas gdon
340b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya'o// lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gnag pa sgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma byung bar ma sor rtog so/ lus la phyi ma'i tha
340b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'pho bar so sang rtog go// lus lad ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so sar rtag go// deng ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i ba chog la lja mi skyed do// jigs tshogs
340b4(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do// bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo// rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems
340b5(dkon brtsegs): med do// gnod sems med pas bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro// khengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang
340b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs su song ngo // chos kyi grogs
340b7(dkon brtsegs): su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do// chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul
341a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro// de yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo// mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
341a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do// rnam par rtog par mi byed do// rnam par mi rtog pas mo 'gyur ro// mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed ro// rnam par mi byed do// nam mi byed pa rnam par
341a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin du thob nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa
341a4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
341a5(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skos pa ni/ tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de 'di
341a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spong ba'i phyir/ tshor ba rnabs la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de sems
341a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do// des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed
341b1(dkon brtsegs): des de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba den 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de nas
341b2(dkon brtsegs): sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de// bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong bden gti mug la spyod
341b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs par 'jom par yang byad
341b4(dkon brtsegs): dog sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khong khro ba legs par 'jom par yang byed do// sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rig pa legs
341b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jom par yang byed do// des tshor ba gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do// bdag med par shes shing myong bar byed do//
341b6(dkon brtsegs): de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par
341b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ltar na gang ba da ni mi rtag pa'o// gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do// gang bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang
342a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang / zhu ba dang / gnas pa med par shes
342a2(dkon brtsegs): so// chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig par yang so sor rtog go// so sor rtog pa na chos la skye ba de dag gang nas 'ong / 'gag pa rnams gang du sogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa
342a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro bar shes nas/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par sgrub bo// bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do// de ci'i
342a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyibadag 'ga' zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes
342a5(dkon brtsegs): su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o// gang tshor ba 'gag pa'ang rab tu shes la/ tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed de/ tshor ba rnams
342a6(dkon brtsegs): la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do//
342a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la na tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do// chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bdag dang bdag ging bral ba'o// byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pago/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o// bdag med
342b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'o// nga'i ba med pa'o// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so// des mang rigs mas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin par
342b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas/ de stong pa nyid kyi don rigs pas/ lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / don shes pa dang / chos rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig pa
342b3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 'di nibyang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//
342b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi
342b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa shin tu nye bar gzhog ste/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo// de sems kun tu tshol ba na
342b6(dkon brtsegs): sems nang na'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi rol na'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems byi dang nang na'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phung po rnams la'ang sems
342b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ khams rnams la'ang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la'ang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // des sems yang dag par
343a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ma mthong bas/ sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam
343a2(dkon brtsegs): mo// de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs pa de'ang gzhan la/ sems de'ang gzhan nam/ 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/ gal te dmigs pa'ang gzhan la/ sems kyang
343a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo // 'di
343a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ sems de nyid kyis kyang sems
343a5(dkon brtsegs): de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba la gang sems mi gnas pa/ chad pa ma yin pa/ rtag pa ma yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa
343a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba de las kyang ma yin/ gzhan las kyang ma yin/ de nyid kyang ma yin/ gzhan yang ma yin/ sems kyi rgyud/ sems kyi 'khri shing sems
343a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid sems kyi mi gnas pa dang / sems kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / sems kyi snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so// /
343b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mthong ngo // de bzhin cid dza lta ba bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid rab tu shes pa/ de bzhin du mthong ba 'ang ni/ rigs kyi nga byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su sna ba dran pa
343b2(dkon brtsegs): b.rag nag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi tog go// rnam par mi rtog/ g.yo ba med
343b3(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar zhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa
343b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi
343b5(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su bsngos pa'ang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de'ang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems ji lta bar spyod pa'ang de gzhin no//
343b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba'ang de bzhin no zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/ nga
343b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa rab tu
344a1(dkon brtsegs): mgyogs par mi gnas par rgyu ba spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba 'bab chu'i rgyun dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba/ rgyang ring por 'gro ba/ lus med pa/ yul la brka ma ga skye mched
344a2(dkon brtsegs): drug la spyad yul ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa rtse gcig pa/ mi 'gro ba/ rnam par mi 'phro ba/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/ g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes
344a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyis dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems
344a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems la mngon sum gyis shes rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu
344a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa dang / sems la g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
344a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de
344a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi
344b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang dri bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi
344b2(dkon brtsegs): sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so// sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin
344b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba'ang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// da rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can
344b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa
344b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rab tu shes shing sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed do// rnam par mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pa chos kyi dbyings gnas pa rjes su shes kyang / sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
344b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar
344b7(dkon brtsegs): gnag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/
345a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu'am
345a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed bu 'am/ gang skye ba 'am/ rga ba 'am/ 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do// 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do//
345a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/ gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste/ dge ba'ang rung / mi ga ru// mig so' yang rung / ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/ chos rnam la
345a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par byed pa'ang med la/ chos rnams la rgyu ba med par yang gang yang mi skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na/ 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin
345a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mig yo ba mngon par 'du shes pa dang gsum mo// de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o// de ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa mchog dam par khyad par du
345a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa gu'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcu po de dag gang zhe naka 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su dag pas mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad
345a7(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rnam pa drug tu shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can yongs su dag pas sems
345b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad 'khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadang par ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang / spobs pa mi
345b2(dkon brtsegs): mang pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dadag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su
345b3(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas bar du gcod pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos
345b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / rus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong
345b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa bzang po mchog rab bye brag tu 'phags pa
345b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyur ro// des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro// de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir/
345b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ba dag la mi ridage ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du bag chags su'ang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do// re mig yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas/ mog so/
346a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa skyed kyang / ting nge 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes par lang mi 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa
346a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams su'ang skye'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su
346a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing / byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag sgom la/ byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang / dge ba'i chos mngon par
346a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar yang mi ltung / mi dge ba'i chos spong yang char par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa'i
346a5(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma'i lam mo// de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ma rig pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing / gdag
346a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes
346a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med/
346b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi med pa dang
346b2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / por mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing
346b3(dkon brtsegs): gtags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// chos rnams kyi dbu pa'i lam de ni 'di 'dra ba de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung ste/ dbu ma'i lam ni btags pa
346b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa mtshan ma med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
346b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na mda' gang nas 'phangs pa dang / gang du dog pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang rigs pa dang phog pa de'i dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing / gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/
346b6(dkon brtsegs): blta ba 'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu darigs pa gang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi
346b7(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma bstan par mi nus pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu brda tsam bu dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'i/ don dam par ni ma yin no// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu'ang med/
347a1(dkon brtsegs): mang po'ang med do// gang la nyung ngu'ang med/ mang po'ang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/
347a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// srog dang gang zag ces bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// mtshan ma
347a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// dmigs pa dang mi migs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ rtog pa dang 'jig
347a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// tshu rol dang pha rol zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ 'jig
347a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ra'i lam mo// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyis
347a6(dkon brtsegs): ka'ang mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyar/
347a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te/ de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so// de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas
347b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams dbyer med par khong du chud ngo // chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so/
347b2(dkon brtsegs): des chos thams cad dbyings gcig tu shes nas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang / chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nga nas mi mthong bden chos
347b3(dkon brtsegs): la tha dad du mi byed do// de chos rnams mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i mig
347b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par lhung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir de lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig
347b5(dkon brtsegs): spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas/ chos gang
347b6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang mi gnas so// des chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas/ chos rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa
347b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa gnang ba'o// gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de'ang mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sem
348a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar banag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar banag pa bani po de dag la gnas par byin ci log pa ni rab tu nga
348a2(dkon brtsegs): ste rnga bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas
348a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i byin ci log rab tu spong ngo // chos rnams la
348a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid sgrub bo// yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas byang
348a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob ste/
348a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'jug gi/ mi dge ba la ni ma yin no//
348a7(dkon brtsegs): de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang dge ba'i
348b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
348b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las yongs su dag pa'i rang gi dang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ 'bang pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i
348b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi
348b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag sems kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur gyi brtson 'grus kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin ro// de dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas
348b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba la 'jug ste/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa
348b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i spong ba mnyam pa yin gyi mi mnyam pa ma yin no// ro sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis
348b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sgrub pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o// de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa yong/
349a1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin
349a2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
349a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// de la byang chub kyi sems lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i chos spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang bar 'gyur ro// thab sems
349a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu thob pas dpyod pa yang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
349a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo// tshe la dbang bdas 'dod na sems can tshe thung ngu rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongs su 'dzin cing / sems can de dag yongs su smin pa byung pa dang / sems ca
349a6(dkon brtsegs): ring po chos bstan na yongs su skyo ba rnams la chos bstan pas yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lha 'am mi gang dang gang du skyes pa thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang sgyur ba yin te/
349a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la dbang 'gro ba ste/ lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas/ lus ci 'dra ba
349b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam ci badra bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur pa de 'dra bar byang chubs
349b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de lus dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyings dang / spyod lam kun tu ston te/ de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang
349b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang gnyis pa 'di 'thob po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
349b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la dbang 'thob ste/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur gyi/ 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton
349b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par
349b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba zab mo'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid dang / chos rnam par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing / gang gis sems can tshad med pa rnams bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
349b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra'i'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas gsum pa 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang
350a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob ste/ byin gyis brlabs la dbang ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho ga cig tu byin gyis rlabs kyang na
350a2(dkon brtsegs): nga'ang med la/ spyod pa debang kun tu ston pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag thams cad rig cig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang / rgyal chen
350a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la/ spyod pa de'ang kun tu ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
350a4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa bzhi 'am tsan dan gyi sa bzhi 'am/ spos kyi sa bzhi 'am/ me tog gis ba'i 'am/ nam mkhar gyur pa 'am// chus yongs su gang ba 'am/ mes
350a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gang ba 'am/ rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs na de 'dra bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin
350a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa de'i de de ltar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyis brlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun tu gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas rab na po 'di
350a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bopo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug steg ma/
350b1(dkon brtsegs): na rgyams pa rnams pa smra rkyen thams ca tan myong ba mas / b+hU nga/ da rgya / / sa
350b2(dkon brtsegs): dang lnga 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug sa gtam par ro// ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi dang par dag
350b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir tha ma dang sbyin gnas rnamal ldang ba dang / rim
350b4(dkon brtsegs): gro byed pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar zhing mthun par byed pa dang / ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du
350b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sems yang bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / nye 'gras pa med pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed cing gus pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang
350b6(dkon brtsegs): sems la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / spong ba rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / bden pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par byed pa dang / mi lhod par brtson pa dang / dgos pa
350b7(dkon brtsegs): grub par byed pa dang snyom las mi byed pa dang sems mi zhum pa dang / 'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang / zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi run pa
